71b3(mdo sde): 'jug go zhes gsungs na/de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ci las dgongs te gsungs/smras pa/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gnas pa skye ba dang 'gag pa la mngon par chags pas del
71b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen pos 'jig rten dngang ba'i chos gsal ba'i phyir tha snyad kyi dbang gis skye'o//'gag go zhes gsungs te/'di la chos gang yang skye ba dang 'gag pa med do//
71b5(mdo sde): de bas na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas shes par bya/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes par bya/sems can rnams shes par bya/sems can gyi chos rnams shes par bya/
71b6(mdo sde): bdag shes par bya ba dag gi chos rnams shes par bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med kyis de'i tshe don de nyid tshigs su bcad pa dag gis smras pa/byang
71b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bag yod pas//sangs rgyas 'byung dang sangs rgyas dang //sangs rgyas chos dang de dag ni//rang bzhin ci 'dra rab tu shes//sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhyen mchog ni//
72a1(mdo sde): zad med dge ba'i phung po ste//sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis 'byung //sngon gyi 'du byed rgyu las skye//gang gis sangs rgyas rnams rtogs pa//dpa' bo de ni pha rol
72a2(mdo sde): phyin//des ni thams cad yongs su shes//des ni thams cad khong du chud//byang chub sus kyang ma byin te//gang gis kyang ni gzung ba med//bdag gi chos rnams yongs shes pas//
72a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la ni sangs rgyas brjod//gang gis bdag ni rang bzhin gyis//'du shes tsam du rnam rig pa//de ni sangs rgyas ci 'dra dang //byang chub rang bzhin ci 'dra shes//'gro ba thams
72a4(mdo sde): cad 'du shes tsam//yongs su rtog pa rnams kyis brjod//rmi lam sgyu ma la sogs mtshan//byang chub sems dpas rnam par rig/ji ltar tshul 'di shes 'gyur zhes//gang zhig
72a5(mdo sde): de snyam sems 'gyur na//dbang po'i rta rnams rab btul ba//mnyam bzhag des ni rab tu shes//de la dgra dang zin med de//dgos pa dang ni mi dgos med//dor ba med cing gzung ba
72a6(mdo sde): med//yang dag chos brjod 'di 'dra'o//chos rnams kun la yang dag tshig/chos rnams yang dgra brjod ces bya//de dag yang dag tshig min pa//de ni skyon chags chos shes brjod//
72a7(mdo sde): 'dod chags chos dang 'dod med ni//dag pa rnams kyis mnyam par mthong //de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug ste//'di ni chos rnams yang dag brjod//sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/
72b1(mdo sde): snying rje'i bdag nyid go bgos pa//gang zhig rang bzhin stong min pa//sems can rab tu mi mthong ste//de ltar chos nyid gang shes shing //rtag tu kun tu dri med la//'jigs med thang la byin de dag
72b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas khong du chud par 'gyur//dper na sgyu ma mkhan po zhig/sprul pa thar bar bya phyir brtson//des ni snga nas de shes pas//sprul pa de la chags pa med//srid gsum sbrul po 'dra bar ni//
72b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mkhas pas shes//'gro ba'i ched du go bgos te//'gro ba de ltar snga nas shes//bdag ni yang dag ma yin zhing //sems can rang bzhin stong par mthong //kun tu
72b4(mdo sde): song ba'i chos mthong nas//bzod pa thob ste thang la gnas//gang du'ang 'jug pa ma yin te//gang nas kyang ni ldog med pa//de ni 'jug med ldog med de//thang la gnas pa'i bram ze'o//nam
72b5(mdo sde): zhig bsam pa mnyam pa yis//yang dag chos kyi dbyings la gnas//de tshe sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur lung ston//nam zhig bdag ni ji lta bar//de bzhin sangs
72b6(mdo sde): rgyas lung bstan dag/mthong ba'i dri ma bor ba ni//rgyal ba rnams kyi lung ston to//sgrib pa med pa'i dbyings gnas nas//de nas ma ngan 'das la spyod//snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid ni//
72b7(mdo sde): kun tu kha na ma tho med//byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gang //chos rnams yang dag brjod 'dod cing //yang dag chos brjod don gnyer de//yang dag chos brjod 'di bgrod do//sems
73a1(mdo sde): can chen po des tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa tho par gyur to//D+ha'o 'u ba cu na
73a2(mdo sde): chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go//bam po bzhi pa//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems pa chen po tsam pa mA~Md kyis
73a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par gnon la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas ni bden pa gces su bya ste/rigs kyi bu bden pa yang rig par brjod
73a4(mdo sde): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos yang dag par brjod pa'o//rigs kyi bu de la bden pa gang zhe na/gang byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyang
73a5(mdo sde): nas sems de srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi 'dor zhing sems can rnams la log par yang mi sgrub pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa'o//gang byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang
73a6(mdo sde): dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/phyis sems de 'dor zhing sems can thams cad la log par sgrub pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu smad pa'i 'ardzun du smra ba'o//smras pa/
73a7(mdo sde): ji ltar na bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/sems de phyis yongs su mi 'dor zhing sems can thams cad la log par mi sgrub pa yin/smras pa/nam
73b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sdug bsngal gyi bden pa shes shing /kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang /'bog pa'i bden pa dang /lam gyi bden pa shes pa na de sems de yongs su mi 'dor zhing sems can thams
73b2(mdo sde): cad la'ang log par mi sgrub pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' bden pa yongs su shes pa dang ldan pa ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir mi ldog go//smras pa/sdug bsngal ni
73b3(mdo sde): gang shes pa ni ji lta bu/smras pa/len pa'i phung po lnga rnams la yid du 'ong ba dang /yid du mi 'ong ba rnam par smin pa ni sdug bsngal te/'di na sdug bsngal zhes bya'o//nam sdug bsngal de
73b4(mdo sde): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /stong pa dang g.yo ba med pa dang /bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba shes pa 'di ni sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o//nem sdug bsngal de kun 'byung ba tsam dang /
73b5(mdo sde): rdzas med pa dang rdzas ma yin pa dang /snying po med pa dang bdag po med par mthong ba 'di ni kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o//nam sdug bsngal de sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang ma 'ongs/phyi ma'i mthar
73b6(mdo sde): yang mi 'pho//da ltar byung ba la'ang mi gnas te/thog ma med pa can yin la/rang bzhin gyis 'gags pas rang bzhin gyis stong pa/rang bzhin gyis dben par shes pa'i doni 'gog
73b7(mdo sde): pa shes pa zhes bya'o//smras pa/rigs kyi bu 'gog pa zhes bya ba 'di gang gi tshig bla dgas/smras pa/rigs kyi bu 'gog pa ni cir yang brjod par bya ba ma yin no//smras pa rigs kyi bu
74a1(mdo sde): gal te 'gog pa cir yang brjod par bya ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir 'gog pa zhes bya/smras pa/rigs kyi bu 'gog pa zhes bya ba ni glo bur gyi sgrib pa med pa/yang dag
74a2(mdo sde): pa ma yin pa yod pa ma yin pa/kun brtags pa ste/nam yang dag pa ma yin pa de la kun tu mi rtog pa de ni 'gog pa zhes bya'o//yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog par 'gag pa na chos gang
74a3(mdo sde): yang 'jig par mi 'gyur te/de'i phyir chos thams cad ni shin tu 'gags pa zhes bya'o//smras pa/rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'gog pa mngon
74a4(mdo sde): sum du mi byed do//byang chub sems dpa' gang 'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa de ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo zhes gsungs na/bcom ldan 'das kyis de ci las dgongs
74a5(mdo sde): te gsungs/smras pa/rigs kyi bu mngon sum du byed ces bya ba 'di ni bstan du med pa/mngon sum du mthong ba'i tshi ge bla dgas so//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'gog pa ni bstan du
74a6(mdo sde): med pa'i chos so zhes gsungs so//chos gang bstan du med pa de ni mngon sum du bya bar mi nus so//dri bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'gog pa mngon sum du mi byed
74a7(mdo sde): mi mthong ngo zhes gsungs te/de la dgongs nas byang chub sems dpa' ni 'gog pa mngon sum du mi byed do//nyan thos ni chos la mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i blos 'gog pa mngon sum du
74b1(mdo sde): byed do//gnas so//kun shes so zhes gsungs so//dmigs pa dang yid la byed pa gang dag gis 'di ltar shes/'di ltar mthong /'di ltar nges par byed pa 'di ni lam shes pa zhes bya'o//
74b2(mdo sde): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni ngar 'dzin pa'o//nga yir 'dzin pa de'i rgyu dang bcas pa gang 'byung ba 'di ni kun 'byung ba 'i bya'o//ni de'i 'byung ba'i chos gang yang so sor nges pa ma yin
74b3(mdo sde): par mthong ba 'di ni 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o//gang de ltar rnam par mthong zhing tshol ba 'di ni la me shes pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang rigs kyi bu gang snyems pa de ni sdug bsngal ba'o//
74b4(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyis snyoms pa'i rang bzhin ni sdug bsngal lo zhes gsungs so//snyems pa ni thams cad tu yang dag pa ma yin pa'o//de bas na snyems pa
74b5(mdo sde): kun 'byung ba ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o//sdug bsngal med pa ni 'gog pa'o//ye shes gang gi snyems pa de la mi snyems pa de ni lam mo//rigs kyi bu bdag gi bskal pa 'am/bskal pa
74b6(mdo sde): las lhag par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa shes pa bstan pa 'di'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus so//bden pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' drug stong gis bden pa
74b7(mdo sde): yongs su bsgoms pa phyir mi ldog pa'i sa khong du chud do//bar snang la gnas pa'i lha'i bu mo stong phrag bcu ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go/de nas
75a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa blu gas rnam par glanon gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa med la 'di skad ces smras so//na
75a2(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ni gang /dran pa ni gang /dran pa'i gnas ni gong /de skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa
75a3(mdo sde): med kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par gnon la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos thams cad la mi skye ba shes pa
75a4(mdo sde): dran pa yin no//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mi skye ba shes pa'i smon lam can yin te/de dag gi dran pa de'ang mo skye bo shes pas yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/thams cad tu mi bskyod
75a5(mdo sde): pa/drang ba/mi g.yo ba/gting dang 'gram mi rtogs pa/'jig rten pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes par dka' ba ste/byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa gang
75a6(mdo sde): gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa kun 'dzin pa'i dran pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mngon sum mo//byang chub sems
75a7(mdo sde): dpa'i dran po de ni 'di 'dra'o//byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa de'i gnas ni rnam pa bcu ste/lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /tshor ba dron pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /sems dran
75b1(mdo sde): ba nye bar bzhag pa dang /chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /chos rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /dge 'dun rjes su
75b2(mdo sde): dran pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /gtong ba rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /lha rjes su dran pI dran pa nye bar
75b3(mdo sde): bzhag pa ste/'di dag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bcu'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar lus 'di ni
75b4(mdo sde): sngon gyi mtha' nas ma 'ongs/phyi ma'i mthar mi 'phro//sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' la mi gnas te/gzhan du na yang dag pa ma yin pa/phyin ci log las byung ba/byed pa po dang tshor
75b5(mdo sde): be bo med pa/thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus med pa/rtsa ba gnas pa med pa/bdag po med pa/nga yi ba med pa/yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ste/tshogs zhes bya ba dang /lus zhes bya ba dang /
75b6(mdo sde): longs spyod ces bya ba dang /gnas zhes bya ba dang ro zhes bya ba dang /skye mched ces bya ba ni glo bur gyi tha snyad rnams kyis tha snyad tu btags pa'o//lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/pho ma'i khu
75b7(mdo sde): ba dang khra ga las byung ba/mi gtsang ba rul pa/rang bzhin gyis dri mo zhim pa/'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang 'jigs pa dang /sgyid lugs pa'i rkun pos dkrugs pa/
76a1(mdo sde): rtag tu 'jig pa/'brul ba/'brabrul ba/rnam par 'thor ba/rnam par 'dzojom pa'i chos can/nad tha dad pa brgya stong gi chang ngo snyam du lus la dran pa nye bar 'jog go//
76a2(mdo sde): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di ltar lus 'di ni rkang pa dang /rkang sor dang byin pa dang /ban+d+ha dang grung dang lte ba dang lta ba dang /spel tshigs dang snying dang rtsib logs
76a3(mdo sde): dang rtsib ma dang /lag pa'i thul mo dang dpung pa dang /thal gong dang mgrin pa dang /'gram pa dang bral ba dang mgo'i thod pa 'dus pa tsam ste/las 'byung ba'i byed pas bsags pa/nyon
76a4(mdo sde): mongs pa dang /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /kun tu rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa tha dad pa brgya stong gi gnas so//'di ni rdzus mang po 'dus pa 'di lta ste/sgra dang spu dang sen mo dang so dang
76a5(mdo sde): rus pa dang pags pa dang /sha dang lus dang rgyus pa dang tshil dang zhag dang chu ser dang mtsher ba dang /gcin dang phyis dang pho ba dang long ka dang /khrag dang ngar snabs dang mkhris pa dang
76a6(mdo sde): brnyagA dang /mchil ma dang kla pa dang /klung rgyas rnams te/de ltar rdzas mang po 'dus pa yin na/de la lus zhes ji skad du bya sgyum du lus la dran pa nye bar 'jog go//nges sor rtog pa
76a7(mdo sde): na 'di snyam du sems te/lus 'di ni na mkha' dang mtshungs so snyam nas de lus la na mkha' ltar dran pa nye bar 'jog go//de thams cad na mkha' ltar mthong ngo //de lus yongs su
76b1(mdo sde): shes par bya ba las gang la'ang dran pa mi 'jug go/mi ldog go/mi 'jug mi ldog pas dran pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o//de ltar dran pa la gnas pa ni 'di ltar lus ji lta ba byang chub kyang de bzhin
76b2(mdo sde): du shes te/'di la thogs par bya ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang du thogs pa de thams cad ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' lus dran po nye bar bzhag
76b3(mdo sde): pa zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/tshor ba zhes bya ba ni khong du chud pa ste/rigs
76b4(mdo sde): pa de'ang phyin ci log dang /phyin ci ma log pa dang /de gnyi ga lnga rnam par grol ba'o snyam mo//de la byis pa so so'i skye bo sems g.yengs pa phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams kyi tshor ba ni phyin
76b5(mdo sde): ci log ste/de dag ni mi rtag pa la rtag par tsher ro//sdug bsngal ba la bde bar tshor ro//bdag med pa la bdag tu tshor ro//mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar tshor te/'di na phyin ci log gi tshor
76b6(mdo sde): ba'o//gang mi rtag pa la mi rtag par tshor ba dang /sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal du tshor ba dang bdag med pa la bdag med par tshor ba dang mi gtsang ba la mi gtsang bar tshar ba 'di ni nyan thos rnams
76b7(mdo sde): kyi tshor ba'o//gang mi rtag pa la mi rtag pa dang mi rtag pa yang ma yin par tshe rare ba dang /sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba'ang ma yin par tshor ba dang /bdag med pa la
77a1(mdo sde): /bdag med pa dang bdag me pa'ang ma yin par tshor ba dang /myun bu m-ig nga byu dang mig nang 'ang ma yin pa rgyu ba na nga chu sa sa rna
77a2(mdo sde): kyitshor ba'o//byang chub sems dpa' de ltar tshor ba ni tshar ba po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //de mi mthong bas tshor ba'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de 'di skyem du sargyas te/
77a3(mdo sde): ldan 'dus kyis kyang 'dres byas thams cad ni tshor ba'o zhes gsungs so//gal te 'dus byas thams cad tshor ba yin na ni 'di la tshor ba po zhes bya ba ci zhig yang /tshor ba ni tshor bar byed pa ma
77a4(mdo sde): yin/tshor bar byu ba dang /tshor ba dang /tshor bar byed pa ma yin/'dus ma byas spyo 'dus byas tshor bar byed pa ma yin/'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas las rnam par grol ba'i tshor bar
77a5(mdo sde): byed pa gang yang med de/de ltar tshor ba de dag tshor ba med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //'odi la tsher bas rdol ba gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/byang chub ji lta ba
77a6(mdo sde): tshor ba'ang de bzhin du yang dag par rjes su mthong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang
77a7(mdo sde): zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/gang tshe ba de ni sems tsam mo//sems de'ang gnas pa med pa/gzung ba med pa/lus med pa'o//gang gnas med pa/gzung
77b1(mdo sde): ba med pa/lus med pa de'i gnas ji lta bu zhig yod snyam mo//sems kyi sems mi shes so//sems kyi sems mi mthong ngo //gang la brten nas byung ba'i sems de'ang gzhan la rag las pa/rang
77b2(mdo sde): dbang med par mthong ngo //sems ma gtogs par byang chub kyang mi shes so//de la byang chub sems tsam du shes pas sems la dbang thob bo//de sems la dbang bas theg pa chen po la dbang byed pa dang
77b3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la'ang sems snyoms pa dang /theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa yin te/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zhes bya'o//de la byang
77b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'am/mi dge ba 'am/kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/kho na ma tho ba med pa
77b5(mdo sde): 'am zag pa dang bcas pa'am/zag pa med pa 'am/'jig rten pa'am/'jig rten las 'das pa'am/nyan thos kyi chos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/so so'i skye bo'i chos sam/
77b6(mdo sde): chos gang dang gang la dran pa nye bar 'jog pa'i chos de shin tu bzung ba/shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/shin tu bsags pa'am/shin tu chud pa rang gi kha na las pa/shin tu dbang byed
77b7(mdo sde): nga'i dran pa des skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa mnyam par byed de/gang skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa las rnam par grol ba dang /gang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las rnam pa'o
78a1(mdo sde): grol ba dang /gang stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa las rnam par grol ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de 'di snyam du sems te/
78a2(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa ste/dben pa'i rang bzhin can/chos thams cad ni bdag med pa ste/gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin can/chos thams cad ni sgrib pa med pa ste/na mkha'i
78a3(mdo sde): rang bzhin can/chos thams cad ni rnam par mi rtog pa ste/sems dang /yid dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/chos thams cad ni rnam par grol ba'i ngo bo nyid de/nyon mongs
78a4(mdo sde): ba med pa'i rang bzhin can/chos thams cad ni smra ba med pa ste/brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin can/chos thams cad ni yi ge med pa ste/'dus ma byas pa'i rang bzhin can/chos
78a5(mdo sde): thams cad ni grangs med pa ste/grangs thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/chos thams cad ni drang ba ste/spros pa thams cad las shin tu 'anges po/chos thams cad ni sa bon med
78a6(mdo sde): bya'i phyir rtsu ba med pa/chos thams cad ni rtsa ba rnam par byung ba'i phyir skyon med bya/chos thams nad ni lus med pa'i phyir 'ongs pa med pa/chos thams cad ni gnas pa med pa'i phyir
78a7(mdo sde): song po med pa/chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi stong pa'i phyir chags pa med pa/chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir stong pa chos thams cad ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir/
78b1(mdo sde): nges par byung ba/chos thams cad ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin khong du chud pa'i phyir rang gi kha na las pa/chos thams cad ni shes bya'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir byang chub pa/chos thams cad ni rdzas med
78b2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ming tsam pa/chos thams cad ni bstan du med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir lto ba dang bral ba/chos thams cad ni lus med pa'i phyir bcings pa med pa/chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir grol
78b3(mdo sde): bamed pa/chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi bo nyid kyi phyir thibs po med pa/chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i phyir dbyings gcig pa/chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang
78b4(mdo sde): mnyam pa'i phyir tha mi dad do snyam du de ltar chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so//de ltar chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can tha dad du mi byed/chos
78b5(mdo sde): tha dad du mi byed/theg pa tha dad du mi byed/sangs rgyas tha dad du mi byed/sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad du mi byed/tha ma dang /mchog dang /bcings pa dang /thar pa dang /'khor ba dang /mya ngan
78b6(mdo sde): las 'das pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /spong ba med/'dzin pa med/'jug pa med/ldog pa med/len pa med/'dor ba med de/mi g.yo ba thob cing gnas pa yin te/byang chub
78b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba la gnas pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gzigs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
79a1(mdo sde): /byang chub tu lung ston te/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa/
79a2(mdo sde): gang zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom ste/sems can thams cad mngon sum du byas nas bdag kyang sems can thams cad
79a3(mdo sde): kyi ched du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrub bo//'di ltar gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi de
79a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag gis bsgrub par bya'o snyam du dran pa nye bar 'jog go//dran pa des
79a5(mdo sde): gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dran pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa/'od gsal ba/bag la nyal ba mid po/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba
79a6(mdo sde): thams cad yang dag par chad pa/ye shes sngon du 'gro ba/ye shes kyi dbang du gyur pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang du gyur pa/chos kyi dbang du gyur pa/lha'i dbang du gyur pa/
79a7(mdo sde): nges par gyur pa thams cad thob pa/shes bya'i sgrib pa'i dri ma med pa/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi rtogs pa/rang bzhin gyis rnam par mi rtog pa/lhun gyi
79b1(mdo sde): grub pa/mthu sgrib pa med pa/thog pa med par gnas pa/sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rgyas par byed pa/na mkha' ltar 'gyur ba med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rjes su dran pa de dag rjes su
79b2(mdo sde): dran no//dran po rin po che sangs rgyas rnams kyi nor/sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzod de dag rjes su dran to/de'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o//sangs rgyas dran pa'ang ma yin/mi dran pa
79b3(mdo sde): pa'ang ma yin par thams cad du lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog pa'i dran pa de dag rjes su dran te/de'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o//sangs rgyas ni sems can dang chos la tha
79b4(mdo sde): dad pa'i 'du shes mi mnga' ba ste/de dag gi dran pa rjes su dran pas de'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o//sangs rgyas ni mi rtog par mi rtog/mi len mi 'dor mi 'khor yongs su
79b5(mdo sde): mya ngan las mi 'da'/mi skye mi 'gag pa ste/de dag rjes su dran nas/de'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das rnams ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
79b6(mdo sde): tshogs chen po mnga' ba/byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po'i spyod yul can/sems can gyi phung po chen po'i skyabs su gyur pa/mgon du gyur pa/sman pa chen po zug rngu 'byin pa/
79b7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa/rtag tu ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul ba/'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'ongs pa las rnam par grol po/nyon mongs pa dang /shes bya'o sgrib pa
80a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/sems can chen po'i gnas sems can chen po'i rten/rnam par 'dren pa/chos kyi sku spyod yul ba/thams cad du khong khro ba med
80a2(mdo sde): pa'i sems dang ldan pa/rtag tu sems can gyi don la dgyes pa/sku dang /gsung dang /thugs rgya che ba/phyed par lung ston pa/sku dang /gsung dang /thugs kyi phrin las kyi mtha' kha
80a3(mdo sde): na ma tho ba med pa/bag chags dang bcas pa'i 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dkrugs pa/bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa/rtsod pa med pa'i chos kyi mchog dang
80a4(mdo sde): ldan pa/rgya mtsho thams cad pas ches zab pa/ri rab thams cad pas tshis mtho ba/sa bas chos bstan pa/chu bas ches mnyen pa/me bas ches 'bar ba/rlung bas ches chags pa
80a5(mdo sde): med pa/nam mkha' bas ches dri ma med pa/yid kyi 'gro ba bas ches mgyogs pa/yid bzhin gyi nor bu bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa/thams cad mkhyen pa/sems can thams
80a6(mdo sde): cad la mtshungs par sbyor ba/chags pa thams cad dang bral ba/sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa'i rgyun ma bcad pa/gzugs tshad med pa/sgra tshad med pa/yon tan
80a7(mdo sde): tshad med pa/yul tshad med pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/sems dang /yid dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul las yang
80b1(mdo sde): dag par 'das pa/rig pa dang zhabs kyi sems dang ldan pa/lam gsum gyi sdig pa rnams yang dag par chad pa/snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can/sems can thams cad dang
80b2(mdo sde): thun mong ba'i yon tan can/sems can thams cad kyi pha ma lta bur gyur pa/dgra can zin la sems snyoms pa/ste'u dang tsan+dan du mtshungs pa/sems can tha ma dang /'bring dang
80b3(mdo sde): mchog thams cad la thams cad rtag tu gsal bar byed pa'i chos can/pha rol dpag par dka' ba sems can chen po/longs spyod chen po/rig pa drang zhabs su ldan pa chen po/
80b4(mdo sde): chos gsung ba chen po/'dul ba gsung ba chen po/skyes bu chen po/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa/'jig rten thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/'jig rten thams cad kyi
80b5(mdo sde): snang bar gyur pa/rnal 'byor chen po la rnal 'byor pa/bsam gtan chen po spyod yul ba/rnam par grol ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa/bdag nyid che ba/skye bo chen po'i zham ring ba dang
80b6(mdo sde): ldan pa/skye bo khyad par can gyi zham ring ba ldan pa/lta ba dang /nyan pa dang /ston pa dang /bsnyen bkur byed pa mi ldog pa/bdag bde ba la mi lta ba/gzhon gyi sdug bsngal zhi bar
80b7(mdo sde): byid pa la dgyes pa/chos la gzhol ba/chos kyi nor can/chos kyi zas can/chos kyi sman can/chos kyi gtere can/chos kyi dbang phyug/chos kyi bdag po/chos kyi
81a1(mdo sde): sbyin bdag/rtag tu gtong ba la mngon par dgyes pa/rtag tu bag yod pa/rtag tu dben pa la mngon par dgyes pa/thams cad du stegs dang /zam par gyur pa/
81a2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i lam chen po dang nyi ma chen po dang 'dra ba/tshangs pa chen po dang 'dra ba dang /ye shes chen po'i rdo rje 'chang ba/chos chen pos dbugs 'byin pa/gzugs lta bas mi
81a3(mdo sde): ngoms pa/mthong bas mi ngoms pa ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag de ltar rjes su dran no//de ltar de dag rjes su dran pas de dag gi yon tan yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir
81a4(mdo sde): sbyor ro//dran pa nye bar 'jog go/brtson 'grus brtsom mo//de'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i dran po nye bar bzhag
81a5(mdo sde): bo zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
81a6(mdo sde): 'das de dag ni yon tan mtha' yas mu med pa ste/de dag ni chos las skyes pa chos kyi bgro skal la spyod pa/chos kyis sprul pa/chos bdag por gyur pa/chos las byung ba/chos kyi spyod
81a7(mdo sde): yul/chos la rtor ba/chos kyi sa grub pa ste/gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po de dag kyang chos las skyes pa/chos kyis rnyed pa/chos kyis grub
81b1(mdo sde): pa'o//gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag kyang chos las skyes pa/chos kyi rnyed pa/chos kyis grub pa'o//gang de bzhin
81b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag kyang chos las skyes pa/chos kyi rnyed pa/chos kyis grub pa'o//gang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde
81b3(mdo sde): ba yod pa de dag kyang chos las skyes pa/chos kyis rnyed pa/chos kyis grub pa'o//de lta bso na bdag sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tshol bas chos gtso bor bya'o//chos spyod yul ba dang /chos la rton pa
81b4(mdo sde): dang /chos la gzhol ba dang /chos snying por byed pa dang /chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos bsgrub par bya'o snyam po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
81b5(mdo sde): zhes bya'o//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/chos ni sems can thams cad la mnyam par 'jog pas chos ni tha ma dang /'bring dang rab mthong nas 'jug pa ma yin
81b6(mdo sde): te/de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o//gnas ni phyogs su ma lhung bas chos ni ngo bor lta zhing 'jug pa ma yin te/de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems bya'o//
81b7(mdo sde): chos ni dus chad pa med pa 'di mthong la yod pa rang gis rig pas chos ni dus la lta zhing 'jug pa ma yin te/de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o//chos ni mtho
82a1(mdo sde): dma' med pas chos ni rgya chen po la 'jug pa ma yin/dman pa la 'jug pa ma yin te/de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang mthun pa'i sems su bya'o//chos ni mchog dang tha ma
82a2(mdo sde): dang bral bas chos ni rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa'ang ma yAn/nyams pa la 'jug pa'ang ma yin te/de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o//chos ni zhing dang zhing ma yin pa'i
82a3(mdo sde): lta ba dang bral bas chos ni 'phags pa la 'jug pa'ang ma yin so so'i skye bo la 'jug pa'ang ma yin te/de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o//chos ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang
82a4(mdo sde): par 'jug pas chos ni nyin mo 'jug pa ma yin/mtshan mo 'jug pa ma yin/mtshan mo 'jug la nyin mo ni 'jug pa ma yin te/de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o//
82a5(mdo sde): chos ni gang la'ang nam yang sdod pa ma yin pas chos ni 'dul ba'i dus las kyang mi 'dra' ste/de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o//chos ni thams cad du 'dod pa med pas
82a6(mdo sde): chos ni sdang ba rnams la zhe 'gras pa'ang med dad pa rnams la rjes su tshogs pa'ang med de/de ltar bdug gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o//chos ni dri ba 'ang ma yI naM/gang ba'ang ma
82a7(mdo sde): yin te/dpag tu med/grangs med pas na mkha' ltar 'bri ba'ang ma yin/'phel ba'ang ma yin te/de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o//chos ni sems can rnams
82b1(mdo sde): kyis bsrung ba ma yin gyi chos kyis sems can rnams bsrung ste/de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o//chos ni skyabs yongs su tshol ba ma yin pas chos ni 'jig rten thams cad
82b2(mdo sde): kyi skyabs yin te/de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o//chos ni thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid pas chos ni gong la'ang thogs pa med de/de ltar bdag gis kyang ches dang 'dra
82b3(mdo sde): ba sems su bya'o//chos ni bag la nyal med pas bag la nyal la mi 'jug ste/de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o//chos ni rtag tu rnam par mi rtog pas chos ni
82b4(mdo sde): 'khor bas 'jogs skrag pa'ang ma yin/mya ngan las 'das pa la rjes su chags pa'ang ma yin te/de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o snyam mo//de ltar na byang chub
82b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos la chos ltar dran pa nye bar 'jog pas de'i phyir chos rjes su dran pa zhes bya ste/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zhes bya'o//
82b6(mdo sde): de la byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang zhe na/'odi la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/dge 'dun ni chos smra ba/chos spyod pa/chos sems pa
82b7(mdo sde): chos kyi zhing /chos 'dzin pa/chos rton pa/chos la mchod pa/chos kyi bya ba byed pa/chos spyod yul ba/chos spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa/rang bzhin gyis drang ba/rang bzhin gyis dang ba/sI
83a1(mdo sde): rje ba'i chos can/snying rje dang ldan pa/rtag tu dben pa spyod yul ba/rtag tu chos la gzhol ba/rtag tu dkar po spyod pa'o snyam mo//gzhan yang byang chub sems
83a2(mdo sde): dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun rnam pa du mar gsungs pa ni 'di lta ste/kun rdzob kyi dge 'dun dang /don dam po'i dge 'dun dang /ngo tsha shes pa'i dge 'dun dang /
83a3(mdo sde): ngo tsha med pa'i dge 'dun dang /'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang /cang shes kyi dge 'dun dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun no snyam mo//de la byang chub sems dpa' ni kun rdzob kyi dge 'dun bsdu
83a4(mdo sde): ba'i phyir nan tan byed do//don dam pa'i dge 'dun la bsten pa'i phyir nan tan byed do//ngo tsha shes pa'i dge 'dun rnam par thar bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed do//ngo tsha med pa'i dge 'dun
83a5(mdo sde): yongs su gdul ba'i phyir nan tan byed do//'phags pa'i dge 'dun la mchod cing bsti bstang bya ba'i phyir nan ta ni byed do//cang shis kyi dge 'dun lo sangs rgyas bzhin du nan tan
83a6(mdo sde): byed do//phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la chos kyi gtam gyi phyir nan tan byed do//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/rigs 'dzin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sras
83a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi dge 'dun no//yid du 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rab tu sbyin pa'i phyir zhing bzang po rnams kyi dge 'dun no//gnas ngan len dang bral ba'i phyir 'jigs pa med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no//
83b1(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin pa gtong zhing 'dor ba'i phyir snyems rnam par grol ba rnams kyi dge 'dun no//shin tu dul ba'i phyir cang shes pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no//ma 'dres pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa med
83b2(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no//sdig pa dang bral ba'i phyir ngo tsha shes pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no//bka' blo bde ba'i phyir skyob ma rnams kyi dge 'dun no//bdag yongs su shes pa dang ldan pa'i phyir bdag
83b3(mdo sde): gi bi med pa rnams kyi dge 'dren no//zhi ba'i phyir rgyags pa med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no//'dod pa nyung ba'i phyir phyin ci ma log pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no//rnam par rtog pa yang dag par chud
83b4(mdo sde): pa'i phyir nad med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no//pha rol tu son pa'i phyir theng la gnas pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no//thong la gnas pa'i phyir bde ba thob pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no//de kho na mthong ba'i phyi
83b5(mdo sde): bag yod pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no//skyon ma chags pa'i phyir dgon pa pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no//rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub la gzhol ba rnams kyi dge 'dun no//bslab pa gsum gyis bya ba
83b6(mdo sde): shes par bya ba'i phyir bslab pa 'dod po rnams kyi dge 'dun no//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa spyod yul ba'i phyir dran pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no//yang dag par spong ba spyod yul ba'i phyir
83b7(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa spyod yul ba'i phyir ngol ba med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no//dbang po spyod yul ba'i phyir mi phyed pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no//
84a1(mdo sde): stobs spyod yul pa'i phyir tsher ma dkrugs pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no//byang chub kyi yan lag spyod yul ba'i phyir bsgrib pa med pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no//lam spyod yul
84a2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir yang dag par lto ba rnams kyi dge 'dun no//bden pa spyod yul ba'i phyir 'phags pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no//bsam gtan spyod yul ba'i phyir mnyam par bzhag pa rnams kyi
84a3(mdo sde): dge 'dun no//rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba spyod yul ba'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba rnams kyi dge 'dun no//snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi
84a4(mdo sde): dge 'dun no//bsod nams thams cad kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi dge 'dun no snyam mo//de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dge 'dun rjes
84a5(mdo sde): su dran pas 'di snyam du sems te/gang dge 'dun gyi yang dag pa'i yon tan de dag ni bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis kyang bsgrub par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
84a6(mdo sde): dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang zhe na/'di la byang chub sems
84a7(mdo sde): dpa'i 'di snyam du sems te/gang 'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni tshul khrims las byung bar blta'o///
84b1(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa de dag thams cad kyi gnas yin no//'di lta ste/dper na sa ni sman dang /rtswa dang /nabs tshal thams cad kyi gnas yin no//de bzhin du tshul
84b2(mdo sde): khrims kyang phun sum tshogs pa de dag thams cad kyi gnas yin no//byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi gnas la rab tu gnas pa ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas yin no//
84b3(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i chos yongs su rdzogs par yang byed do//tshul khrims kyi gnas la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dga' ba skye'o//yid dga' bas 'gyod pa med do//'gyod pa med pas
84b4(mdo sde): mchog tu dga' ba 'thob bo//mchog tu dga' bas lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ro//lus dang sems shin tu sbyongs pas bde ste ting nge 'dzin thob bo//yid mnyam par bzhag
84b5(mdo sde): pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba yin no//yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la snying rje chen po 'jug go snyam mo//de ltar 'di
84b6(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/bdag gis sems can thams cad la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di dang /chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba bsgrub par bya'o snyam mo//de snying rje chen po
84b7(mdo sde): des bskul bas lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang /lhag pa'i sems dang /lhag pa'i shes rab la bslab pa yongs su rdzogs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
85a1(mdo sde): rdus dun rlu // byas na bdag gis kyang tshul khams su gnas pa mi bskyod pa ma spyod par bya'o//skyen sa can pam sa nang mngon du byas nas rgyal
85a2(mdo sde): khrims bsrung bar bya'o snyam mo//de ci'i phyir zhen/byang chub sems dnga'i tshul khrims de ni sems can rnams cad la phran pa dang /bde bu'i gnas la mi gnas pa myi yin no//gzhan
85a3(mdo sde): yang byang chub semos dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'byung ba'i tshul khrims ni gnod sems med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//byang chub sems
85a4(mdo sde): dpa'i rab tu byung ba'i tshul khrims ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba rdzogs par byed do//byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dang sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims ni
85a5(mdo sde): mra dang /ga dang /sems yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//byang chub sems dpa'i nges par sems pa'i tshul khrims ni mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs
85a6(mdo sde): nga //byang chub sems dpa'i nang du yid dag 'jog pa'i tshul khrims ni byang rdzob kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyan po'i tshul
85a7(mdo sde): dri mas ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//byang chub sems dpa' thos pa yongs su tshol ba'i tshul khrims ni ngo rgyal med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
85b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i tshul khrims ni yon tan gyi chos thams cad chud mi za ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do//byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin
85b2(mdo sde): pa'i tshul khrims ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed do//byang chub sems dpa'i ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams ston pa'i tshul khrims ni chos sba ba nyid yongs su rdzogs par
85b3(mdo sde): byed do//byang chub sems dpa'i ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sems dpa'i tshul khrims ni gzungs dang spobs pa thob pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi
85b4(mdo sde): tshul khrims ni skye ba thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do//byang chub sems dpa'i sems can thams cad la khang khro ba med pa'i tshul khrims ni byang chub kyi sems
85b5(mdo sde): chud mi za bar yongs su rdzogs par byed do//byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems chud mi za ba'i tshul khrims ni dkon mchog gsum chud mi za ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do snyam mo//de'ang
85b6(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/tshul khrims bsrungs pas bsrung ba thams cad bsrungs pa yin no snyam pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag
85b7(mdo sde): ba zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/gang ci gtong ba de thams cad ni 'di
86a1(mdo sde): lha ste zang zing gi gtong ba dang /chos kyi gtong ba dang /gtong ba rnam pa gnyis kyi nang du 'dus so snyam mo//de la zang zing gi gtong bas ni byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan dang /
86a2(mdo sde): dpe byad bzang po yongs su skong ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par byed pa rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//chos kyi stong pas ni
86a3(mdo sde): stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do//bag chags kyang yang dag par 'joms par byed do//gzhan yang
86a4(mdo sde): zang zing gi gtong bas ni phung po thams cad nges par 'dor bar byed do//chos kyi gtong bas ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa las yang dag par 'da'o//gzhan yang zang
86a5(mdo sde): zing gi gtong bas ni skye ba'i lus yongs su sbyong bar byed do//chos kyi gtong bas ni chos kyi sku yongs su sbyong bar byed do//gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
86a6(mdo sde): po zang zing gi gtong poswa ni phra ma las byung ba'i stobs sgrub par byed de/skyobs de ni de bzhi ni gshegs pa dang /sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma gtogs par su
86a7(mdo sde): la'ang med do//chos kyi gtong bas ni rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs sgrub par byed do/stobs de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang /sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma gtogs
86b1(mdo sde): par su la'ang med do//gzhan yang zang zing gi gtong bas ni yongs su smyin par byed do//chos kyi gtong bas ni rnam par thar bar byed do//gzhan yang zang zing gi gtong bas ni tshogs bsogs so//
86b2(mdo sde): chos kyi gtong bas ni sbrul lo//gzhan yang zang zing gi gtong bas ni nor yongasu gtong ngo //chos kyi gtong bas ni thams cad gtong ngo //gzhan yang zang zing gi gtong bas ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa
86b3(mdo sde): las rnam par grol ba sgrub par byed do//chos kyi gtong bas ni shes bya'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba sgrub par byed do//gzhan yang gtong ba gtong ba zhes bya ba 'di ni yongs su rtog pa gtang ba'i
86b4(mdo sde): tshig bla dgas so//'di lta ste/yongs su rtog pa gtong ba de ni gtong ba rnams kyi dam pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/yongs su rtog pa btang bas byang chub sems dpa' dag pa zhes bya'o//smras pa/
86b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu yongs su rtog pa zhes bya ba 'di gang gi tshig bla dgas smras pa/rigs kyi bu yongs su rtog pa zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin zhing med pa las sgro btags pa'i tshig bla dgas so///
86b6(mdo sde): smras pa/ji ltar na yang dag pa ma yin zhing med pa las sgro btags pa yin smras pa/nam 'di ltar bdag ni chags pa/bdag ni zhe sdang ba bdag ni gti mug pa/bdag ni nyon mongs pa/
86b7(mdo sde): bdag ni rnam par dag pa/bdag ni bcings pa/bdag ni grol ba bdag ni 'khor ba/bdag ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o snyam pa la sogs par sgro btags pa thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin zhing
87a1(mdo sde): med pa las yongs su brtags pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di dag thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen nam ste/'di la bdag dang bdag gi med/sems can med/srog med/
87a2(mdo sde): grang zag med/shes lus skyes med/shed bu med do//rgyu dang rkyen de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa/rang bzhin gyis dben pa/sems dang yid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/mi
87a3(mdo sde): sems pa/yongs su mi rtog pa/kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin pa/rnam par byang ba ma yin pa/'khor ba ma yin pa/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'o//de la byang chub sems
87a4(mdo sde): dpa' yod pa ma yin pa la sgro mi 'dogs shing /nga sgro 'dogs pa btang bas gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya'o//nam chos de dag rjes su dran pa de ni de'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa zhes
87a5(mdo sde): bya'o//gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtong ba rnam pa gsum ste/gtong ba dang gtong ba chen po dang /shin tu gtong ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams
87a6(mdo sde): kyi gtong ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza' ba sbyin pa dang /gtung ba dang gzhon pa dang /gos dang mar me dang /bdug spos dang spros dang phreng ba dang /byug pa dang
87a7(mdo sde): bye ma dang gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshon dang /ba dan dang /shing rta dang rgyan la sogs pa sbyin pa ste/sbyin pa gang sems can rnams la gnod pa dang /phongs par 'gyur ba de ma gto
87b1(mdo sde): par byang chub sems dpa' dag sems can rnams la mi sbyin pa gang yang med de/'dri ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtong ba zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtong ba chen po gang
87b2(mdo sde): zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba phun sum tshogs nas gtong ba chen po byed de/'di lta ste/chung ma dang bu dang bu mo dang /yid du 'ong ba'i bran po dang bran mo dang /las byed pa dang /zho shas
87b3(mdo sde): ba dang khyim dang /rgyal srid rnams yongs su gtong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba chen po zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shin tu gtong ba gang zhe na/'di la byang chub
87b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' gtong ba dang gtong ba chen po phun sum tshogs nas shin tu gtong ba byed de/'di lta ste/log pa dang /rkang pa dang rna ba dang sna dang sha dang rus pa dang /pags pa dang mig dang lce dang
87b5(mdo sde): mgo rus dang rkang la sogs pa yongs su gtong ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shin tu gtong ba zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' des gtong ba dang /gtong ba chen po dang shin tu
87b6(mdo sde): gtong ba de dag rjes su dran nas/bdag gis kyang dran pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam pa de ni de'i gtong ba rjes su dron pa zhes bya ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba rjes su dran
87b7(mdo sde): ba'i dren pa nye bar bzhag pa zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'i lha rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gang rnam par dag pa'i lha/
88a1(mdo sde): nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag rjes su dran no//'di ltar de dag rjes su dran te/bsgrub pa/
88a2(mdo sde): dang yon tan dang /skye ba dang longs spyod dang /kun spyod pa dang rtsom pa dang /rab tu 'thob pa dang yongs su 'grub pas kyang rjes su dran pa 'di ni lha rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zhes
88a3(mdo sde): bya'o//gang lha gzhan de dag kyang rjes su dran no//'di ltar de dag rjes su dran te lha 'di dag ni las dge ba'i 'bras bu las byung ba'o//dge ba'i las de dag ni 'di lta ste/dge ba bcu'i las
88a4(mdo sde): kyi lam mi dge ba las bzlog pa rnams so//de la lha gang rnams kha dog dang ldan pa/bde ba mang ba/dbang po tshim pa de dag thams cad ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi rnam par smin
88a5(mdo sde): pa'o snyam ste/de la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i bde ba de la rjes su yi rang nas sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
88a6(mdo sde): bsngo'o//lha'i bde ba de'ang sems can thams cad kyir 'dod do//bde ba de sems can thams cad kyir 'dod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus chen po
88a7(mdo sde): tsom mo//ngan song rnams su skyes pa'i sems can dag la snying rje chen po brnyed de/de 'di snyam du bdag gis 'di ltar sems can thams cad lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba'i las
88b1(mdo sde): byed du bzud do//sems can gang dag lhar gyur pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o//gang gis sems can rnams lha'i bde ba thob
88b2(mdo sde): nas phyis nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /bde bar gyur nas 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs po'i nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba'i bde ba thob par 'gyur ba'i las de dag sems cin rnams byed du gzhug/
88b3(mdo sde): snyam du sems pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lha rjes su dran pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zhes bya ste/rigs kyi bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bcu'o//
88b4(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med kyis de'i tshe don de nyid tshigs su bcad pa dag gis smras pa/gang phyir sdug bsngal ma gtogs par//stong pa nyid ni mi
88b5(mdo sde): dmigs pas//sdug bsngal sdug bsngal mi lta ste//sdug bsngal stong par blta bar bya//stong pa nyid ni lta 'dod pas//sdug bsngal yang dag blte bar bya//sdug bsngal stong pa nyid kyi don//
88b6(mdo sde): stong pa de ni 'dus ma byis//sdug bsngal byas pa ma yin pas//sdug bsngal la ni byed pa med//sdug bsngal bral ba'i byed pa po//ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//gal te sdug bsngal yang dag tu///
88b7(mdo sde): kun nas sgrib pa med gyur te//gal te sdug bsngal byas min na//'di la kun 'byung ga la yod//sdug bsngal la ni 'od med de//gang du yang ni 'gro min na//gang gis de yi chags 'byung ba//sdug
89a1(mdo sde): bsngal med na ga la yod//gal te sdug bsngal kun 'byung ste//srid pa kun 'byung bshad na ni//sred can sred yod ma yin na//med na kun 'byung ji ltar 'gyur//sdug bsngal la/
89a2(mdo sde): ni 'ong med de//'ong ba med na ci zhig 'gro//'od dang 'gro ba med par ni//'gog pa zhi ba zhes bstan to//chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis zhi//rtsa ba dag cing 'od kyang gsal//'gog po dang ni
89a3(mdo sde): chos rnams mtshungs//thams cad mtha' gnyis rab tu spangs//sngon du skyes pa'i chos rnams kyang //de ma thag tu 'gag par 'gyur//'gag pa med par skye ba med//skye ba med par zad pa
89a4(mdo sde): med//de ltar gang gi blo tshol ba//de ni chags med zad med lam//lam no gzings dang 'dra bar bstan//mdor na gzings ni spang bar bya//gang bsags spang bor bya ba yi//chos de la ni ci
89a5(mdo sde): zhig dga'//lam spangs thad la gnas pa de//rnal 'byor pa ni grol zhes brjod//des ni lam gyi ye shes kyis//gang phyir chos kun bsgoms pas na//grol ba'i mtshan nyid rab
89a6(mdo sde): bstan pa//dri ni gang du'ang rtsod pa med//skra dang ba spu sen mo so//shi dang rus pa khrag dang zhag/tshil dang shas rgyas phyi sa dang //khris pa bad kan klad pa dang //mcher pa rgyus pa gnya
89a7(mdo sde): ma dang //gcin gyi phung po lus zhes brjod//rnal 'byor pas ni lus rnams la//yod min kun brtags tsam du mthong //'di la byed dang tshor ba dang //mthong ba po ni gang yang med//lus
89b1(mdo sde): zhes bya bar rang bzhin gyis//glong stong dang ni 'dra ba'o//tshor ba myong bar rab bstan pa//tshor ba po las tshor ba gzhan//gung na yod pa mA yin na//gang gis de ni myong bar 'gyur//byang chub ci 'drang
89b2(mdo sde): bzhin du//zhi zhing dag la 'od gsal bar//tshor ba 'di la mkhas rnams kyis//dran pa de la nye bar bzhag/lus la sems ni mi mthong ste//sems la yang ni sems de bzhin//de ltar
89b3(mdo sde): shes nas 'khrug pa med//grol ba po ni dga' ba'ang med//sems tsam du ni rab mthong ste//kun tu rtog pa kun spangs kyang //sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul can//rnal 'byor gtong ba'ang ma yin
89b4(mdo sde): no||chos rnams rang 'byung ma yin te//gang gis kyang ni bsgrubs pa med//grangs med cing ni yi ge med//da ni na mkha' 'dra ba'i mtshan//chos 'di rtogs par khong chud nas//chos shes
89b5(mdo sde): pa yi rnal 'byor can//mnyam pa nyid la rab gnas pa//'jug pa med cing ldog pa'ang med//gang gis chos dran 'di 'dra ste//thams cad chos las mi g.yo ba//de dag pha rol phyin pa brtan//
89b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bstan la sbyin pa sbyong //sangs rgyas don rnams kun la mkhas//sgrib pa kun gyi dri ma med//dkar po thams cad yang dag spyod//sems can kun la phan par bzhed//rigs
89b7(mdo sde): dang gzugs dang yon tan las//rdzogs pa'i byang chub mkhas pa gang //yang dag dran pa de dag ni//dkar po'i chos kyis rab tu rgyas//gang zhig rtag tu mnyam bzhag cing //chos la
90a1(mdo sde): /dran pa mig / ni 'das dang m+b+ha 'das pa'o//ngas rgyas thams cad mnyes par gyu//dam pa 'a mas la brtan chas can//sa rjes dran paskyed yul ba//byu chu
90a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' brtul zhugs brtan//rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par 'gyur//chos rnams cikyi 'dra de bzhin du//dag 'gyur snyam du gang dranA pa/byang chub sems dpa' mnyam bzhig ngas/ma
90a3(mdo sde): dran pa 'di shes pa bya//nga yid med cing ngang 'dzin med//chos rnams ci 'drid ltar ba dag/'gyur ro snyam du dranang ni//chos rjes drin pa de bsgom yin//bla na med pa bsod nams zhing /
90a4(mdo sde): 'dun sangs rgyas slob ma rnams//sangs rgyas byang chub 'gyur ba dag/rtag tu yang dag rjes su dran//rgya mtsho lte bur dpag dka' rnams//bdag gi rjes su dran pa yi//bsod nams rab tu gang bas
90a5(mdo sde): des//sems can de bzhin gshegs gyur cig/mi ldog drang tshul can rnams kyi//tshul khrims yang dag rjes blun pa//sems can kun la phan sems pa//mchog gis bsod nams gang bskyed
90a6(mdo sde): //sems can rnams la phan 'dod phyir//de dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsngo//sems cani kun la phan byed pa//de ni tshul khrims dran zhes bya//zang zing med pas chos btang dang //nyon mongs
90a7(mdo sde): smrangs pa'i gang dge ba//sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir//snying rje'i bdag nyid bsngo bar byed//gtong ba rjes dran phrin sum tshogs//zhing dang skye la rab gnas pa//mtshon ma med cing rtsol med
90b1(mdo sde): par//nyi ma bzhin du kun tu shar//lha rnams kun gyi dge ba gang //dge ba'i las las rab byung ba//bde de sems can thams cad kyir//snying rje'i bdag nyid de ltar 'dod//gang gis 'jig rten lhar gyur
90b2(mdo sde): nas//sangs rgyas bla ni med gyur pa//bde ba de dag rtag tu bya//bdag gis de lta de ltar bsgrub///bam po lnga pa//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med dang //
90b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par gnon dang gnyis ka g.yog dang bcas te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas lhags pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
90b4(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag btsal nas//lan du ma bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/g.yog dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/skyes bu dam pa de gnyis
90b5(mdo sde): kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis 'dir gcig tu 'dus nas chos yang dag par brjod pa bgyis na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
90b6(mdo sde): ni mi mkhyen pa'am/mi rigs pa'am/rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ba lags na/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis kyis chos yang dag par brjod pa dang mthun pa bgyis
90b7(mdo sde): pa lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin te/ji skad smras pa de lta'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/mi rigs pa'am/
91a1(mdo sde): rnam par myi mkhyen pa cung zad tsam yang mi mnga' ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thams cad du sgrub pa ma mnga' ba'i ye shes can to//rigs kyi glu khyud
91a2(mdo sde): gnyis kyis chos yang dag par brjod pa dong mthun par byas so//rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gang ci smra ba dang /kun smra ba de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi
91a3(mdo sde): brlabs su rigs par bya'o//rigs kyi bu dag legaso so legs so//ji ltar khyod gnyis kyis byas pa de bzhin du chos yang dag par brjid par bya'o//rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis kyis chos ya
91a4(mdo sde): dag par brjod pa 'dis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas so//de bzhin gshegs pa'ang khyed gnyis kyi chos yang dag par brjod pa la rjes su yi rang ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub
91a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rtsom pa med la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir rtsom pa med ces bya/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang
91a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i lus dang /ngage dang /yid kyi lus kyi mtha' ni shin tu byung ba/bya ba thams cad la mi chags pa/gang yang mi tshal ba/cung zad kyang spang por mi 'dod pa/thob pa ngom
91a7(mdo sde): bdig pas pa da ma sa pa dang / ltar byung 'di bzhin nyid du mnyam par mthong ba/zom dang /'bring dang /rab kyi chos srung za kyang yang dge par rjes su mi mthong ba den rtsom pa med ce
91b1(mdo sde): bya'o//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas med par gyur na/rtsom pa med pa'o//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te chos 'ga' zhig gzod ma nas yod par gyur na ni de brnam par
91b2(mdo sde): byin chos gang yang gnod ma nas yod pa ma yin te//gzod ma nas med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni brtsams pa med pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/de lta yin na khyod kyis chos yang
91b3(mdo sde): dag par brjod pa de ji ltar byas/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu brtsams pa med pa nyid bdag gis chos yang dag par brjed pa byas pa'o//btsun pa shA
91b4(mdo sde): rangadwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du soms/gang khyod kyis dri ba dris pa 'di ci khyod kyis 'di brtsams te dris sam/'on te ma brtsams par dris/de gal te khyod kyis brtsams te dris na ni ci la rten te brgya
91b5(mdo sde): gang rtsom pa dang btsas pa de ni 'dri ba ma yin no//rtsom pa 'ang gzhan la 'dri ba'ang gzhan zhes ni byar mi 'thad do//ci ste ma brtsams par des na ni khyod gtam 'di la zhugs pa yin no//tshe dang
91b6(mdo sde): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/rigs kyi bu gang bdag dang khyod kyi brjod pa de ji ltar blta bar bya/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/
91b7(mdo sde): dper na skye ma sprul pa'i brjod pa ji lta bar de bzhin nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i brjod pa'ang de ltar blta bar bya'o//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i du sgyu ma sprul
92a1(mdo sde): pA la ni sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams med do//gang la sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams med pa de ci zhig rtsom par 'gyur/btsun pa shA ra dwa
92a2(mdo sde): ti'i bu sgyu ma mkhan gyi 'phen pa'i dbang gis sgyu ma sprul po'i brjod pa 'byung ba ji lta bar de bzhin nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i brjod pa'ang de ltar blta bar
92a3(mdo sde): bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/rigs kyi bu sgyu ma sprul pa ni 'byung ba'ang ma yin/ma byung ba 'ang ma yin na/ci khyod kyang byung ba'ang ma yin/ma byung ba 'ang ma yin nam/byang du
92a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnam pa med kyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rab tu ma bshad dam/smras pa
92a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te//de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rab tu bshad do//byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa
92a6(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ri'i bu ji ltar sgyu ma byung ba'ang ma yin/ma byung ba'ang ma yin pa de bzhin du sgyu ma lta bu'i chos de dag thams cad kyang byung ba'ang ma yini/ma byung ba'ang ma yin par blta bar
92a7(mdo sde): mi bya 'am/btsun pa shA ri'i bu gal te byung ba'am/ma byung ba zhig yod na ni sgyu ma lta bur yang bstan par mi 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/rigs kyi bu khyod su'i ched
92b1(mdo sde): buspyod/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni don nam don ma yin pa'i ched la'ang mi spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang don gyi ched la spyod pa de ni dmigs//
92b2(mdo sde): po la spyod pa'o//dmigs pa la spyod pa de ni sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dmigs pa la spyod pa ni rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa'ang mi 'thob ste/bzod pa
92b3(mdo sde): da na sangs rgyas mnyes par byed pa ma yin no//'on te don ma yin pa'i tshod la spyod na ni log par lta ba la spyod pa'o//log par lta ba ni don med pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/rigs
92b4(mdo sde): kyi bu gang dag don dang don ma yin pa'i ched la mi spyod pa de dag gang du spyod/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ri'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la spyod pa de nyid
92b5(mdo sde): la de dag spyod do//smras pa/rigs kyi bu byis pa so'i skye bo rnams gang lo spyod/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
92b6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gang la spyod pa de nyid la byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang spyod mod kyi/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
92b7(mdo sde): rnams gang la spyod pa de nyid la bdag cag kyang spyod do snyam du mi sems so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi yul la ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi go skabs
93a1(mdo sde): med na/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gang la spyod pa de nyid la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang spyod de 'di ni/
93a2(mdo sde): 'gal lo//byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyi smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi yul shes sam/shA ri'i bus smras pa/sbrang bu 'dra ba bdag lta bus sangs rgyas kyi yul
93a3(mdo sde): shes par ga la nus mod kyi/'on kyang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa las thos nas ni nyan thos rnams kyis kyang shes te/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mtha' yas mu med do///
93a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul las rnam par grol ba'i yul ni gang yang med do//byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ri'i bu gal te sangs rgyas kyi yul las rnam par
93a5(mdo sde): grol ba'i yul med na ci'i phyir khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi go skabs med ces smras/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
93a6(mdo sde): ni 'jig rten gyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa'o//byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni 'jig rten nyid ni spyod pa'o//de bas na sangs rgyas kyi yul la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi go skabs medo///
93a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/de bzhin gshegs pas ci zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas gang du bzhugs nas su'i
93b1(mdo sde): don mdzad/smras pa/rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa'i chos gang yang med de//chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems
93b2(mdo sde): can rnams kyi don mdzad cing 'dus byas nyid la spyod do//byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/gal te de ltar shes na ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten gyi yul las yang
93b3(mdo sde): dag par 'das zhes smras/de ni gnas brtan shA ri'i bus khang du ma chud do//btsun pa shA ri'i bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten gyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa ji ltar
93b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas ci zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing /gang du bzhugs nas su'i don mdzad par 'gyur te/'di la gnas brtan shA ri'i bu smra pa ni shin tu nyams pa/
93b5(mdo sde): de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu bdag ni 'di ltar byang chub kyis sems pa
93b6(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las shin tu nyams shing /nyan thos kyi sa la'ang shin tu gnas pas bdag ni ston nas kyang nyams pa/rigs kyi bu bdag ni khyod kyi spobs pa 'di
93b7(mdo sde): la rjes su yi rang ngo //sems can thams cad kyang khyod kyi spobs pa 'di lta bu thob par gyur cig/gtam brjod pa 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri ni mi skye ba'i chos la
94a1(mdo sde): bzod pa thob par gyur te/lha'i bu drug stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go//dge slong lnga stong ni nyan thos kyi sems las
94a2(mdo sde): log nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa rnams su byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/
94a3(mdo sde): zhes lung bstan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon
94a4(mdo sde): po ji ltar na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la mkhas pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thams cad yang dag par shes pa de'i
94a5(mdo sde): tshe gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la mkhas pa yin no//byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das thams cad ji ltar shes par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis
94a6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu rmi lam dang /sgyu ma dang /dri za'i grong khyer dang /smig rgyu dang /mgal me bskor ba dang /skra shad 'dzings pa dang /sprul pa dang /brag ce dang /gzugs
94a7(mdo sde): brnyan lta bur thams cad blta bar bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'i rtsom pa med kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang rmi lam dang /sgyu ma dang /dri za'i grong khyer dang /smig rgyu dang /
94b1(mdo sde): mthal mo bskor ba dang /skra shad 'dzings pa dang /sprul pa dang /blag ca dang /gzugs brtan d+hA bur bsdu ba'i thams cad gang lags/bcom+b+ha ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu thAm
94b2(mdo sde): cad ces bya ba ni mig dang gzugs dang /rna ba dang sgra dang /sne dang dri dang /lce dang ri dang /lusaM dang reg bya dang /yid dang chos rnams te/rigs kyi bu de dag ni gang rmi lam dang /rgyu ma dang /dri za'i
94b3(mdo sde): grong khyer dang /smig rgyu dang /mgal me bskor ba dang /skra shing 'dzings pa lta bu dang /sprul pa dang /brag ca dang /gzugs brnyan lta bur blta bar bya ba'i shes pa thams cad do//de la 'dzin pa ni
94b4(mdo sde): mig dang /rna ba dang sna dang /lce dang lus dang /yid rnams so//gzung ba ni gzugs dang /sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang /chos rnams te/gzung ba dang /'dzin pa'i chos 'di dag rnam pa dang /
94b5(mdo sde): tshul thams cad kyis shes pa dang /khong du chud pa dang /ston nus pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o//thams cad mkhyen pa gang yin pa de ni bag la nyal med pa nyon mongs pa med pa/ngar
94b6(mdo sde): 'dzin pa med pa/nga yir 'dzin pa med pa/ni mkha' dang mtshungs pa/mi 'gyur ba/sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/sems can thams cad lnga phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/
94b7(mdo sde): thams cad du dben pa'i sems dang ldan pa/thams cad du lhun gyis grub pa/lhun gyis grub pa'i chos can sems can gyi snying po sems can thams cad kyi dam pa/sgrib pa med pa'i chos
95a1(mdo sde): rnan/snying chen po dang ldan pa/mi brgyud pa sa can/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus nas byahU~M/byung chub sems pa ma pa med kyimigs sdug du
95a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid 'di khong du chud par 'tshal bas ji lta bur bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/rigs kyi zla byang
95a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid 'di khong du chud par 'dod pas sems can thams cad kyi ngan du byas pa dang /mi snyan pa thams cad bzod par bya ba'i phyir
95a4(mdo sde): sems sa dang mtshungs par bya'o//bdeg dang sems can gzhan rnams kyi rtog pa dang /rnam par rtog pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad bkru ba'i phyir sems chu dang mtshungs par bya'o//
95a5(mdo sde): shes rab gyis bdag dang sams can gzhan rnams kyi las dang /nyon mongs pa'i phyi shing bsreg pa'i phyir sems medang mtshungs par bya//chags pa thams ca de dang dbral ba'i
95a6(mdo sde): sems rlung dang mtshungs par bya'o//thams cad du sgrib pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis sems na mkha' dang mtshungs par bya'o//thams cad du 'jigs pa med cing skrag pa med pas byang chub sems
95a7(mdo sde): dpas seng ge dang mtshungs par bya'o//shin tu dul ba'i sems kyis sems can thams cad kyi khur khyer ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas glang po che dang mtshungs par bya'o//dam pa'i chos
95b1(mdo sde): char 'bebs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas sprin lta bur bya'o//sems can thams cad la ye shes kyis snang bar byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas nyi ma lta bur bya'o//thams cad tu sems can/
95b2(mdo sde): thams cad la rtag tu bde bar snang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas zla ba lta bur bya'o//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis rin po che'i gling chen por phyogs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas
95b3(mdo sde): ded dpon lta bur bya'o//sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad gso ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas sman pa lta bur bya'o//sems can thams cad kyi chos la the tshom za
95b4(mdo sde): ba'i zug rngu 'don pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas zug rngu 'byin pa lta bur bya'o//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyogs la mkhas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas gdos pa 'dzin pa
95b5(mdo sde): bur bya'o//'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sems can sgrol ba la mkhas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas gru lta bur bya'o//sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa'i phyir byang chub sems
95b6(mdo sde): dpas stegs bu lta bur bya'o//sems can thams cad mtshungs par 'jug pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas lam po che lta bur bya'o//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rin po che thams cad phun
95b7(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas rin po che'i gling lta bur bya'o//yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'dra bar bsam pa thams cad yongs su skong ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas sde
96a1(mdo sde): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bur bya'o//legs pa'i byas pa'i las byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas nang shes su bya'o//shes rab zab cing gting dpag
96a2(mdo sde): dka' ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas rgya mtsho lta bur bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las bsam pa mi g.yo ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas ri rab dang mtshungs par bya'o//kun nas
96a3(mdo sde): mdzes pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas dpag bsama~M gyi shing lta bur bya'o//mthong bar dka' ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpes dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser 'dra bar bya'o//tshos la dbang thob
96a4(mdo sde): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas brgya byin lta bur bya'o//rab tu zhi bo'i spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas tshangs pa lta bur bya'o//dam pa'i chos yongs
96a5(mdo sde): su skyong ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten skyong ba lta bur bya'o//dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bsten pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas 'khor los sgyur ba lta bur bya'o//sangs
96a6(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas blon po chen po lta bur bya'o//dge sbyong la gnas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas mngon par 'byung
96a7(mdo sde): pa la dga' bar bya'o//lus dang ngag dang sems zhi ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas dge sbyong du bya'o//bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang mngon par
96b1(mdo sde): pa dang rig pa dang rnam par grol ba phun sum tshon pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas dgon pa par bya'o//stong pa nyid rtogs pa khong du chud pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas bsam gtan par bya'o///
96b2(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dang lto phye chen po dang rig stegs 'chang grub pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas dben pa la mngon par dgo' bar bya'o//rig pa gsum rtogs par khong du
96b3(mdo sde): chud pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas rig sngags 'chang du bya'o//mngon par shes pa drug thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes su bya'o//phung po dang
96b4(mdo sde): khams dang skye mched la mkhas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas mang du thos par bya'o//bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas slob dpon du bya'o//zang
96b5(mdo sde): zing med par chos ston pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas chos smra bar bya'o//'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug btul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba 'dzin par bya'o//tham
96b6(mdo sde): cad du rung ba la tshed shes pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas me mo 'dzin par bya'o//tshol ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas dul bar bya'o//'dod chags dang bral ba'i
96b7(mdo sde): phyir byang chub sems dpas mi rgod par bya'o//zhe sdang dang bral ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas ma khengs par bya'o//gti mug dang bral ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas mu cor mi smra
97a1(mdo sde): bar bya'o//ngag bsdams pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas tshig 'chol bar mi smra bar bya'o//theg pa chen po la 'dzud pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas ded dpon du bya'o//
97a2(mdo sde): byang chub tu dam bcas po nyams 'og tu chud pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas khur tsa ba lta bur bya'o//sems can thams cad brten pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas skyed mos tshol
97a3(mdo sde): 'dra bar bya'o//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi zong yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas grong khyer lta bur bya'o//sems can thams cad la bu gcig po bzhin du
97a4(mdo sde): byams pa dang ldan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas phan pa 'dod par bya'o//sems can thams cad kyi ci bye ba yongs su thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas bran lta bur bya'o/
97a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chu rgod dag la drang srong ba rnams yin no//khengs pa dag la nga rgyal med pa rnams yin no//g.yo can dag la g.yo med pa rnams
97a6(mdo sde): yin no//thibs po spyod po dag la rgyu med pa dang ldan pa rnams yin no//log par zhug pa dag la snying rje dang ldan pa rnams yin no//ngo tsha med pa dag la ngo tsha dang ldan pa rnams yin na
97a7(mdo sde): mu tser smra ba dag la khril yod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//phas kyi rgol ba thams cad la sems snga ma gong ba rnams yin no//'khor thams cad la bag tsha ba med
97b1(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no//'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no//bdud thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa rnams yin no//phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis me thul ba rnams yin//
97b2(mdo sde): bla ma dag la gus pa dang bcas pa rnams yin no//'phags pa dag la zhe sa dang bcas pa rnams yin no//mang du thos pa dag la ri mor byed pa rnams yin no//bsam gtan pa dag la ngo
97b3(mdo sde): mtshar thong ba rnams yin no//mkhas pa dag la lhag pa'i bsam pa 'jug pa rnams yin no//chos smra ba dag la sangs rgyas tsam du phangs par sems pa dang ldan pa rnams yin no//byang chub
97b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' dag la skyabs su song ba rnams yin no//sangs rgyas dag la bsam pa thams cad kyis zhugs pa rnams yin no//nan tan dag la snying por 'du shes pa rnams yin no//
97b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi 'jigs pa rnams yin no//snying rje chen po la phyogs pas mya ngan las 'das pa la mi lta ba rnams yin no//sems can thams cad yongs su smin
97b6(mdo sde): par byed pa la mngon par dga' bas 'khor ba la phyogs pa rnams yin no//rnyed pa dang bkur sti thams cad la mi lta bas zang zing med par chos ston pa rnams yin no//mi rtag pa dang
97b7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba dang bdag med pa dang mi gtsang ba yongs su shes pas sems phyin ci ma log pa rnams yin no//yul thams cad la mi lta bas sems rnam par grol ba rnams yin no//
98a1(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i rigs su skyes pas rigs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//rab tu byung ba mang bas blo phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//sdug bsngal dang
98a2(mdo sde): kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang /lam shes pas 'phags pa rnams yin no//tshul khrims dang /thos pa dang /bag yod pa la gnas pas skyes bu dam pa rnams yin no//'du
98a3(mdo sde): byed bdag med par yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa rnams yin no//'phags pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas log par mi ltung ba'i chos can
98a4(mdo sde): rnams yin no//phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas byang chub kyi snying por gzhol ba rnams yin no//spyod lam mdzes po phun sum tshogs pas byang chub sems dpa' rtag
98a5(mdo sde): tu gtsang ma yang dag par spyod pa rnams yin no//'jig rten gyi gsang tshig la mngon par dga' ba ma yin no//sdig pa'i grogs po la mngon par dga' ba ma yin no//rnyed pa
98a6(mdo sde): dang /bkur sti dang /tshigs su bcad pa la mngon par dga' ba ma yin no//'du 'dzi dag la chags pa ma yin no//yul rgyus kyi gtam dang /rgyal po'i gtam dang /chom rkun
98a7(mdo sde): gyi gtam dang /bud med kyi gtam dang /gzhad gad kyi gtam dang /dmag gi gtam dang /'thab cing rtsod pa'i gtam la tshogs pa ma yin no//yul ngan pa dang /ljongs ngon
98b1(mdo sde): pa dang /yul 'khor ngan pa dang /grong dang /grong khyer dang /tshong dus dang /ri brag ngan pa rnams la chags pa ma yin no//gar dang /khro dang /gzhad gad dang /glu la chags pa ma yin no//
98b2(mdo sde): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can ser sna can rnams la chags pa ma yin no//tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams dang /mtshams so sor bcad pa rnams dang /
98b3(mdo sde): rgyun sman du gyur pa rnams la chags pa ma yin no//gnod sems kyi tha bi dang /zhe sdang mang ba rnams la chags pa ma yin no//le lo can rnams dang /brtson 'grus chung zhing brtson 'grus
98b4(mdo sde): btang ba rnams la chags pa ma yin no//g.yeng zhing phyin ci log tu gyur la rnam par 'phro ba'i sems la chags pa ma yin no//shes rab 'chal pa rnams dang /blun pa lkug pa'i
98b5(mdo sde): rang bzhin can rnams la chags pa ma yin no//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos dang /zang zing dang /mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba yin no//'dod chags
98b6(mdo sde): dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug yang dag par chad pa'o//rnal 'byor chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/sgra bsnyungs pa la dga' ba'o//tshig mo mang zhing dul ba'o//zhi zhing nye bar zhi ba la dben pang
98b7(mdo sde): nags tshal thibs po dang /rtsa dang /shing dang /ldam ldum yod pa dang /sa khyon chung ngu dang /chu ngogs dang /ri khrod dang /phug sna tshogs dang /ri dang /rdo dang /rtse mo dang /g.yo'i phye/
99a1(mdo sde): rnams la mngon par dga' ba yin no//zhi ba dang rab tu zhi ba dang /nye bar zhi ba'i phyogs de dag la rab tu dga' ba yin te/gnas bcas pa'i phyogs de dang de dag tu
99a2(mdo sde): nam gyi cha stod dang /nem gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la brtson par gnas pa dang /thos pa dang /sems pa dang /sgom pa stug po'i mthong na gnas pa dang /bsam gtan dang /ting
99a3(mdo sde): nge 'dzin dang /gzungs dang /dbang dang /bzod pa'i sgo brgya stong la rnam par skye ba dang /chos kyi sgo brgya stong dpag tu med pa dag rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang /sangs rgyas brgya stong yang
99a4(mdo sde): mthong ba dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong yang thob pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo brgya stong yang mngon du byed pa dang /sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yang yongs su smin par byed pa
99a5(mdo sde): de lta bu de dag la mngon par dga' ba yin te/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas de 'dra bar bya'o//de lta bus ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid khong du chud
99a6(mdo sde): par nus so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po ni bag mchis
99a7(mdo sde): par gnas shing bsgrub pa snying por bgyid pa rnams kyi legs so//de la sgrub pa ni byang chub tu smon pa'o//bag mchis pa ni smon lam yongs su skong ba'o//gzhan yang bsgrub pa/
99b1(mdo sde): dz+ha sbyin pa la sbyor ba'o//bag mchis pa ni rnam par smin pa la mi rlo ba'o//bsgrub pa ni tshul khrims kyi sdum pa yang dag par blangs pa ma nyams pa'o//bag mchis pa ni phyir ma ldog pa'i chu/
99b2(mdo sde): khrims bsgrub pa'o//bsgrub pa ni bzod pa rtsom pa'o//bag mchis pa ni mi skye ba'i chos rtogs pa'o//bsgrub pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kun tu tshol bas yongs su mi skyo bo'o//bag mchis
99b3(mdo sde): pa ni rtsom pa thams cad yongs su 'dor ba'o//bsgrub pa ni bsam gtan rtsomo pa'o//bag mchis pa ni mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa'o//bsgrub pa ni shes rab yongs su spyod pa'o//bag
99b4(mdo sde): mchis pa ni chos thams cad sprad par mi bgyid pa'o//bsgrub pa ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o//bag mchis pa ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'o//bsgrub pa ni sems can
99b5(mdo sde): rnams byang chub la rab tu 'god pa'o//bag mchis pa ni sems can rnams mi dmigs pa'o//bsgrub pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bgyis nas byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba'o//bag
99b6(mdo sde): mchis pa ni chos thams cad byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid du rtogs pa'o//bsgrub pa ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'o//bag mchis pa ni bsams bzhin du srid pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o//
99b7(mdo sde): bsgrub pa ni byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i bkod pa kun ston pa'o//bag mchis po ni bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa na mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o//
100a1(mdo sde): bsgrub pa ni byang chub mngon par 'chang rgya'o//bag mchis pa ni sngar bgyi ba bgyis pa'o//bsgrub pa ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen por nye bar mche ba 'o/
100a2(mdo sde): bag mchis pa ni chos shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'tshal ba ste/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bsgrub po 'di lta bu dang /bag mchis pa 'di lta bu dang ldan
100a3(mdo sde): pa ni byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas sgrub pa 'di dang /bag mchis pa 'di la brtson par bgyi ste/bcom ldan 'das
100a4(mdo sde): 'di ni rlo lnga dag par brjod pa lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par gnon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
100a5(mdo sde): 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos yang dag par 'dzin po zhig la gnas nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par sgrub ste/de la kha cig ni 'di snyam du gang sangs
100a6(mdo sde): rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di chos gang gi ming du sangs rgyas zhes btags snyam du sems te/de dag de ltar rtog pa na gang 'di sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba'i chos de dag yang dag
100a7(mdo sde): par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de dag sangs rgyas ji lta ba de bzhin du chos thams cad khong du chud do//de dag de ltar yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas gang ci yid la bgyid pa de dag
