131a2(mdo sde): de dag ni ngan song du gzhol po sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'o//byang chub sems dpa' ni yang dag pas rtog pas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub khong du chud do//bcom ldan 'das de bas
131a3(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpas rgyun las bzlog ste/'jug par bgyi rgyun gyi rjes su 'jug par mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni mya ngan las 'das pa las rnam
131a4(mdo sde): par grol gyi/'khor ba las ni ma lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/byang chub sems dpas mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jigs par bgyi'o//'khor ba la ni ma lags so//'khro
131a5(mdo sde): ba la so sor brtags na sems can rnams la snying rje chen po 'thob bo//sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang 'thob bo//mya ngan las 'das pa la yongs su brtags na 'khor ba la zhe 'gras
131a6(mdo sde): par 'gyu ro//byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la zhe 'gras pa ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las yongs su nyams so//'khor ba na gnas pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa
131a7(mdo sde): chen po dang snying rje chen po skye'i/mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa rnams la ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba ni yang
131b1(mdo sde): dgra pa ma lags pa yongs su rtog pa rab tu zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bas na mya ngan las 'das pa tshol ba'i byang chub sems dpas yongs su rtog pa nye bar
131b2(mdo sde): zhi ba btsal bar bgyi ste/de las mya ngan las 'da' ba 'thob par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos yang dag par brjod pa logs so////bam po bdun pa ste tha
131b3(mdo sde): ma//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos shin tu mang
131b4(mdo sde): po la bslab par mi bya'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas chos gcig rab tu gzung zhing rab tu rtogs par bgyis na/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
131b5(mdo sde): de'i lag mthil du mchis pa lags so//chos gcig po gang zhe na/'di lta ste snying rje chen po'o//bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen pos ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad byang chub
131b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi lag mthil du mchis pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo rin po che gang du mchi ba der dpung gi tshogs
131b7(mdo sde): thams cad mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po gang du mchi ba der sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
132a1(mdo sde): dper na gdugs shar na sems can rnams kyi bgyi ba thams cad shin tu mang bar 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du snying rje chen po gang du shar bar gyur
132a2(mdo sde): bder byang chub bgyid pa'i chos kyi bgyi ba gzhan rnams kyang shin tu mang bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/dper na srog gi dbang po mchis na dbang po gzhan rnams
132a3(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du snying rje chen po mchis na byang chub bgyid pa'i chos gzhan rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos yang
132a4(mdo sde): dge par brjod pa lags so//byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ni chos rnams kyi rtsa ba ste/gang la bsam pa
132a5(mdo sde): ma mchis pa de la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ring ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa la ni gal te sangs rgyas mi bzhugs na'ang na mkha'i dkyil
132a6(mdo sde): dang /brtsig pa dang /shing rnams las chos 'byung ngo //byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa ni rang gi yid kyi dpyod pa nyid las gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa thams cad
132a7(mdo sde): 'byung ngo //bcom ldan 'das de bas na byang chub sems dpas ngasam pa phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/dper na gang la rkang pa mchis pa de la 'gro ba
132b1(mdo sde): mchis so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang la bsam pa mchis pa de la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mchis so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/dper na yan lag gi dam pa mgo gang
132b2(mdo sde): la mchis pa de la 'tsho ba mchis so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bsam pa gang la mchis pa de la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mchis so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/dper na gang la
132b3(mdo sde): 'tsho ba mchis pa de la rnyed pa ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang la bsam pa mchis pa de la sangs rgyas rnyed pa mchis so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/dper na
132b4(mdo sde): zhugs shing mchis na zhugs 'bar gyi/zhugs shing ma mchis na zhugs mi 'bar ro//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bsam pa mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sangs rgyas kyi
132b5(mdo sde): chos rnams 'bar gyi/bsam pa ma mchis pa la mi 'bar ro//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/dper na sprin chags na char 'bab kyi/sprin ma chags na char mi 'bab bo//bcom ldan
132b6(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin du bsam pa mchis na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'byung gi/bsam pa ma mchis na mi 'byung ngo //bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/dper na zhugs shing gang rtsa ba ma nyams pa
132b7(mdo sde): de la me tog dang 'bras bu mi 'khrung ngo //bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang bsam pa log par zhugs pa de la dge ba'i chos thams cad mi 'byung ngo //bcom ldan 'das de bas na byang chub
133a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tshol bas rang gi bsam pa shin tu gzung ba dang /shin tu bsrung ba dang /shin tu sbyang bar bgyi ste/bcom ldan 'das 'di
133a2(mdo sde): ni chos yang dag par brjod pa lags so//byang chub sems dpa' dpal bzang gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas chos gang yang 'khrugs par mi bgyi'o//
133a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas rang gi sems shin tu gzung bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni rang gi sems la
133a4(mdo sde): rag las pa'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang chos 'ga' zhig 'khrugs par bgyid na/de tshegs chen pos mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob par 'gyuraro//
133a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gang yang 'khrugs par mi bgyid pa dang /bsam gtan du bgyid pa de ma nyams par gnas pa ste/de bzhin gshegs pa
133a6(mdo sde): rnams la nongs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//rang gi sems las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu rtogs te/sems de'ang 'khrugs par mi bgyid do//ji ltar sems
133a7(mdo sde): de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar mthong ngo //ji ltar sems de sgyu ma lta bur mthong ba de bzhin du chos thams cad
133b1(mdo sde): spya sgyum k+ta bur mthong //ji ltar sems de nang dang /phyi rol dang /gnyis ka ma mchis par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de bzhin du chos thams cad yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
133b2(mdo sde): ji ltar sems de gzugs ma mchis/bstan du ma mchis/thogs pa ma mchis snang ba ma mchis/rnam par rig pa ma mchis/rten pa ma mchis/gnas ma mchis par mthong ba de
133b3(mdo sde): bzhin du chos thams cad kyang mthong ngo //de ltar mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems snyoms pa nyid thob bo//de sems snyoms pa nyid thob pas yang mi rtog mi ldog mi 'dor mi 'dzin
133b4(mdo sde): mi smon to//gang mi smon pa de mi 'dzin to//gang mi 'dzin pa de yongs su mi 'dzin te/yang nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro//nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs
133b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis ston te/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos yang dag par brjod pa lags so//byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' mdzod kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
133b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas gang gis sems can rnams la gnod par 'gyur ba'i tshig de smra bar mi bgyi'o//gang gis gzhan la gdung bar 'gyur ba'i tshig de smra bar mi bgyi'o//byang
133b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gang gzhan gyis 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba'i tshig de smra bar mi bgyi'o//gang gzhan gyi don ma lags pa dang /don ma mchis pa'i tshig de smra bar mi bgyi'o//gang
134a1(mdo sde): gis rig pa mi skyed pa'i tshig de smra bar mi bgyi'o//gang sems can rnams kyi snying la mi 'bab pa dang /'khor go ba ma lags pa dang /rnar mi snyan pa'i tshig de smra
134a2(mdo sde): mi bgyi'o//gang gnyis la spyod par 'gyur ba'i tshig de smra bar mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas gang stong pa nyid khong du chud par mi 'gyur ba'i tshig de smra bar mi brgyu
134a3(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/gang stong pa nyid khong du chud par bgyid pa'i tshig de ni tshig thams cad kyi mchog go/bcom ldan 'das gang chos thams cad stong pa dang /g.yo ba ma mchis
134a4(mdo sde): pa dang /mi gnyis pa dang /gnyis dang bral bar mthong yang sems can gyi bgyi ba thams cad kyang mi 'dor ba 'di ni de'i sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i snying rje chen po lags so//yang
134a5(mdo sde): sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i snying rje chen pos spyod pa de sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa rnams la slob bo//gang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa rnams la slob pa de ni na mkha'i mdzod 'thob po//de nas
134a6(mdo sde): na mkha'i mdzod thob pas ci 'tshal ba rnams yongs su gtong bar bgyid kyang gtong ba dang ser sna la gnyis su 'du shes pa ma lags/tshul khrims la ma lags/'chal
134a7(mdo sde): ba'i tshul khrims la ma lags/bzod pa la ma lags/gnod sems la ma lags/brtson 'grus la ma la glas/le lo la ma lags/bsam gtan la ma lags/rnam par
134b1(mdo sde): g.yeng ba la ma lags/shes rab la ma lags/'chal pa'i shes rab la ma lags te/de sangs rgyas kyi chos la'ang mi smon/so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang yongs su mi 'dor ro//bcom
134b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/dper na rgya mtsho chen por chab 'bab po 'tshal ni 'di lta ste/dpon tshwa'i ror ro gcig go/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' don dam pa la mkhas pa la chos
134b3(mdo sde): gang dag snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni 'di lta ste/rnam par grol ba'i ror ro gcig par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/dper na gdugs ni dngos po thams cad
134b4(mdo sde): snang bar bgyid do//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyi chos thams cad snang bar bgyid do//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid du
134b5(mdo sde): 'gal ba ma mchis te/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang de ltar 'tshal ba de chos thams cad byang chub tu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //gang chos thams cad byang
134b6(mdo sde): chub tu yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de gang cung zad smra ba de thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gsung du 'tshal to//gang de ltar 'tshal ba de chags pa ma mchis par ston to//gang cha gos
134b7(mdo sde): pa ma mchis byar ston pa de spobs pa thogs pa ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos yang dag par brjod pa lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la
135a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu phye ba lags na/bcom ldan
135a2(mdo sde): 'das 'jig rten log par 'dzin pa ni 'di skad du pha rol tu phyin pas byang chub sems dpa' rab tu phye'o zhes mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das gal te pha rol tu phyin pas byang chub sim
135a3(mdo sde): dpa' rab tu phye ba lags na ni sems can thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni pha rol tu phyin pa skyed pa dang khong du chud pa
135a4(mdo sde): lags te/bskyed nas kyang gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par rab tu ston te/de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni ma skyes pa'i la mo skyed po/ma byung ba'i lam
135a5(mdo sde): 'byin pa/marjod pa brjod pa'o zhes bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis bsrung ba ma lags kyi/byang chub sems dpa'
135a6(mdo sde): rnams pha rol tu phyin pa srung ba bgyid de/de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' rnams dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa zhes bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dag ni
135a7(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis kun tu bzung ba ma legs kyi/byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu 'dzin par bgyid de/de'i slad du chos 'dzin pa zhes
135b1(mdo sde): bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis dri ma ma mchis pas skyon ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni sems can dang bdag dben pas gnas bla ma
135b2(mdo sde): mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni blang ba dang dor ba ma mchis pas sems ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni brtsams pa ma mchis pas yid ma
135b3(mdo sde): mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni brtsams pa dang bral bas rnying pa ma lags pa'o//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mi g.yo zhing g.yo ba ma mchis pas
135b4(mdo sde): 'gro ba dang bral ba'o//chos thams cad ni srog ma mchis pas mi 'chi ba'o//chos thams cad ni zas ma mchis pas gso ba ma mchis pa'o//chos thams cad ni 'dus nas 'grub pa
135b5(mdo sde): rdzas ma mchis pa'o//chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer ma mchis pas dman pa ma lags so//chos thams cad ni lus ma mchis pas dbyer ma mchis pa'o//chos
135b6(mdo sde): thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mtshungs pas rdo rje lta bu'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di ltar 'tshal ba de chos thams cad kyi chos nyid 'tshal to//
135b7(mdo sde): gang chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'tshal ba de stong pa nyid 'tshal ba'o//gang stong pa nyid 'tshal ba de su dang yang mi rtsod do//gang su dang yang mi rtsod pa de dge sbyong gi chos la
136a1(mdo sde): gnas pa'o//gang dge sbyong gi chos la gnas pa de gnas pa ma mchis pa'i gang gnas pa ma mchis pa de yul rnams la mi zag go/gang yul rnams la mi zag pa de spyan
136a2(mdo sde): ma mchis pa'o//gang skyon ma mchis pa de chos kyi sku'o//chos kyi sku gang lags pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa gang lags pa de mi gnyis pa gsung ba'o///
136a3(mdo sde): gang mi gnyis pa gsung ba de 'khor ba'ang mi spong /mya ngan las 'das pa'ang mi sgrub ste/gzhan du na yongs su rtog pa thams cad spong ba ston ste/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos
136a4(mdo sde): yang dag par brjod pa'o//phyin ci ma log pa yang dag par brjod pa'o//stong pa nyid yang dag par brjod pa'o//mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang //smon pa ma mchis pa dang /mngon par
136a5(mdo sde): 'du mi bgyid pa dang /ma skyes pa dang /ma byung ba yang dag par brjod pa'o//skye ba ma mchis pa yang dag par brjod pa'o//theg pa chen po yang dag par brjod pa'o//chos kyi 'khor
136a6(mdo sde): lo rab tu bskor ba chen po yang dag par brjod pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa chen po yang dag par brjod pa'o//sa chen po yang dag par brjod pa'o//chos thams cad phyin ci ma log pa
136a7(mdo sde): yang dag par brjod pa'o//bcom ldan 'das chos yang dag par brjod pa 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gang du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god pa'i 'khor los
136b1(mdo sde): sgyur bar 'gyur ro//sems can thams cad dge bar bgyid pa'i tshong dpon du 'gyur ro//khyim gyi skyon rnam par brjod pa'i khyim bdag chen por 'gyur ro//lha rnams brag mchis pa la rab
136b2(mdo sde): tu sbyor ba'i lha'i rgyal po brgya byin du 'gyur ro//bsam gtan dang tshad ma mchis pa rnams la rab tu 'god pa'i tshangs par 'gyur ro//'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyi yid mi gos pa'i 'jig
136b3(mdo sde): rten skyong bar 'gyur ro//mchog tu rtsod pa ma mchis pa'i dge sbyong du 'gyur ro//tshangs pa'i yul la mkhas pa'i bram zer 'gyur ro//dul zhing g.yog kyang dul bar 'gyur ro//zhi zhing g.yog
136b4(mdo sde): kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro//cang shes shing g.yog kyang cang shes par 'gyur ro//dbang chen po thob pa'i thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro//the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i chos smra ba chen po
136b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//nyon mongs pa zad pas mi 'jigs par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos yang dag par brjod pa lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur
136b6(mdo sde): gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod dang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag dang nyan thos chen po rnams kyis smras pa 'di sems can gang dag gis khong du chud pa de dag ni dge ba'i rgyu
136b7(mdo sde): ba chung ngu dang ldan pa ma yin no//sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin no//dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gi rgyu las byung ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jam dpal de bzhin
137a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni zab ste/brtags pa'i mkhas pa 'dzangs pas rig pa'o//'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu
137a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis thos par mi 'gyur te/gang dag gis thos kyang dad par mi 'gyur ro//'di la gang lus mngon sum du 'gyur ba dang /gang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa de
137a3(mdo sde): ngag gis thos par 'gyur 'dzin par 'gyur te/bzod pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro//'jam dpal chos kyi tshul 'di la ma brten par sangs rgyas pa gang yang med do//'jam dpal sangs
137a4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag thams cad kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten nas mngon par rdzogs
137a5(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas so//'jam dpal gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma brten par byang chub 'dod pa de dag ni na mkha' la rnyeb pas rnyeb par rig par bya'o//chos kyi rnam grangs
137a6(mdo sde): 'di la ma brten par rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa'ang thob par mi nus na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta smos kyang ci dgos nga'i nyan thos gang gnyis ka'i
137a7(mdo sde): cha las rnam par grol ba/rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa de dag kyang chos kyi tshul 'di la brten nas so//'jam dpal chos
137b1(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas ngan du bsams te dran song du skye ba ni sla'i gtam gzhan rnams la dud par byas te mtho ris su skye bA ni de lta ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jam dpal gang chub/
137b2(mdo sde): 'di thos nas sems can dmyal bar skyes pa de dag ni rab tu myur bar rnam par thar par gyur te/mtho ris su skyes pa de dag ni de lta ma yin no//'jam dpal chos bzhi dang ldan na bya ba
137b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpas tshul 'di thos par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/des sngon yang tshul 'di thos par gyur la/thos nas kyang rjes su yi rang ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba chen pos brten par
137b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ba dang thos pa dang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba ste/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' chos
137b5(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag dang ldan na tshul 'di thos par 'gyur ro//'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na tshul 'di thos par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/tshul
137b6(mdo sde): 'di ni yid la byed pa la rab tu brtson par 'gyur ba dang /las kyis 'jigs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /smon lam btab par 'gyur ba dang /rang bzhin gyis drang zhing mnyen la
137b7(mdo sde): 'grogs na bde bar 'gyur ba ste/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi pa de dag dang ldan na tshul 'di thos par 'gyur ro//'jam dpal chos bzhi dang ldan na tshul 'di thos
138a1(mdo sde): nas spong bar mi 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/byang chub tu smon lam btab pa yin/bzod pa thob pa yin/lta ba yang dag par zhugs pa yin/bla na med pa yang
138a2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin te/chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/tshul 'di thos nas spong bar mi 'gyur ro//'jam dpal chos bzhi dang ldan na tshul 'di
138a3(mdo sde): thos nas dad par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/thos pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yin/stong pa nyid kyi bsam gtan pa yin/gzungs thob pa yin
138a4(mdo sde): te/chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na tshul 'di thos nas dad par 'gyur ro//chos bzhi dang ldan na tshul 'di thos nas rab tu rtogs par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/bsod nams kyi
138a5(mdo sde): tshogs bsags pa yin/thos pa'i tshogs bsags pa yin/ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa yin/bsam gtan rnams kyis sems las su rung ba yin te/chos bzhi po de dag
138a6(mdo sde): dang ldan na tshul 'di thos nas rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ro//chos bzhi dang ldan na tshul 'di thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob ste/bzhi
138a7(mdo sde): gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gzugs thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang /tshul thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshul du thos pa dang /'dod pa thams
138b1(mdo sde): cad dang bral te thos na sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'dod par 'gyur ba'ang med pa dang /snying rje chen po las kyang rnam par mi ldog pa ste/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang
138b2(mdo sde): ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to//'jam dpal de bas na byang chub sems dpas tshul 'di rgyun mi 'chad par mnyen par bya'o//myur du nges par 'byung
138b3(mdo sde): bar 'dod pas kyang tshul 'dri mnyan par bya'o//lung bstan pa'i sa 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas kyang tshul 'di mnyan par bya'o//las kyi sgrib pa byang bar 'dod pa dang /nyon mongs pa
138b4(mdo sde): sgrib pa dang /shes bya'i sgrib pa dang /'gro ba'i sgrib pa byang bar 'dod pas kyang tshul 'di mnyan par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa la bla na med pa'i mchod pa byed par 'dod pas kyang tshul
138b5(mdo sde): 'di mnyan par bya'o//dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung bar 'dod pas kyang tshul 'di nyid mnyan par bya'o//'jam dpal gang chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas 'jug pa dang /mi spong ba dang /mi
138b6(mdo sde): smod par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ba ston par bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med kyis
138b7(mdo sde): de'i tshe mu tig gi do shel brgya stong ri ba mgul nas bkrol te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor nas tshig 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i chos 'dis sems can
139a1(mdo sde): thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur cig ces smras so//de nas mu tig gi do shal de
139a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang zad na khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bkra ba/gru bzhi lham po/lha dang mis lta bar byed pa/nyan thos chen po de dag dang /byang chub
139a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis sngon ma mthong ma thos pa 'dug par gyur te/de bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i rjes su
139a4(mdo sde): 'gro zhing bzhugs pa'i rjes su gnas so//de'i tshe lha dang mi phal cheri ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du byung bar gyur te/ya mtshan du bya ba skyes nas spyi bor thal mo sbyar te/bcom
139a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas mig mi 'dzums par gnas par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med ngo mtshor du gyur nas dga' ba skyes te/
139a6(mdo sde): blo gos phrag po gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das go la
139a7(mdo sde): ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//yon tan mang po kun gyi snod gyur pa//
139b1(mdo sde): sa dar lha yul 'gro ba'i mgon gcig pa//bde gshegs zhi zhing rab tu zhi la dgyes//khyod mtshungs 'jig rten ma mchis ga la lhag/blo gros mnyam zhing g.yo med mtshungs par
139b2(mdo sde): sbyor//bdag po thugs rjes rab tu zin pa'i thugs//na mkha'i dkyil ltar thugs ni ma gos te//phan ran yang dag bka' mchid gsung zhing spyod//khyod la dgra dang zin na mi mang
139b3(mdo sde): ste//bdag po dgyes dang mi dgyes yong mi mnga'//sman pa bzhin du 'gro ba gso mdzad cing //thugs rje bskyed nas rnam par mi rtog spyod//lha min lho dang klu dang na mkha' lding //gnod
139b4(mdo sde): sbyin khyod la skyabs mchis zhi ba thob//mgon po srid pa gsum na phan mdzad pa//thub pa khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi//bde gshegs khyod ni 'dus ma bgyis mi gzigs//zhi
139b5(mdo sde): thugs zhi la'ang yon tan mi gzigs te//gnyis ka'i tshul spangs rnam rtog mi mnga' bar//bdag po mya ngon 'das nas 'jig rten spyod//rab zhi'i yon tan rgya mtsho gting tshod
139b6(mdo sde): yas//stobs bcu nyid du yon tan mkhyen par 'gyur//sa drang nA mkha' lta bur tshad med chos//mgon la thal mo sbyar te mgos phyog 'tshal//srid pa'i chu bor mi rkyal mi nub
139b7(mdo sde): cing //sems can mchog ni mi khyer mi bzhugs so//khyod ni gcig pu srid mtsho'i pha rol gshegs//dpe med rgya mtsho'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo//pad+ma bzhin du chu yis mi gos
140a1(mdo sde): pa//sa la 'jig rten chos grol rab tu gsung //khyod kyi mkhyen pa su dang mi mtshungs te/mtshungs med blo gros khyod la bdag skyabs mchi//khyod ni mi mkhyen
140a2(mdo sde): cung zad 'dir mi mnga'//stobs bcu ldan pas kun tu yong mi bsnyengs//'khor la nga 'dra su'ang med ces gsung //de slad khyod ni dpa' bo gcig bu rgyu//mi gang khyod bka' bdud
140a3(mdo sde): rtsi snod gyur pa//de dag mdar na snyid pa'i 'jigs dang bral//sgyur ba dam pa mchod pos 'jig rten mgon//thugs rje sngon po khyod la bdag skyabs mchi//de nas bcom ldan
140a4(mdo sde): 'das la byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi bsam pa mkhyen te/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bdag gi slad du
140a5(mdo sde): mchod pa mi bgyid kyi//gang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mu tig gi do sha la phul zhing stong pa dang /mchod pa'i dge
140a6(mdo sde): pa'i rtsa ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad sangs rgyas nyid thob par gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi bsam pa lags so//de nas bcom ldan
140a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa de na bcom ldan
140b1(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas khyod rje dag pa 'don /chu bo dang snar po dang /dmar po dang dkar po dang /gnang khang dpo sham gyi kha dog stu ba byung smra/de dag gi 'jig rten gyi kha
140b2(mdo sde): mtha' yas mu med pa 'od kyis snang bar byas nas den sing du skyes pa'i sems nA nA rnams kyi gdung ba'ang rab tu ni bur skyes/sgra dang mi rnams kyang sim par byas nas slar lags
140b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la lan du mar bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to//'od zer de dag mthong ba'i 'khor de thams cad kyang ying
140b4(mdo sde): bdun cing rab tu dgyu' ba dang /dade ba dang /yid bde ba skyes nas zil mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das g.yo ba de lags su lus btud nas 'dug te/bcom ldan 'das 'dzum
140b5(mdo sde): pa mdzod pa'i rgyu ni yin snyam mo//de nas ched dadu ldan pa gnad dga' bo spyan las langs te/blu gis phrag pu gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la betsugs te/
140b6(mdo sde): com ldan 'das gas pa lag sa su bral mo skye ba bad+mo nas/tshogs su bcang pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la dzum pa mdzad pa don nus pa/dpa'i chen khyod
140b7(mdo sde): kyis 'dzum mdzad pas//skye dang mi bcas 'jig tan cing //khyod kyis 'dzum pa mad pa la//'tsha ma ches nas ste zhing mchis//da tshi gis bral ba dpa' rgya
141a1(mdo sde): /thams cad ma rkyen pa rnam par 'dren//rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad//sgron mi mnga' ba 'du mngon gdungs//thub pa'i zhal nas 'od btang
141a2(mdo sde): ba//gsal zhing dag la yid du mchi//lha mi ngan song ma chis pa rnams//de yis reg pas bde bar gyur//sems can chen po khyod zhal nas//'ong zer dag ni rab btang ba//
141a3(mdo sde): de ni ci zhig don du bstan//thugs rje can gyis lung bstan gsol//'od zer kha dog dkar po dag/tshems kyi phrag nas mdzes byung ba//de dag gis ni nyi ma'i zer//shin tu
141a4(mdo sde): mdzes par shar ba dag/gang slar 'jig rten dgar 'gyur ba//nged du snag che'i mdog bzhin bgyis//mgon khyod gang la thugs rje zhing //su yi bskal pa nye bar gnas//
141a5(mdo sde): rgyu dang don ni ma mchis par//'dod chags bral ba 'dzum mi mdzad//thugs rje thugs kyis lung ston te//the tsho mo rnam par gsal bar mdzod//ji ltar khyod kyi zhal nas
141a6(mdo sde): su//'od zer byung nas slar log ste//'od ni 'jig rten mgon po yi//dbu yi gtsug tu nub gyur pa//glog ris bzhin du na mkha' la//dge ba dpag mod bkra bgyid pa//
141a7(mdo sde): rnam par 'dren pa de dag gyis//thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa ston//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo byang chub
141b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtsom pa med 'di bskal pa bcu gnyis na/lhas mngon par bstod pa'i bskal pa la dga' ba chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'ong chen po zhes bya
141b2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba/kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams
141b3(mdo sde): ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen po'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa gcig thub par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems
141b4(mdo sde): dpa' de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni bar kyi bskal pa bcu gnyis thub par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang kun spyodapa
141b5(mdo sde): ltar/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can rnams kyi longs spyod pa dang kun spyod pa 'ang de 'dra bar 'gyur ro//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
141b6(mdo sde): chen po rtsom pa med la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa ni khyod kyis rlung pa legs par rnyed do//byang
141b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor 'di la su zhig sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhes sam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu kho bos ni rang sangs
142a1(mdo sde): rgyas su 'gyur ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor gal te gang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su
142a2(mdo sde): mi mthong na khyod sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar lung bstan to zhes bya ba de bsting ngam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung ma
142a3(mdo sde): bstan dam/smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor don yongs su mkhyen pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro//zhes gsungs so//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i don
142a4(mdo sde): yongs su mkhyen pa gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub tu smon pa de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung mi ston to//byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub tu mi smon
142a5(mdo sde): pa de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung bstan to//de bas na don yongs su mkhyen pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir 'di skad du
142a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes gsungs na/khyod ci zhig la ltos bsams nas 'di skad du sangs rgyas su 'gyu ro zhes smra/smras pa/rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi
142a7(mdo sde): tha snyad 'di ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad do//smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor 'phags pa rnams la 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'phags pa tha snyad
142b1(mdo sde): bdogs pa ni bden pa'o//'jig rten tha spyad 'dogs pa ni log pa'o/bdun pa rab 'byor de bas na 'jig rten gyi tha snyad lag pa 'phags pa rnams la brjod par mi byas sa//btsun pa rab 'gyur
142b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten ni bsrung bar bya ba yin te/don dam pas dngangs su 'ong zhes de la 'phags pa rnams snying rje chen pos bden pa yang dag pa btang nas byis pa rnams la log par tha snyad bdogs kyi/
142b3(mdo sde): 'phags pa rnams la ma yin te/'phags pa rnams ni bden pa yang dag pa la dga' ba'o zhes 'phags pa rnams la bden pa brjod do//'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa gang zhe na/btsun pa
142b4(mdo sde): rab 'byor shin tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa'o//chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin te/'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa'o//smras pa/
142b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /'gog pa'i badren pa dang /lam gyi bden pa dang /bden pa bzhi med dam/byang chub se
142b6(mdo sde): dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor sdug bsngal 'dus byas ma yin nam/smras pa/de de bzhin te sdug bsngal ni 'dus byas so//byang chub sems dpe' rtsom pa med kyis
142b7(mdo sde): smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dris byas thams cad brdzun pa slu ba'i chos so zhes ma gsungs sa mi/smras pa/rigs kyi bu de lta'o//byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa
143a1(mdo sde): sas pa/kAsab+h+ya/klu sa m+b+ha/ k+Shan yin na/ dun na gsag rdugag nas nub sa ngan
143a2(mdo sde): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal ni 'dus byes te brdzun pag//sdug bsngas y-i sa so shes pa ni bden pas+ho//skyes pa/gas te sdug brdzu ni 'dus bya pardun pa
143a3(mdo sde): ba'i chos can te yang dag pa ma yin nang yang ses shes po 'ang bden par rung /rape byor gyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu ts+tshag/byang chub sems bab rnaMm pa mang kyis
143a4(mdo sde): zlasmras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyi sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa 'phags pa'i bden par ga la 'gyur//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu 'gog pa ni 'dus ma byas pa
143a5(mdo sde): yin na/de ci'i phyir 'phogs pa'i bden par mi 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' rlom pa med kyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor ci 'gog pa de nyid 'gog pa'i bden pa'am/
143a6(mdo sde): don te chos bag 'o zhig 'gags pa lags snumaci zhig 'gags pas 'gog pa'i bden par yid ches/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu sdug ba
143a7(mdo sde): 'gog pas 'gog pa'i bden pa zhes brjod do//byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis sdug bsngal ni 'dus byas te/brdzun
143b1(mdo sde): slu ba'i chos so zhes ma smras sam/rab 'byor kyis smras pa rigs kyi bu de lta'o//byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor chos gang brdzun pa yang dag par ma
143b2(mdo sde): yin pa de la ni 'gog pa med na khyod kyi sdug bsngal de 'gog par ga la 'gyur/de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
143b3(mdo sde): rtsom pa med la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyi spobs pa la bdag rjes su yi rang ngo //sems can thams cad kyis kyang khyod kyi spobs pa thob par gyur cig/rigs kyi
143b4(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa ni gang /bden pa mngon par rtogs pa ni gang /byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni
143b5(mdo sde): bden pa'i tshul dang 'gal ba ma yin no//de bas na chos tha~Md mngon par rton pa ni bden pa mngon pa rti/pag/tsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/rten cing
143b6(mdo sde): 'brel par 'byung ba mngon par rtogs pa ni bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'o//chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/stong pa nyid khong du chud pa ni bden pa'o//stong pa nyid mngon par rtogs
143b7(mdo sde): pa ni bden par mngon par rtogs pa'o//chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa ste mi skye ba khong du chud pa ni bden pa'o//mi skye ba mngon par rtogs pa ni bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'o//btsun
144a1(mdo sde): pa rab 'byor gang du bden pa mngon par rtogs pa de la chos gang yang sgrub pa bam spang ba med do//btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpang rnams kyi bdod pa
144a2(mdo sde): mngon par rtogs pa ni chos gang yang mngon par mi sgrub ste/btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'o//btsun pa rab 'byor bden pa
144a3(mdo sde): bden pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'gyur ba med pa'i chos kyi tshig bla dgas so//btsun pa rab 'byor ci tsam du rtog pa de tsam du log pa ste/rtog pa dang bral ba ni thar pa'o//btsun pa rab
144a4(mdo sde): 'byor gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas su 'gyu ro zhes lung bstan pa khyod rte bau le rtswa rnyed do zhe smras pa ni btsun pa rab 'byor gang dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa de dag la ni
144a5(mdo sde): lung mi ston to//gang dag rnyed pa legs par ma rnyed cing rnyed pa med pa de dag la ni lung ston to//gang dag rnyed pas dga' bar mi sems shing ma rnyed pas slo shi bar mi 'gyur
144a6(mdo sde): bde dag la lung ston to//gang dag 'khor ba las kyang mi g.yo la mya ngan las 'das pa'ang thob par 'gyur ba de dag la lung ston to//gang dag so so'i skye ba'i chos rnams
144a7(mdo sde): las kyang mi g.yo la nges par gyur pa'ang thob par 'gyur ba de dag la lung ston to//gang dag lung bstan pa thos na dga' bar mi sems pa de dag la lung ston to//rab 'byor gyis
144b1(mdo sde): smras pa/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis khong du chud pa 'di zab pa//smras pa/bdun pa rab 'byor gang dgu rtogs pas khang du chud pa mabyung ba de dag gi khang du chud pa zab bo//rab 'byor gyis
144b2(mdo sde): smras pa/khong du chud po 'di blta dag 'o//smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor lce 'dod pa rnams kyis so//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/khong du chud pa 'di rtogs par dka'o//smras pa/btsun par rab
144b3(mdo sde): 'byor mi brjon pa rnams kyis so//smras pa/rigs kyi bu tshul 'di la su zhig 'jug par 'gyur smras pa/gang dag sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ba dang /dge ba'i
144b4(mdo sde): rtsa ba ma bskyed pa ma yin par sangs rgyas byung ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa rnams kyi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na
144b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin/smras pa gang sgrub pa ston pa'o//smras pa/rigs kyi bu sgrub pa la gnas pa ji ltar rig par bya/smras pa/gang sems can rnams la log
144b6(mdo sde): pang mi sgrub pa'o//smras pa/somos can rnams li log par mi sgrub pa ji lta bu/smras pa/gang byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po mi 'dor ba'o//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/byang chub
144b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa chen po gang /smras pa/gang lus dang srog dang /dge bo'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la byin yang lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi ra
145a1(mdo sde): smras pa/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po gang /smras pa/gang thog ma kho nar sems can rnams byang chub par 'dod kyi bdag ni ma yin//
145a2(mdo sde): bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags bdun khri drug stong ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//dge slong nyis brgya ni len pa med par zag pa las
145a3(mdo sde): sems rnam par grol lo//yang de'i tshe lha'i bu bzang sems zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa des/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
145a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rtsa ba'i rten gyi gnas gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyirtsa
145a5(mdo sde): ba'i rten gyi gnas ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i sems bskyed pa'o//lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i spyod yul gang lags/
145a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang sbyin pa'ang spyod yulA~M la rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/tshul khrims mnyams pa'ang spyod yul la
145a7(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul khrims la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/bzod pa'ang spyod yul la mi gnyis pa'i chos la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin brtson 'grus kyang spyod/
145b1(mdo sde): smras pa/ma pa med pa la 'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/bsam gtan yang du lal shin tu rnams par zhugs pa'i chos thams nod la'ang mngon du phyogs sngon/
145b2(mdo sde): shes rab kyang spyod yul la spyod yul la spros pa med pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/thos pa yongs su tshol ba la'ang spyod yul la brjod du med pa'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/
145b3(mdo sde): gnas kyang spyod yul la shin tu zhi ba dang /rab tu zhi ba la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/lhag mthong yang spyad yul lo chos thams cad bstan du med pa la 'ang mngon du phyogs
145b4(mdo sde): ba yin/dran pa nye bar bzhug pa'ang spyod yul la dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/yang dag par spyod pa'ang spyod yul la mngon par 'du mi byed pa
145b5(mdo sde): la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'di spyod yul la smon po thams cad yang dag par chod pa la 'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/dbang po 'ang spyod sul la dbang po
145b6(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i cho sna rnams la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/stobs kyang spyod yul la dbyer med pa'i chos la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/byang chub kyi yon lag kyang spyod
145b7(mdo sde): yul la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la mngon du phyogs pa yin la maM yang spyod yul la lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can yongs su bskyab pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/
146a1(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'ang spyod yul la chos thams cad la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/'dul ba'ang spyod yul la chos thams cad shin tu
146a2(mdo sde): dul bar bsgom pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/pha rol tu phyin pa'ang spyod yul la pha rol dang tshu ro le la mi chags pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/'khor ba'ang spyod
146a3(mdo sde): yul la mya ngan las 'das pa la 'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/mya ngan las 'dasapa'ang spyod yul la mngon par 'du byed pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/skye
146a4(mdo sde): pa'ang spyod yul la ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/phung po 'ang spyod yul la nyon mongs pa med pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin khams kyang spyong
146a5(mdo sde): lang dbyer med pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/skye mched kyang spyod yul la 'phags pa'i skye mched la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yini/chos nyan pa'ang spyod yul lo ngas pa
146a6(mdo sde): sems pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/chos ston pa'ang spyod yul la brjod du med pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/gzugs kyi sku rnam par sgrub pabang spyod yul la chos kyi
146a7(mdo sde): sku la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'ang spyod yul la 'jug pa med pa dang /ldog pa med pa la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/nyan thos kyang spyod/
146b1(mdo sde): yul la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la'ang mngon du phyogs pa yin/rang sangs rgyas kyang spyod yul la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin te/lhal
146b2(mdo sde): bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpe'i spyod yul zhes bya'o//lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol bo/byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bdas
146b3(mdo sde): bde ba la mi lte ba dang /sems can gzhan bde ba la gtong ba dang /'khor ba na gnas shing tshul khrims dang /thos pa dang /bag yod pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa la
146b4(mdo sde): gnas shing snying rje chen po las phyir mi ldog pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa lag mthil du 'ongs kyang thob par mi byed pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'khor ba
146b5(mdo sde): nyid kyi rjes su 'breng ba dang /seM ni thaMde rjes srung ba dang /seMn thaMng lo dad pa mtshungs pa dang /sems can thams cad mtshungs par dad par byed pa dang /sems cani thams cad la bsam pa
146b6(mdo sde): mtshungs pa dang /bgeng ba'i rang bzhin can dang /zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa dang /rung ba la tshod shes pa dang /dben pa la mngon par dga' zhing tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang
146b7(mdo sde): skye bo mang po'i drung du gnas shing chos yang dag par ston pa la snyom las med pa dang /grong dang grong khyer du zhugs nas byams pa la mngon par phyogs pa dang /rnyed pa dang bkur
147a1(mdo sde): skyil mngon par mi dga' ba dang /'jig rten pa'i 'du 'dzi las 'byol ba dang /rigs pa dang bcas shing snyan pa dang /'jam por smra ba dang /sangs rgyas dang /chos
147a2(mdo sde): dang /dge 'dun rnams la dngos po thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal ba dang /gsong por smra ba dang /khro gnyer med pa dang /rtag tu gzhan gyi don la dpa' ba dang /thams cad du sems
147a3(mdo sde): chags pa med pa dang /yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba dang /'phags pa'i skye bo dang 'grogs pa dang /'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnam par spong ba dang /
147a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la bdag nyid tsam du phangs par sems pa dang /chos la srog tsam du gces par 'dzin pa dang /sgrub pa la yan lag gi dam pa mgo tsam du gces par sems pa dang /
147a5(mdo sde): chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal cha dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad ngan ngon gyis chog par sems pa dang /slob dpon dang mkhan po rnams la ston pa tsam du phangs
147a6(mdo sde): par sems shing srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtong ba dang /lung nod pa dang /kha don la brtson pa dang /nam gyi cha stod dang /nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang
147a7(mdo sde): bsam gtan dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa mngon du byed pa dang /ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams tshul bzhin so sor rtog pa dang shes rab kyis rab tu rtogs par
147b1(mdo sde): byed pa dang /sems la rlog pa med pa dang /bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /nang du so sor rtog pa dang /phyi rol tu mi rgyug pa dang /lus yongasu gtong ba dang /zhe sdang rnam
147b2(mdo sde): par spong ba dang /gti mug rnam par 'joms pa dang /shes rab 'bar bar byed pa dang /so sor thar pa'i sdom pa dang /dul ba las phyir mi 'da' ba dang /thams cad du sems cad
147b3(mdo sde): shes pa dang /thams cad du shes bzhin dang ldan pa dang /sems phyin ci mi log pa dang /sems dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba dang /rtag tu pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la rab tu
147b4(mdo sde): brtson pa dang /brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang /rtag tu dge ba gang yin tshol zhing ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams chud mi gzon pa dang /gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par rab tu ston pa
147b5(mdo sde): dang /sems zang zing med pa dang /rtag tu dbang po bsdams pa dang /rtag tu sems mnyam par bzhag pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol ba dang /'khor ba mi gtong ba dang
147b6(mdo sde): rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa dang /grags pa dang ma grags pa dang /bstod pa dang smad pa dang /bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi sgul ba dang /thams cad du tshod shes pa dang /thams cad
147b7(mdo sde): du dran pa nye bar bzhog pa dang /sbyin pas longs spyod che ba dang /tshul khrims kyis lha dang mir skye ba dang /bzod pas mdzes pa dang /brtson 'grus kyis nyon mongs pa yongs su
148a1(mdo sde): 'dor ba dang /bsam gtan rnams kyis sems las su rung ba dang /shes rab kyis 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams rab tu rtogs pa dang /
148a2(mdo sde): bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyis kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnams kyis dul ba dang /bden pa dang /gtong ba dang /nye bar zhi ba dang /shes rab kyi byin gyis brlabs rnams
148a3(mdo sde): kyis sems shin tu dul ba dang /bsam gtan rnams kyis sems yid du 'ong ba dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis zab pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba
148a4(mdo sde): bzhin du yongs su shes pa dang /stong pa nyid sgom pas lta ba dang bral ba dang /mtshan ma med pa sgom pas rnam par mi rtog pa dang /smon pa med pa sgom pa yongs su 'dzin pa med pa
148a5(mdo sde): dang /pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pas theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud pa dang /thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la gtod pa dang /byang chub sem
148a6(mdo sde): dpa'i sa bcu po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su skong ba dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su tshol bas yon tan thams cad skye ba'i sgo dang /slob dpon
148a7(mdo sde): dang /mkhan po dang /bla ma la sri zhu byed pas sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed pa dang /rang gi lus dang sems yongs su shes pas thams cad shes pa nyid dang /nga rgyal
148b1(mdo sde): med pas gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /sems can thams cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bas spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba dang /cho mtsho dgu byin pas mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang /sem/
148b2(mdo sde): can thams cad dang mthun par 'jug pas dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang theg pa chen po yang dag par rab tu ston pas cad shes pa'i sa dang byang chub kyi sems yang dag par
148b3(mdo sde): rab tu ston pas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dang /stong pa nyid rab tu ston pas bag chags yang dag par 'joms pa dang /chos byin pas so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang /dran pa rab
148b4(mdo sde): tu byin pas gzungs thob pa dang /chos khong du chud pas spobs pa thob pa dang /spobs pa nye bar bsgrub pas phyed par lung ston pa dang /nyam chung ba rnams la bzod pas sred med kyi
148b5(mdo sde): bu'i lus thob pa dang /tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams la bzod pas mthong ma thag tu sems can thams cad dad par 'gyur ba dang /gzhan dag gis gnod sems rab tu zhi bar
148b6(mdo sde): byed pa dang /rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa dang /brtson 'grus brtsams pa mngon par shes par 'gyur ba dang /ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'byin pas 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa
148b7(mdo sde): dang /spyod lam yang dag par rab tu byin pas kun tu mdzes pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sbyor bas sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos dang rang sangs
149a1(mdo sde): rgyas rnams dang 'grogs pa dang /'dod pa yongs su gtong bas 'jig rten thams cad yid ches pa dang /khro ba yongs su 'dor bas 'jig rten thams cad
149a2(mdo sde): dga' ba dang /phrag dog yongs su 'dor bas rnyed pa thams cad kyi mchog dang grags pa'i mchog dang /gnas byin pas 'jig rten thams cad ston pa dang /rnyed pa dang /bkur sti
149a3(mdo sde): dang /tshigs su bcad pa rab tu byin pas chos la rab tu dga' ba dang /glags pa'i sgra dang /gsong bar smra bsang gi yongs su dag pa dang /snyan par smra bas tshangs pa'i sgra dang /
149a4(mdo sde): 'jam por smra bas bya ka la ping+ga'i sgra dang /khong khro bo med pa'i sems kyis 'jig rten thams cad du grags pa dang /sems can thams cad la mi slu bas dbang gcig por 'gyur
149a5(mdo sde): ba dang /ltung ba mi gleng bas mngal gyi gnas las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /srog gcod pa spyod bas tshe dpag tu med pa dang /rkun po yongs su spong bas na mkha'i mdzod dang /sdug
149a6(mdo sde): pa'i dngos po yongs su gtong bas lag na rin po che dang /byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bas longs spyod mi zad pa dang /'dod pa la log par g.yem pa yongs su spong bas skyes bu
149a7(mdo sde): chen po dang /brdzun du smra ba yongs su spong bas ngag gi gsang ba thob pa dang /phra ma yongs su spong bas 'jig rten thams cad kyi ston pa dang /ngag rtsub po yongs su spong bas
149b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyis bstod pa'i snod dang /tshig kyal ba mi smra bas g.yog mi phyed pa dang /bsgrub sems yongs su spong bra la gter chen po rnyed pa dang /gnod sems yongs su spong bas stes/
149b2(mdo sde): su gyur pa dang /log par lci ba yongs su spong bas 'jig rten thams cad rten pa dang /chos rgya chen po la sbyor bas stobs bcu zhing dang /sbyin pa thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa la mi
149b3(mdo sde): bas sangs rgyas kyi chos phyir mi ldog pa thob pa dang /kun tu 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su gtong bas mi 'jigs pa thob pa ste/rigs kyi bungs bskal pa 'am bskal pa las lhag par byang chub
149b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' cho ga bstan kyang mthar phyin pa mi 'gyur ro//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis cho ga tshad med de/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu de ltar
149b5(mdo sde): na cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa yin no//de ltar cho ga dong spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rnyed par dko' ba'i 'du shes can ma
149b6(mdo sde): yin no//lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'o shes bzhin dang ldan pa zhes bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i
149b7(mdo sde): bu gang byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ting nge 'dzin mi 'dor la/ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis kyang mi skye ba dang /ting nge 'dzin las log nas gang du sems can gyi don bya ba der skye
150a1(mdo sde): ba skye/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes bzhin dang ldan pa zhes bya'o//lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang
150a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dben pa zhes pagyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang thams cad de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /chos
150a3(mdo sde): kyi dbyings su mthong ba de skye bo mang po'i nang du song yang dben par shes par bya ste/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dben pa zhes bya'o//gang gnyis la blo mi 'jug pa de ni shin
150a4(mdo sde): tu dben pa zhes bya'o//lho'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par bzhag pa zhes bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
150a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' yid kyis smon pa thams cad bral zhing chos gang yang gzung bar ram spang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/de gang dang gang yang dag par rjes su mthong
150a6(mdo sde): ba de dang de stong pa dang yang dag pa ma yin par mthong ba ste/lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par bzhag pa zhes bya'o//lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan
150a7(mdo sde): 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpas gang bdag dang sems can thams cad
150b1(mdo sde): stong pa nyid du mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'o//lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bya'o//lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'ad
150b2(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dul ba zhes bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa'o//lha'i bu bzang sems kyis gsol pa/
150b3(mdo sde): ji ltar na zhi ba zhes bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de zhi ba zhes bya'o//lha'i bu bzang
150b4(mdo sde): sems kyis gsol pa/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/byang chub semasang pa'i byang chub ni rang gi kho na las pa lags so//byang chub
150b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni ji lta ji ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su sbyong ba de lta de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su 'dzin to//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gang nas
150b6(mdo sde): kyang blang ba ma lags/gang du'ang bkur ba ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la ye shes rnam par dag pa ni byang chub ste/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bzod pa'i rjes su
150b7(mdo sde): zhugs pa ni byang chub kyi spyod pa lags so//gang 'di ltar shes pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das gang dag mnyam pa nyid 'di la zhugs pa de dang de dag
151a1(mdo sde): ni bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa lags so//gang dag chos mnyam pa nyid 'di la bsten pa de dang de dag ni tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa lags/
151a2(mdo sde): so//gang dag chos mnyam pa nyid di nyid la bzod pa de dang de dag ni bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa lags so//gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la thos pa dang /sems pa dang /sgom
151a3(mdo sde): ba la brtson pa de dang de dag ni brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa lags so//gang dag chos mnyam pa nyid 'di la nges par rtogs pa de dang de dag ni bsam gtan phun sum tsho/
151a4(mdo sde): pa lags so//gang dag chos mnyam pa nyid 'di rnam par dpyod pa de dang de dag ni shes rab dang ldan pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gang dad pa rnyed pa
151a5(mdo sde): de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo //de dag gi chos mngon sum du bgyis so//bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bdud btul to//bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos kyi rnam
151a6(mdo sde): grangs 'di rab tu ston pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khong du chud pa de
151a7(mdo sde): dag chos rtogs pa lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu bzang sems la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/bzang sems legs so legs so//de de bzhin no//ji skad
151b1(mdo sde): smras pa de bzhin te/bzang sems gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byang chub ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las rab tu bstan to//
151b2(mdo sde): gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa de tha~Md kyang chos kyis rnam grangs 'di las bshad do//byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par 'gyur ba de dag ni/
151b3(mdo sde): rnyed pa chen po 'byor par 'gyur ro//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi lag tu song ba de dag ni chos kyi gter chen po thob par 'gyur ro//gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su
151b4(mdo sde): 'dzin pa de dang de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas yid brtan pa'o//de dang de dag ni gsang ba 'dzin pa'o//de dang de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod par
151b5(mdo sde): byed pa'o//de dag ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o//gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos shing thos nas kyang mos pa de dang de dag ni lha'i bu nga la lan du phan 'dogs pa'o//
151b6(mdo sde): lha'i bu de dag ni phyogs thams cad du mun pa med par byed par 'gyur ba'o//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad la bka' stsal pa/khyed las su dag phyi ma'i tshe
151b7(mdo sde): phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par su spro/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med stan las langs te/bla gas phrag pa gcig
152a1(mdo sde): tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni slad
152a2(mdo sde): ma'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dge par rab tu bshad par spro'o//bcom ldan 'das rtsom pa mang pos ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par rngo mi thog go//bdag ni sems
152a3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa ma mchi ste/rtsom pa ma mchis shing sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa ste/zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems dang /rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang /tshigs su bcad
152a4(mdo sde): pa thams cad la re ba ma mchis pas chos zab mo la bzod pa 'di yang dag par bshad par bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das rnyed pa dang /bkur sti la gnas
152a5(mdo sde): pas ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par rngo mi thog pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas chos kyi rnam grang
152a6(mdo sde): 'di nyan pa dang /'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /yi ger 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /bris te glegs bum du bgyis nas 'chang bar 'gyur ba de dag ni bcom ldan 'das
152a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis byin gyi rlab su rig par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med la legs so zhes bye ba byin te/
152b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu legs so legs so//sems de 'dra bas daM pA chos yongs su gzung bar nus so//byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
152b2(mdo sde): gang snying rje chen po dang ma bral ba des dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par rngo thog go/bdag ni snying rje chen po la dmigs nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad par bgyi'o//byang chub
152b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' byams pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byams pa'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rngo thog go/de ci'i slad du zhe na/gnod sems mang po la dam
152b4(mdo sde): pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byams pa'i sems kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad par bgyi'o//byang chub sems dpa' mthong
152b5(mdo sde): na dgas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can rnams kyis mthong na ngoms par mi 'gyur ba des dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par rngo thog ste/
152b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad la khong khro ba ma mchis pa'i sems kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su bzung bar bgyi'o//byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon
152b7(mdo sde): gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can rnams kyi don du sdug bsngal thams cad la spro ba dang /gang sems can rnams sangs rgyas nyid yang
153a1(mdo sde): dag par bsgrub par 'tshal zhing sems can thams cad bsgral nas slad kyis bdag brgal bar 'tshal ba de chos kyi rnam grang dri 'dzin par 'gyur te/
153a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi don du sangs rgyas nyid yang dag par bsgrub par 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad bsgral nas
153a3(mdo sde): slad kyis bdag rgal bar 'tshal lo//bsgral bar bgyi ba dang /sgrol ba po dang /bsgral ba'ang mi dmigs par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de lta bu'i sems dang ldan
153a4(mdo sde): bas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung bar bgyi'o//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang 'di ltar bdag gis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ngo ngo/
153a5(mdo sde): snyam pa 'di ni 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log go/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni re shig bdag nyid dul bar bgyi/bdag nyid zhi bar bgyi'o//de bdag nyid dul
153a6(mdo sde): zhing zhi la nye bar zhi nas chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar rngo thog ste/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bdag nyid dul zhing zhi la nye bar zhi nas chos kyi
153a7(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos yongs su zin pa de dag la legs so zhes
153b1(mdo sde): bya ba byin te/skyes bu dam pa dag 'di ltar khyed cag sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar spro ba ni legs so legs so//'di ni
153b2(mdo sde): khyed dong 'tsham mo//dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos so//byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu dam pa'i chos yongs su
153b3(mdo sde): gzung ba la brtson par bya'o//rigs kyi bu dag chos yang dag par brjod pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang glags pa dang /kun chub par byas pa'i byang
153b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni skye ba med pa 'gag pa med pa'i sku ni chos kyi sku'o//chos kyi sku ni sangs rgyas kyi sku'o zhes sangs rgyas la snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur
153b5(mdo sde): ro//chos thams cad ni ma byas pa 'dus ma byas pa'o zhes chos la snang ba chen po'i 'thob par 'gyur ro//nga yi ba med pa dang /yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ni bcom ldan 'ang
153b6(mdo sde): kyi slob ma'i dge 'dun no zhes dge 'dun la snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro//snying rje chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i slob pa'i rtsa ba'o zhes byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa
153b7(mdo sde): rnams la snang ba thob par 'gyur ro//nges pa'i tshig thams cad ni skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes spobs pa'i snang ba thob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam
154a1(mdo sde): grangs 'di ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas dang /brgya byin gyi gnas dang /klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i gnas su spyod par 'gyur/de'i 'og tu dzam+bu
154a2(mdo sde): gling du spyod par 'gyur te/sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su gzung ba dang /byang chub sems dpas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba/drang ba/g.yo med pa
154a3(mdo sde): nges pa/chos zab mo la mos pa de dag gi lag tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med dang /
154a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam par gnon pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang nyan thos chen po de dag dang lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i
154a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa stong phrag brgya pa'i mdo las
154a6(mdo sde): rnam pa med kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI gar+b+ha dang /bi dza ya shI la dang /shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes
154a7(mdo sde): sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang btsos nas gtan la phab po//skar mas zhus so//
154b1(mdo sde): /rgyu gar skad du/da sha tsakra TI ti gA b+hA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/bod skad du/'dus pa chen po las sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba thegs pa chen
154b2(mdo sde): po'i mdo/bam po dang po//sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das ri kha la
154b3(mdo sde): de ya zhes bya ba drang srong thub pa mang po'i spyod yul gyi gnas na/dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/thams cad kyang nyan thos
154b4(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun chen po sha stag go//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs cig pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i dge
154b5(mdo sde): 'dun chen po shra stag ste/zla ba'i snying po zhes bya ba bai shud ma thag tu/de'i tshe lho phyogs nas bsrung gi sprin chen po 'dus pa las bsung gi char chen po rab tu 'bab bo//
154b6(mdo sde): me tog gi sprin chen po 'dus pa las me tog gi tshor chen po rab tu 'bab bo//rin po che'i lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin chen po 'dus pa las rin po che'i lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi char chen
154b7(mdo sde): po rab tu 'bab po//lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin chen po 'dus pa las lha rdzas kyi gos kyi char chen po rab tu 'bab bo//de lta bu'i sprin dang char chen pos drang srong thub pa mang po
155a1(mdo sde): spyod yul gnas kyi ri de la khyab par gyur to//bsung dang /me tog dang /rin po che'i rgyun dang /gos de dag las chos chen po'i sgra dbyu sa rnam parna
155a2(mdo sde): brgya stong snyed grags par gyur pa ni 'di lta ste/dkon mchog la skyabs su 'gro ba'i sgra dang /bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa'i sgra dang /dang des shing bzod pa can gyi sgra dang/
155a3(mdo sde): brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i sgra dang /bdud bzhi btul ba'i sgra dang /shes rab la gzhol zhing 'jug pa'i sgra dang /grags pa chen pos 'jig rten gsum du rgya cher grags
155a4(mdo sde): pa'i sgra dang /dran pa dang /ting nge dzin dang /gzungs kyi khyad par la nan tan bya ba'i sgra dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i sgra dang /'dod
155a5(mdo sde): chags kyis yongs su skyo ba'i sgra dang /gzugs ni chu'i lbu ba lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang /tshor ba ni chu'i chu 'ur lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang /'du shes ni smi'i rgyu lta bu
155a6(mdo sde): zhes pa'i sgra dang /'du byed ni chu shing lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang /rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang /mi rtag pa'i sgra dang /sdug bsngal po'i sgra dang /
155a7(mdo sde): bdag med pa'i sgra dang /stong pa'i sgra dang /'dzem pa dang /ngo tsha bar ldan pa'i sgra dang /ku re spong ba'i sgra dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i sgra dang /byams pa dang /snying rje dang
155b1(mdo sde): dga' ba dang /btang snyoms kyi sgra dang /chos kun chub pa'i sgra dang /mtho ris su skye ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra dang /theg pa gsum la 'bab pa'i sgra dang /chos chen po'i 'khor
155b2(mdo sde): lo bskor ba'i sgra dang /chos chen po'i char rab tu'i bab pa'i sgra dang /sems can yongs su smon par bya ba'i sgra dang /ngan song gsum las yongs su sgrol ba'i sgra dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug
155b3(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i nan tan bya ba'i sgra dang /thabs mkhas pa'i sgra dang /sa bcu 'bab pa'i sgra dang /mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa'i sgra dang /bla na med pa'i theg pa
155b4(mdo sde): chen po rnam par rol po'i sgra dang /sa las phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra dang /mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i sgra dang /spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i sgra dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgya mtsho chen po la
155b5(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i sgra'i nga ro grags par gyur to//de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyis de lta bu'i sprin dang cha re rnam pa sna tshogs mthong zhing de ltar chos kyi sgra'i nga ro'ang
155b6(mdo sde): thos par gyur nas de dag gi so so'i yid ci la mos pa bzhin du so so'i lus la rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bsung dang /me tog dang /rin po che'i rgyan dang /lha rdzas kyi gos dam pas yongs su ba
155b7(mdo sde): par mthong ngo //yang so so'i lag mthil gnyis na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs shing yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de dag re re las kyang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin
156a1(mdo sde): du 'bab par mthong ngo //gzhan yang nor bu rin po che de dag las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs su byung ste/'od zer de dag gi dbang gis sems can ded
156a2(mdo sde): so nas phyogs bcu'i chu klung gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mthong ngo //yang 'od zer de dag gi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa de re re
156a3(mdo sde): la'ang 'khor mang po tshad med pas bsti stang dang bcas te yongs su bskor bar mthong ngo //gzhan yang 'od zer de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang nad
156a4(mdo sde): kyis gzir ba thams cad kyang 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu nad kyi sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur to//gang bsad pa la thug pa dang /btson du bzung zhing bcings pa dag kyang
156a5(mdo sde): 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu de dag las yongs su thar bar gyur to//gang lus dang ngag dang yid mi bde bar spyod pa'i gnas ngan len lci ba dag kyang 'od de'i dbang gis shin tu/
156a6(mdo sde): yang zhing rnam par dag par gyur to//gang bkres shing skom pa dag kyang 'drangs shing ngoms par gyur to//gang gsod pa dang /chad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nyon mongs par gyur pa
156a7(mdo sde): dag kyang 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu sdug bsngal ba dang bral bar gyur to//gang bgo ba dang /rin po che'i rgyan dang /dbyig pa dang /nir rdzas kyis brel cing phongs pa dag
156b1(mdo sde): kyang bsams pa bzhin du 'byor cing ldan par gyur to//sems can gang srog gcod pa la dga' zhing mos pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du dga' zhing mos pa dag kyang 'od zer des reg ma
156b2(mdo sde): thag tu srog gcod pa yongs su spong ba la dga' zhing mos pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du yongs su spong ba la dgu' zhing mos par gyur to//sems can gang 'dod pa mi rnyed pa rnam pa
156b3(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal bar gyur bdag kyang 'od zer des reg ma thag tu ji ltar re ba bzhin du rnyed par gyur to//gzhan yang 'od zer de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
156b4(mdo sde): cad kyi sems can gang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa dag thams cad zhi nas rab tu bde ba dang ldan par mthong ngo //gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad du 'od kyis
156b5(mdo sde): snang bar byas pas sprin dang /rdul dang /na buni dang /rlung dang /ji char dang /bkra mi shis pa'i sgra dang /dri mi zhim pa dang /kha ba dang /tsha ba la sogs pa'i ro ngan pa dang /yid du myi
156b6(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i reg bya dang /'jigs skrag pa dang /gnod pa mang po rnams med par gyur to//gzhan yang las ngan pa dang /log pa'i ngag dang /log pa'i bsam pa dang /log par phyogs
156b7(mdo sde): pa dang yongs su bral te lhag par mi grang ba dang /lhag par mi che ba dang /rab tu zhi zhing bde ba dang /sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa dang /bde ba'i yo byad dam pa thams cad
157a1(mdo sde): kyis yongs su gang bar gyur to//de'i tshe nA 'khor mang po rnams kyi so so'i lus kyi sa'i khams lhag par lci zhing mi theg pa tsam du gyur to//ltas 'ad
157a2(mdo sde): bu gyur pa mthong nas thams cad kyang dngangs te/de ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis ltas 'di lta bur gyur snyam du rtog pa skyes so//de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na brgya byin lha'i
157a3(mdo sde): dbang po dri ma med par skyes zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug pa las langs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal to/bcom
157a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang na ba do logs su thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to//bden par gsung zhing bden gzigs pa//bden la rab gnas thub pa khyod//'du
157a5(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor mang thams cad la//mthar phyon bden pa'i chos gsungs shig/so so'i skye bo mang po dag/sdug bsngal rgya dang sdug bsngal sel//ci yi slad du 'khor 'dor na//
157a6(mdo sde): sprin dang char rnams gda' bar gyur//'khor rnams rab tu dga' rangs nas//shin tu dad pa'i bsam pa skyes//theg pa chen por thams cad gzhol//yang dag lha skye som nyi
157a7(mdo sde): rgal//'khor mang lha dang mi yi lus//lhag par sa yi khams lci bas//rang gis mi theg gyur pa 'di//ci yi rkyen gyis ltas 'di byung //lag mthil gnyis na nor bu'i las
157b1(mdo sde): rin chen char 'bab 'od kyang 'gyed//phyogs bcur snang byas sdig pa gsal//sdug bsngal zhi nas bde ba thob//'dren pas gsungs shig ce yi rkyen//'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad/
157b2(mdo sde): la//spos dang phreng ba sna tshogs kyis//so so'i lus lo brgyan pa gda'//lha dang mi kun the tshom skyes//ci yi rgyu dang ci yi rkyen//su zhig gang nas 'dir mchi na//rdzu 'phrul mthu 'di
157b3(mdo sde): ston par gyur//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am//'on te tshangs pa 'am bdud lags samo//brgya byin lags sam su mchi ba//'dren pa chen pos bshad du gsal//de'i tshe
157b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dri ma med par skyes pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//khyed kyis 'di ltar shes par byos shig/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying
157b5(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba yod de/sngon bskal pa chen po tshad med grangs med pa'i bar du rnyog pa lnga'i tshe/sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can yongs su smin par
157b6(mdo sde): byed pa de/da ltar 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad cu dang bcas te/'jig rten gyi khams 'dir nga la phyag 'tshal ba dang /bsnyen bkur dang mchod
157b7(mdo sde): po bya ba dang /gzhan yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la blta ba dang /rjes su yi rang ba bskyed pa'i phyir 'khor dang bcas te dge sbyong gi gzugs kyis 'dir 'ong bas
158a1(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa'i mthus cho 'phrul 'di dag bstan to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po zhes bya ba de tshad med grangs med bsam
158a2(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par gyis yongs su brgyan pas nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad kyis dpog nus pa med do//byang
158a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de ni yon tan phul du gyur pa thams cad kyi gter du gyur pa'o//rnam par grol ba'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas yin no//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
158a4(mdo sde): mig yongs su dag par byed pa'o//mya ngani las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i ded dpon du gyur pa'o//yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ltar rin po che thams cad char bzhin du 'bab pas
158a5(mdo sde): ji ltar re zhing 'dod pa thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa'o//tshong pa mang pA rin po che'i gling lta bu'o//dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel zhing skye ba'i phyir zhing gshin pa lta bu'o//
158a6(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba'i bde ba la 'jog pa'i phyir snod lta bu'o//rin po che dam pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i phyir yon tan gyi bum po bzang po lta bu'o//dge ba'i nan
158a7(mdo sde): tan can la snang bar byed pa'i phyir nyi ma gosal ba lta bu'o//lam stor ba rnams la snang bar byed pa'i phyir sgron ma lta bu'o//nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel ba'i phyir zla ba
158b1(mdo sde): ltar sim pa lta bu'o//rkang med pa la theg par gyur pa lta bu'o//lam ring por 'gro ba la tshogs kyi stegs bu lta bu'o//'phrog smad pa la lam ston pa lta bu'o//smyos shing 'khrugs
158b2(mdo sde): pa la sman dam pa lta bu'o//nad kyis gzir ba la sman pa mkhas pa dang phrad pa lta bu'o//rgas shing 'khogs pa la brten dang khang ba lta bu'o//ngal ba drang nub pa la khri dang stan
158b3(mdo sde): lta bu'o//chu bo bzhi rgal ba la zam pa lta bu'o//pha rol tu 'gro ba la gru dang gzings lta bu'o//dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam gsum gyi 'bras bu khyad par can smin par byed pa'o//da
158b4(mdo sde): ba rnam gsum gyi gzhi 'dren cing rgyan du 'bebs pa'o//sbyin pa gtong ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa 'khor lo ltar 'jug pa'o//tshul khrims srung ba brtan pasi ri rab lhun po lta bu'o//
158b5(mdo sde): brtson 'grus grazhig par dka' bo ni rdo rje rin po che lta bu'o//bzod pa mi g.yo ba ni sa chen po lta bu'o//bsam gtan zab pa ni gter gsang ba lta bu'o//mnyam par 'dzeg
158b6(mdo sde): byas mdzes pa ni me tog gi drang ba lta bu'o//shes rab zad cing yangs pa ni rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'o//cis kyang mi chags pa ni na mkha' lta bu'o//'bras bu dam pa'i rgyu dang nye ba
158b7(mdo sde): ni me tog rgyas pa lta bu'o//mu stegs can 'dul ba la seng ge'i rgyal po lto bu'o//lha'i bdud yongs su 'joms pa ni klu 'am glang po che lta bu'o//nyon mongs po'i dgra
159a1(mdo sde): thams cad gcod pa ni sbya'i ralA g+h+ri g+hA zla'o//'du 'dzi mang pos ba n+ya rang sang+yas rgyus kyi theg pu wA bu'o//nyon mongs pa'i rlom la d+hA ngan/
159a2(mdo sde): chu dang ba lta bu'o//mi gtsang ba'i nyal nyil sel ba ni rlung drag po lta bu'o//kun nas nyon mongs pas glags mi gcod pa ni mtshon rnon po lta bu'o//'jigs pa dang
159a3(mdo sde): che ba kun las srung ba ni gnyen nam mdza' bo lta bu'o//phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra las skyob pa ni 'obs sam mkhar lta bu'o//nyam nga ba thams cad las grol bar byed pas pa
159a4(mdo sde): ma lta bu'o//zhen cing nyam chung bar sbed pa ni nags stug po lta bu'o//dbyar lam ring por 'gro ba la bsil grib kyi shing chen po lta bu'o//tsha ba dang skom gyis gdungs pa
159a5(mdo sde): rnams la chu grang lta bu'o//bkres pa rnams la 'bras bu zhim po lta bu'o//gcer bu rnams la bgo ba'i gos byed pa'o//tsha bas nyon pa rnams las sprin stug por gyur
159a6(mdo sde): ba'o//dbul phongs pa la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po cher gyur pa'o//'jigs skrag pa dag la skyabs dang go nas su gyur pa'o//lo tog rnams la char bIr gyur pa'o//
159a7(mdo sde): chu rnyog ma can rnams la nor bu chu 'angang du gyur pa'o//sems can mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mi 'gong bor byed pas spyod yul dam pa ston cing 'khor spro ba dang tshim par byed
159b1(mdo sde): pa'o//sems can rnams lhag pa'i 'dzom pa dang ngo tsha ba la bskul zhing 'dzud pa'o//bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs sogs pa la de'i rgyan dang ldan par byed pa'o//nyon
159b2(mdo sde): mongs pa yongs su sel ba la skyug pa dang 'khru ba'i sman lta bur gyur pa'o//sems 'khrugs pa sdud pa ni mnyam par 'jog pa'i spyod yul lto bur gyur pa'o//spobs pa tho
159b3(mdo sde): pa med pa ni zo chun rgyud pa'i 'khor lo lta bu'o//dmigs pa la sems sdug pa ni gzugs bzang po la rtog pa lta bu'o//bzod pa brtan pa ni ri rab lhun po lta bu'o//gzugs zab cing rgya che
159b4(mdo sde): ba ni rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thogs pa med pa ni ni mkha' lta bu'o//sgrib pa'i bag chags thams cad yongs su sel ba ni ji ltar nyi ma tsha bas 'khyag pa cha mtsham
159b5(mdo sde): bzhu ba lta bu'o//rtag tu bsam gtan dang /gzugs med pa dang /yang dag pa'i lam le rol cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rin po che'i dam pa'i gling lta bur gyur pas
159b6(mdo sde): ched du ma brtsams kyang chos chen po'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro//rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po de ni de lta bu'i yon tan gyi khyad par
159b7(mdo sde): tshad med grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa de 'khor dang bces te gnas 'dir phyin du nye bar 'od las 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul dang ltas sngar bstan pa yin no//bcom
160a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i yon tan mang po bshad ma thag tu/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po 'khor byang
160a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu dang bcas te/rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus dge sbyong gi gzugs su ston cing lho phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te/
160a3(mdo sde): 'khor mang po dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos gtugs te phyag btsal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas/'greng
160a4(mdo sde): ba bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//rnam par 'dren pa rkang gnyis mchog/byams po'i thugs kyis kun la skyob//so che na ltar ni shin tu bzod//zhe
160a5(mdo sde): sdang khro ba'i sems kun bsal//mtshan dang dpe byad mchog ldan pas//sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing rab brgyan//bden pa'i byams dang snying rje yis//rgyal ba'i zhing kun rab tu 'ge
160a6(mdo sde): sred pa'i dra ba kun bcad nas//yang dag ci bzhin bde bar gnas//yongs su dag pa'i zhing spangs nas//rnyog pa can gyi sems can dgrol//rnyog pa'i zhing 'dir dam bcas te//
160a7(mdo sde): ngan 'gro sems can smin par mdzad//yang dag brtan pa'i rtsol ba yis//ring mo zhig nas dka' thub spyad//yun ring dka' thub spyad pa dag/zos nas 'jigs pa'i sems
160b1(mdo sde): kyang skye//sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang //brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab bskyed//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //tshad med nyan thos bsnyen bkur mchod//gzhan yang skye
160b2(mdo sde): mang po dag/bkris skom na 'chi kun las brla //so so'i skye bo gzhan gyi phyir//lus srog mo cha gos meng du btang //yang dag dam pa'i chos tshol phyir//sha dang rus pa'ang mo du
160b3(mdo sde): btang //bdag gi bde ba kun btang nas//skye bo rnams la thugs brtser dgongs//so so'i skye bo mang po'i phyir//the tshom dra ba gcod la brtson//dbang po drug rnams rab bsdams
160b4(mdo sde): nas//'dod pa thams cad ring du spangs//'dus byas mi rtag sdug bsngal te//bdag med stong pa nyid du rtogs//sdug bsngal las kun skye ba yi//rgyu ni 'dod chags sred pa'o//
160b5(mdo sde): de phyir dbang po drug pas sngar//'dod chags yongs su gcad par bya//sems can gnas pa'i khams kun tu//rtag par thugs rje chen pos gnas//byang chub mchog tu sangs
160b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyang //sngon gyi smon lam kun mi gtong //sems can gang zhig sdug bsngal gyis//rnam par gzer ba dag gzigs nas//shin tu 'bab pa'i brtson 'grus kyis//de
160b7(mdo sde): las sgrol phyir rab tu brtson//sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus//bsam gtan shes rab kun bsgoms nas//ji ltar ma ni bu gcig bla//byams pa'i sems kyi gas
161a1(mdo sde): bzhin du//sngon yang sems can ris kun la//rtag tu byams pa'i thugs bskyed pas//de phyir myur du sangs rgyas nas//tshad med pa yi 'khor rnams sgro/
161a2(mdo sde): ji tsam byang chub spyod bsgoms pa//sems can don du ma bsngos med//de bas sems can thams cad la//pha rol phyin po drug mi gtong //rtag tu dus ngan tha ma'i tshe//bla med
161a3(mdo sde): byang chub bsgrubs pas na//da yang dus ngan tha ma'i tshe//bla med byang chub mngon sangs rgyas//ngan par lta ba'i lho klu mi//gnod sbyin dag ni kun btul te//the tshom gcod
161a4(mdo sde): cing bder bkod pa//rdo rje lta bu'i lam la'o//tshad med pa yi skye bo dag/byang chub mchog tu lung yang ston//mchod 'os 'dren pa'i gtsor gyur to//mchog gi bsod
161a5(mdo sde): nams zhing du gyur//dpe zla med pa'i bcom ldan 'das//byams pas 'gro ba kun la skyog/tshod med grags pa chen po yis//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten yongs su khyab//
161a6(mdo sde): de bas byang chub sems dpa' rnam//bdag gi don du bsgrubs pa'i phyir//kun nas lhan cig 'dir 'dus nas//thub pa chen po spyan sngar lhags//dam pa'i chos rnams thos
