161a7(mdo sde): nas ni//rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te//lhag par yang dag brtson pa skyed nas//byang chub spyod la nan tan bgyid//rnam par 'dren pa'i chos kyi mthus//thams cad
161b1(mdo sde): mngon par 'tshang rgya bas//de bas deng 'dir 'dren khyod kyis//bsdus pa'i 'khor ni sngon ma byung //gnod sbyin khri phrug bcu gsum skyed//rtag tu sha za khrag 'thung ba/thams cad sdig
161b2(mdo sde): pa'i las btang nas//byang chub chen por 'bad cing gzhol//kha cig khyad par gzugs mchog dang //bzod pa ting nge 'dzin yang thob//kha cig zag pa kun zad nas//'jig rten
161b3(mdo sde): mchog gi dgra bcom gyur//kha cig tshad med bzhi bsgoms shing //kha cig bsdu ba bzhi la gnas//kha cig yang dag rig bzhi thog/kha cig mthun pa'i bzod la gnas//kha cig
161b4(mdo sde): dpa' 'gro'i ting 'dzin thob//kha cig shes rab mig dang ldan//kha cig mi skye bzod la gnas//de kun 'dren pas byin gyis brlabs//bcom ldan gzi brjid chen po'i mthus//
161b5(mdo sde): bdud kyi 'khor rnams bcom nas su//rnam pa dgu bcu rtsa lnga yi//mu stegaso can gyi ris kun brtul//sems can dmyal ba byol song dang //yi dgras lha min rgyud kun btsam//
161b6(mdo sde): bde bas sems can bden pa rnams//thams cad rgyal ba'i spyan sngar lhags//nad dang mtshan gyis 'jigs pa dang //mu gres 'jigs pa'ang deng 'dir btsal//sems
161b7(mdo sde): can mdongs shing 'thom pa dang //yang dag lam ni stor ba bsgral//nyon mongs mos shing 'khrugs pa dag/thams cad zhi ba'i lam la bkod//bdag gi bya ba kun spangs
162a1(mdo sde): te//lcags nus bcom ldan zhabs la 'jug/dpag tu med pa'i zhing rnams na//bcom ldan da ltar bzhugs pa'i rnams//thams cad khyod la kun
162a2(mdo sde): bsngags pas//thos nas thams cad 'di ru lhags//thams cad mkhyen pa rgya mtsho yi//yang dag yon tan tshad ma mchis//sems can mang po'i don mdzad pa//mos pa
162a3(mdo sde): sems kyis phyag 'tshal lo//tshad med bsod nams rdzogs bgyis pas//bcom ldan zhabs la byug 'tshal gyur//tshad med bskal pa'i bar du yang //mchod pa mang
162a4(mdo sde): mchod par shog/bdag kyang bcom ldan ji bzhin du//de lta bu yi yi dam bcas//rnyog pa can gyi 'jig rten 'dir//bla med byang chub thob par shog/de'i tshe byang chub
162a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos tshigs su bcad pa dam pa 'di dag gis/bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas 'khor dang bcas te gzhan yang lha
162a6(mdo sde): rdzas kyi bapung dang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rin po che'i rgyun tshad med pa snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor nas snying gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs su
162a7(mdo sde): gyur te/dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ci'ang mi smra bar 'dug go//de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis
162b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po mthong nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/so so nas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lha rdzas kyi spros dang /me tog dang rin po che'i rgyan dang /
162b2(mdo sde): ni bza' dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /gdugs la sogs pa phul te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces smras so//
162b3(mdo sde): bdag cag gis rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do//bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis mngon sum du skyes bu chen po khyod mthong nas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas par gyur to zhes
162b4(mdo sde): smra'o//de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs par the tshom 'dri zhes bya ba zhi go 'dug pa stan las langaso nas gos tshogs
162b5(mdo sde): bcos te phyug pa g.yas pa phyung nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga so la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs
162b6(mdo sde): su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'dus la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'di gang nas mchis/gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas ji srid cig nA
162b7(mdo sde): mchis/yon tan dang dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam zhig dang ldan na bcom ldan 'das kyis bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsngags la phyir yang bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi rgya
163a1(mdo sde): mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par bstod par gyur/bdag cag gis sngon ma mthong bas ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
163a2(mdo sde): bdag cag la bshad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu thong zhig/skyes bu chen po 'di yon tan dang dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam pa de 'jig rten du bcas
163a3(mdo sde): ba lha dang mi'i 'khor thams cad kyis rtogs par nus pa ma yin no//gal te de bzhin gshegs paso skyes bu chen po de'i yon tan dang dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par bshad na 'jig
163a4(mdo sde): rten du bcas pa lha dang mi thams cad kyi mgo rmongs te yid mi ches par 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' rigs par the tshom 'dri bas yang gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
163a5(mdo sde): bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/legs par shin tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang /ngas khyod la phyogs
163a6(mdo sde): tsam zhig bshad par bya'o//ji ltar skyes bu chen po de yon tan gyi khyad par tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no//'di lta ste/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin
163a7(mdo sde): kyi khyad par la bde bar gnas pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul lA shin tu rtogs par 'jog pa'o//mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i khyad par yang thob pa'o//
163b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang du gyur pa'o//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sa la bzod pa thob pa'o//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin
163b2(mdo sde): pa'o//seng ge rab tu bsgyings pa'i rgyal me chen gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'di shin tu gnas pa'o//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi r-I la 'am rab tu 'dzegs pa'o//mu steg po can
163b3(mdo sde): dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu choms pa ste/sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa thams cad du de gnas par byed do//
163b4(mdo sde): skyes bu chen po de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du ga nas te/gang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis tshad med pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par skyod par gyur
163b5(mdo sde): pos gdul ba'i sems can tshad med pa dag yongs su smin par byed do//skyes bu chen po de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/gal
163b6(mdo sde): te ye shes mngon par skyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso ni ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad mthun par
163b7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi spyod yul kun mthong bar 'gyur ro//de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/gal te dpag tu med pa'i ye shes
164a1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad
164a2(mdo sde): ci nus pa bzhin du tshad med pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad dam pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la bsti bstang dang bcas pas mchod par 'gyur ro//ji ltar gnas pa
164a3(mdo sde): bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/gal te rnam par dag pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge
164a4(mdo sde): 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyis mthun par 'dod pa'i spyod yul gyi nyes pa'i skyon tshad med pa mthong nas sems rnam pa
164a5(mdo sde): dag par 'gyur ro//de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/gal te khrel ba dang ngo tsha ba dang ldan pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting
164a6(mdo sde): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad lhag pa'i 'dzem pa dang ngo tsha ba dang ldan zhing
164a7(mdo sde): sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos dang yongs su bral nas bsam pa mi nyams par 'gyur ro//de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/gal
164b1(mdo sde): te theg pa thams cad dang ldan pa bsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad thabs mkhas
164b2(mdo sde): pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mig gi mngon par shes pa dang /sngon gyi gnas dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mngon par shes pa dang /'jig rten 'di dang
164b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten pha rol gyi rgyu dang 'bras bu mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro//de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te//gal te mya ngan med pa'i
164b4(mdo sde): mngon par shes pas rig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can tha~Md ma ngan dang /
164b5(mdo sde): yi rmug pa dang /rmugs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro//de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/gal te mngon par shes
164b6(mdo sde): pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dgra na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad thabs mkhas pa'i mngon par
164b7(mdo sde): sheso pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/gal te 'jig rten kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
165a1(mdo sde): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mun pa dang bral te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na
165a2(mdo sde): gnas pa thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun mngon sum du mchod par 'gyur ro//de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du
165a3(mdo sde): 'gyur te/gal te sangs rgyas kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams
165a4(mdo sde): cad log par lta ba yongs su spangs nas/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro//de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin
165a5(mdo sde): du 'gyur te/gal te rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi r-i khor yug dang /khor yug chen
165a6(mdo sde): bai dang /ri rab lhun po dang /de ma yin pa'i ri gzhan dang /lung ba dang /lung phran dang /gcong rong dang /gseg ma dang /gyo mo dang /tsher ma dang /rtsa dang /shing ngan
165a7(mdo sde): pathams cad mi snang ngo //sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ji tsam du ngan par gdags pa dug dang /byad snyems dang /gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang /ye 'drog dang /glo bur dang /
165b1(mdo sde): rims nad dang /yul dran pa dang /nam rmugs pa dang /rdul dang /dri ma dang /mi gtsang ba'i nyal nyil thams cad kyang zhi zhing med par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing /
165b2(mdo sde): de'i sa gzhi'ang lag mthil bzhin du mnyam zhing bkra shis pa rnam pa sna tshogs rang 'byung ba dang /rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /phul du 'gyur ba dang /dam par
165b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /mtshan ma bzang po du mas yongs su brgyan par 'gyur ro//de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/gal
165b4(mdo sde): te ye shes kyi stobs gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i bdud kyi rgyal po 'a
165b5(mdo sde): dang bcas te thams cad 'jigs skrag nas/dkon mchog ga sum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro//de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin/
165b6(mdo sde): du 'gyur te/gal te glog gi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams
165b7(mdo sde): cad 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'jigs pa dang bral zhing chos kyis spro bar 'gyur ro//de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/
166a1(mdo sde): gal te mchog dam pa'i ro dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing drin gnas pa'i sam
166a2(mdo sde): can thams cad bsams pa bzhin du zas dang sgrom gyis tshim par 'gyur ro//de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/
166a3(mdo sde): gal te mchog gi mdangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams
166a4(mdo sde): cad gang yang lhag pa'i mthu stobs dang mi ldan pa med de nad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro//de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams
166a5(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/gal te mcho ga dam pa'i yo byad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na
166a6(mdo sde): gnas pa'i semA sa can thams cad ci lta mos pa bzhin du khro spyan dang /gding ba dang /gos dang /rin po che'i rgyun dang /ci tsam du 'chi ba'i yo byad du gtogs pade
166a7(mdo sde): ngag thams cad kyis brel zhing phongs pa med de rab tu mdzes pa shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro//de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams
166b1(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/gal te rtsod pa myed de'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sem
166b2(mdo sde): can thams cad lus dang /sems zo mdog bde zhing yang ba dang /dgra sdang ba dang /'chung ba thams cad dang bral ba dang /'dum zhing dga' ba dang /spro ba dang /sbyin pa dang /tshul
166b3(mdo sde): khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /sems mi 'khrug pa dang /shes rab yongs su rdzogs pa la dga' zhing mos par 'gyur ro//de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin
166b4(mdo sde): du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/gal te phul du gyur pa'i spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi
166b5(mdo sde): zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad khyad par can gyi rab tu dga' ba tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams
166b6(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/gal te 'jig rten po'i lam gyi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i
166b7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad thogs pa med pa'i ye shes thob cing rnam par dag pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs sbyong bar 'gyur ro//de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi
167a1(mdo sde): zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/gal te rgyal ba'i rdo rdul shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting du
167a2(mdo sde): 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad dbang po kun dang ldan zhing dbang po mo nyams pa dang /rtag tu yang dag par 'byung ba'i
167a3(mdo sde): lam la mos shing sems rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro//de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/gal te lhag pa'i rgyal
167a4(mdo sde): mtshan rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyems par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bdag sdig pa
167a5(mdo sde): mi dge ba'i chos la shin tu skyo zhing mi 'dod pa dang /thams cakyang dge ba srung ba dang /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro//de ji ltar
167a6(mdo sde): gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/gal te byams pa dang /snying rjer ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyems par zhugs
167a7(mdo sde): na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams can byams pa'i sems dang /snying rje'i sems dang /gnod pa'am/'tsho ba
167b1(mdo sde): med pa'i sems dang /kun la snyoms pa'i sems dang /gcig la gcig phan pa dang bde bar byed pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro//de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi
167b2(mdo sde): zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/gal te bsod nams thams cad shin tu sdud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs
167b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad 'thab pa dang /rtsod pa dang /nad dang /mu ge dang yongs su bral te/dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /char pa dang /kha ba dang /rtsub pa dang /tsha ba
167b4(mdo sde): dang /sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa'i reg bya'i yul yid du mi 'ong ba thams cad yongs su zhi bar 'gyur ro//de ltar skyes bu chen po de gal te rgya mtsho glog 'od ces bya ba'i
167b5(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sa chen po thams cad rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas par 'gyur zhing nyes
167b6(mdo sde): pa'i skyon thams cad dang yongs su bral te rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rin po che'i shing dang /gos kyi shing dang /snod kyi shIng dang /rgyan gyi shing dang /me tog gi shring dang /
167b7(mdo sde): 'bras bu'i shing dang /rol mo sna tshogs kyi shing la sogs pa 'tshe ba'i yo byad dam pa tshad med pa snyed kyis yongs su brgyan par gyur to//de bzhin du mdor na rigs
168a1(mdo sde): kyi bu de ni sems can mang po yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nyin re zhing snga dro'i dus su ting nge 'dzin gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi ting nge 'dzin//
168a2(mdo sde): la snyoms par 'jug ste/ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun ni gdul ba'i sems can thams cad la ci dang cis 'dul ba bzhi
168a3(mdo sde): du phan pa dang bde ba'i don de dang de dag gis yongs su smin par byed do//rigs kyi bu 'di ni sngon bskal pa chen po tshad med dpag tu med pa'i bar du rnyog pa lnga'i tshe de
168a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can yongs su smin par byed do//phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus su 'jig rten gyi khams la lar
168a5(mdo sde): gal te mtshon gyis 'jigs pa byung ste/sems can dag yongs su gdungs par gyur ni/rigs kyi bu 'di de lta bu dag mthong nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin
168a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi mthus mtshon gyis 'jigs pa de dag yongs su bcil nas sems can rnams gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems kyis snying brtse bar byed do//'jig
168a7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams la lar nad kyis 'jigs pa byung ste/sems can kha btag pa na rigs kyi bu 'dis de lta bu dag mthong nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin rnams
168b1(mdo sde): kyi mthus nad kyis 'jigs pa yongs su bcil nas sems can rnams rab tu bde ba thob par byed //'jig rten gyi khams la lar grul te mu ges 'jigs pa byung ste/sems can
168b2(mdo sde): kha bteg pa na/rigs kyi bu 'dis de lta bu dag mthong nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus mu ges 'jigs pa yongs su bcil te sems can rnams kho zas kyis yongs su
168b3(mdo sde): tshim par byed do//rigs kyi bu 'dis de ltar ting nge 'dzin meng po'i shugs kyis de lta bu la sogs pa tshad med dpag tu med/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phan pa dang bde ba'i don
168b4(mdo sde): gyis sems can gyi dbugs 'byin to//rigs kyi bu 'di de ltar nan tan gyi khyad par tshad med grangs med pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad la
168b5(mdo sde): phan pa dang /bde bar byed de'i don la rab tu bad+d+hon pa'i//stan 'das pa'i dus na skye ba mang po la phyin pa dang bde ba dang yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom

168b7(mdo sde): rab tu bskyed do//de ltar snying rje chen po dang mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus bskyed de zad mi shes pa'i yi dam bcas pas gong nas gang du 'phags pa'i shugs kyis

175b7(mdo sde): grong khyer chen por 'gro ba'i ded dpon yin no//de ltar tshod du ma byas par gong du rgyas par bshad pa'i yon tan chen pos chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rab tu bskor ba yin//
176a1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/rigs kyi bu gal te 'ga' zhig gis byams pa'am/'jam dpal lam/kun tu spyan ras gzigs sam/kun tu bzang po la
176a2(mdo sde): sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la bskal pa brgya'i bar du sems rtse gcig tu skyabs su song nas de dag gi mtshan
176a3(mdo sde): nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod cing phyag 'tshal ba dang /'dod pa re ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa pos 'ga' zhig gis skad cig thang
176a4(mdo sde): cig yud tsam sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nos brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa
176a5(mdo sde): dang phyag byas na reg pa'i smon lam thams cad myur du 'grub cing rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying
176a6(mdo sde): po 'di sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir sems can rnams kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed na dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po
176a7(mdo sde): che'i gter dang 'dra'o//de ltar skyes bu chen po 'di ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yun ring po nas smon lamo shin tu brtan pa dang /snying rje chen po dang
176b1(mdo sde): shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus bsgoms pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun pas khyad par du 'phags pa yin pasna khyod kyis byasti sbrang dang bcas pas mchod par bya'o//
176b2(mdo sde): nas phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sem song pa'i sems dpa' chen po dang /nyan thos dang /sgra dang /mi dong /gu nod sbyin dang /drin la sogs pa 'khor
176b3(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor thams cad 'dug pa las langs nas ci nus su sa so nas gser dang /dngul dang /rin po chernam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog dang /spos kyis byang chub sems dpa' sem+b+has
176b4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la mchod pa'i phyir mngon par gtor to//de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi ni bza' dang /nor bu dang /nor bu rin po che dang /mu ti gI phreng ba dang /mu
176b5(mdo sde): sesomodo dang/gser dang /dngul dang rin po che'i phreng ba dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /gdugs la sogs pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la mchod
176b6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir 'dul lo//gzhan yang tshad med pa'i skurdzas kyi rol mo snyan pa dang /tshigs su bcad pa'i bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
176b7(mdo sde): snyi pol bstis dang bcas pas mchod pa byas so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen posa'i snying po'i rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lha rdzas kyi mchod pa la ma byed de dgas
177a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la phul nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gi smras so//lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin mi rnams dang //phyogs bcu'i byang chub som
177a2(mdo sde): dpa'i mchod pa rnams//yon tan chen po 'jig rten gtso la dbul//mchog gi mchod pa 'di dag bzhes su gsol//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
177a3(mdo sde): po sa'i snying pos tshigs su bcad pa de smras nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal ba dang /de la bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pas 'di skad
177a4(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to//brtan pa'i blo dang rnam dag sems bskyed nas//sems can tshad med pa yi sdug bsngal bci la//rin chen dag ltar bde ba 'phyang bar mthong //rdo rje
177a5(mdo sde): bzhin du the tshom dra ba gcod//snying rje chen po'i blo can brtson 'grus kyis//mchod pa dam pa bcom ldan 'das la dbul//rgya mtsho ye shes sems can sdug bsngal sgrol//
177a6(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med pas srid pa'i pha rol phyin//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po 'dug pa las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
177a7(mdo sde): to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chu bo bzhi las sgrol ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyi nye gnas dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa
177b1(mdo sde): dran pa 'phel ba dang /spyi gi dran pa 'phel ba dang /'tsho ba 'phel ba dang /lus bde ba 'phel ba dang /nad ma mchis pa 'phel ba dang /gzugs dang stobs 'phol ba dang /grags/
177b2(mdo sde): pa 'phel ba dang /'tsho ba'i yo byad 'phel ba dang /gnyen bshes 'phel ba dang /slob ma 'phel ba dang /tshul khrims 'phel ba dang /mang du thos pa 'phel ba dang /sbyin
177b3(mdo sde): pa 'phel ba dang /ting nge 'dzin 'phel ba dang /bzod pa 'phel ba dang /thabs mkhas pa 'phel ba dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dag dang /'phags pa'i bden pa 'phel ba
177b4(mdo sde): ba dang /theg pa chen po'i yang dag pa'i lam la gzhol ba'i 'phel ba dang /chos kyi sgron ma 'phel ba dang /sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba 'brel ba dang /byams pa
177b5(mdo sde): chen po dang snying rje chen po 'phel ba dang /rnam par dkar ba'i chos 'phel ba dang /khams gsum du grags pa 'phel ba dang /khams gsum du chos kyi char 'phel ba dang /
177b6(mdo sde): sa chen po thams cad kyi ro bro ba 'phel ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi mdangs dang dge ba'i las 'phel ba dang /chos kyi dga' ba dang dge ba spyod pa 'phel ba dang /shes
177b7(mdo sde): rab kyi 'od 'phel ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug 'phel ba dang /spyan lnga 'phel ba dang /dbang bskur ba 'phel ba dang /lhar skye ba dang mya ngan las 'da' ba 'phel ba la
178a1(mdo sde): sogs pa thob par byed pa nas/'di lta ste/me dang chur ldan pa dang /bkra shis kyi 'od snang ba dang /thos pa 'dzin pa'i rig sngags chen po dang /
178a2(mdo sde): gzus kyi tshig 'di dag gis 'das pa'i sang so rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu klung gina'i bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas gzungs 'dri thos te gzungs 'das ni rnam
178a3(mdo sde): dkar ba'i chos thams cad 'phel zhing skye byad do/sa bon gyi tshogs dang /rtsu ba dang //myu gu dang /yal ga dang /sdong po dang /lo ma dang /'dab ma dang /me tog
178a4(mdo sde): dang /'bras bu dang /rtsi shing dang /me tog go bro ba dang /gsung 'phel zhing skye ba dang /cher chu dang ldan pa dang /phan par 'gyur ba'i sa dang /chu dang /me dang /
178a5(mdo sde): rlung 'phel zhing skye ba dang /dga' ba dang /bde ba 'phel zhing skye ba dang /rin po che dad ner rdzas 'phel zhing skye ba dang /mthu stobs 'phel zhing skye ba dang /
178a6(mdo sde): ba'i yo byAd thams cad 'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur ro//yang gzungs 'das ni shes rab skye bas nyon mongs pa'i dgu 'ang yongs su bcom par 'gyur ba'i sngags
178a7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/tshim blo chem b+h+yo/tso mchi ma b+h+r-i/A kASha tshi mi b+h+yo ba kar tshim b+ho/a ma par tshim glo bar tshim d+hi/btsir tshim b+he/a rog che mi b+h+yo/d+harma tshe man+ta/
178b1(mdo sde): sa twe bA tshim b+ho/sAtwe ni hwa la tshim b+ho/bi ba ro ga sha ba tshi ma b+ho/u ba sha ma tshi ma d+ho/nA ya na tshi ma b+h+yo/prad+h+waM sa ma mo ne rat+na tshi ma b+ho/k+Sha Na tshi ma b+ho/bi Sha ma ba ri ya tshim b+ho/
178b2(mdo sde): sha si ta la ma ba tshim b+ho/baM a dra so ta ma he le/dam be yaM be/tsakra se/tsakra ba swe/le/kli lI phi le kai ra bA/ba ra ba ri te/ha se ri pra re be/ba re tsa ra b+han+ta ne/ban ra/
178b3(mdo sde): tsi tsa tsa tsaM/he le mi le/a ka ta thA ke/ki lo/b+hA re b+hu re/mi la ma d+he/nan te ku le mi le/i ku tsi ta b+he/a rai gi re/ku ta sha ba ma le/ton ge to na ge ton gu le/hu rU hu
178b4(mdo sde): rU hu rU/ku lo sto mi le/ma ri to/ma ri te b+han+ta ka/ha ra kha ma ra ma/hu ru hu ru/srid pa'i dri ma sbyong ba dag par gsungs//thab rtsod skal pa zhi ba'ang dge bar gsungs//mi dge bsam
178b5(mdo sde): pa sbyong ba dge bar gsungs/'byung ba chen po sbyong ba'ang dge bar gsungs//ngan par 'gro ba sbyong ba dge bar gsungs//sdig pa'i bag chags sbyong ba'ang dge bar gsungs//re ba
178b6(mdo sde): rdzogs par byed pa dge bar gsungs//lo tog smin par byed pa'ang dge bar gsungs//sangs rgyas kun gyi dge bar gsungs pa 'di//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis byin
178b7(mdo sde): brlabs pa//dge bar gsungs 'dis byang chub sems dpa'i rnams//byin gyis rlob mdzad rjes su yi rang ngo //bcom ldan 'das de ltar me dang chu dang ldan pa dang /bkri
179a1(mdo sde): shis kyi 'od snang ba dang /thos pa 'dzin pa'i rigs sngags chen po gzungs kyi tshig 'di ni bdag gis 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu
179a2(mdo sde): klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur bgyis pas thos so//gzungs 'di ni rnam par dkar ba'i chos thams cad 'phel zhing skye bar bgyid pa nas de bzhin du rgyas pa'i longs
179a3(mdo sde): spyod pa'i yo byad thams cad kyi bar du 'phel zhing skye bar bgyid do//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'dis ni chu bo bzhi las sgrol bar byed do//bcom ldan 'das kyi nye gnas
179a4(mdo sde): su gyur pa dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa'i dmigs pa 'phel bar bgyid pa nas de bzhin du rgyas par 'tsho ba'i yo byad
179a5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bar du 'phel zhing skye bar bgyid do//gzungs 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i gsung rab bdud rtsi lta bu yongs su rgyas pa dang /yun du gnas shing
179a6(mdo sde): khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos thos na 'dzin pa'i
179a7(mdo sde): rigs sngags chen po dang /gzungs kyi tshig 'di smras pa na/ri kha la de ya rab tu g.yos nas lha'i rol mo bye ba khrag khrig kyang ma dkrol bar rang 'khrol te/lha'i spos
179b1(mdo sde): dang /me tog dang /rin po che tshad med pa rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du babs nas de'i tshe 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyang ngo mtshar rmad du gyur to//de'i tshe na 'khor gyi
179b2(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor de na lha mo bkra shis chen mo dang /dpal ldan lha mo chen mo dang /mchod dbyangs lha mo chen mo dang /brtan ma lha mo chen mo dang /chu can lha mo chen mo dang /'od
179b3(mdo sde): chen lha mo chen mo la sogs pa lha mo 'byung ba chen po bzhi la dbang du gyur pa stong phrag bco brgyad 'dug pa las langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
179b4(mdo sde): te thal mo sbyar nas bsti stang dang bcas pas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//ngo mtshar che'o//bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che'o//bde ba ro gshegs pa
179b5(mdo sde): bdag gis 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag la dbang sgyur mod kyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i thog ma dang /bar ma dang /tha ma'i skye ba dang /'gag pa dang /mthun pa dang /mi mthun pa'i
179b6(mdo sde): phyogs mi 'tshal te/skyes bu chen po 'di ni shis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phra ba shin tu zab mo thob nas 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i thog ma dang /bar ma dang /tha ma'i mtshan
179b7(mdo sde): nyid dang /skye ba dang /'gag pa dang /mthun pa dang /mi mthun pa'i phyogs la shin tu mkhas so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de de bzhin no//de de bzhin
180a1(mdo sde): te/rigs kyi bu 'dri ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phra ba shin tu zab mo thob pas 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i thog ma dang /bur ma dang /tha ma'i mtshan nyid
180a2(mdo sde): skye ba dang /'gag pa dang /mthun pa dang /mi mthun pa'i phyogs la shin tu mkha so//lha mo 'di ltar shes par bya'o//'di lta ste/yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni yon tan mang
180a3(mdo sde): po dang ldan pas rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bab ste sems can mang po la sbyin pa byed do//rigs kyi bu 'di'ang de bzhin du/byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po
180a4(mdo sde): che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bebs te sems can la sbyin pa byed do//'di lta ste/rin po che'i gling ltar rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba bzhin
180a5(mdo sde): du rigs kyi bu 'di yang byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan no//'di lta ste/lha rdzas kyi shing pa ri tsi tI la bsung dang /me tog gis mdzes pa bzhin
180a6(mdo sde): du rigs kyi bu 'di yang sring rgyas kyi chos rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu mdzes so//'di lta ste/seng ge'i rgyal po ni ri dgas thams cad kyis zil gyi mi non cing ma
180a7(mdo sde): skrag pa bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di'ang sems can thams cad kyis bag tsha ba'am zil gyis non po med do//'di lta ste/ji ltar nyi ma gsal bas 'jig rten gyi mun pa
180b1(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su sel ba bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di'ang sems can thams cad kyi ngan par lta ba'i mya rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba'o//'di lta ste/na mthang ba'i zla ba
180b2(mdo sde): ni mchen mo'i dus su lam stong pa'i sems can thams cad la/bde ba'i lam ston te/gir 'gro bar dga' bo bzhin du phyin par 'gyur ba lhur/rigs kyi bu 'di 'byu
180b3(mdo sde): ma rig pa'i mtshan mar theg pa gsum las 'brog bslad de 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par 'khyam pa'i sems can thams cad la theg pa gsum gyis yang dag pa'i lam ston
180b4(mdo sde): cing skul ba ji lta ba bzhin du thabs kyis yang dag par 'byung ba'i lam la 'god par byed do//'di lta ste/sa chen po la ni sa bon gyi tshogs thams cad dang /rtsi shing dang /
180b5(mdo sde): lo thog dang /sa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba ltar/rigs kyi bu 'di la'ang byang chub kyi yan lag khyad par can gyi chos thams cad
180b6(mdo sde): smyon pa'i gnas so//'di lta ste/rin po che chen po'i ri rab ri'i rgyal po ni shin tu brtan zhing mgong ma nyams pa bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di'ang sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa
180b7(mdo sde): chos thams cad la shin tu gnas shing sem can thad mi gtong ba'i phyir mi nyams pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la gtong ba'i phyir mgong ba'o//
181a1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/nam mkha' la sems can thams cad spyod pa bzhin du/rigs kyi bu 'di'ang sems can thams cad de la longs spyod do//rigs
181a2(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di ni de ltar yon tan chad med dpag tu med pa dang ldan no//de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i yon tan
181a3(mdo sde): tshad med pa dang ldan pa bstod pa thos nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te bkur sti dang rim gro byas nas rap+ta dga' bas sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la
181a4(mdo sde): mig mi 'dzums par lta'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal po/skyes bu yang dag sa yi snying po ni//
181a5(mdo sde): yon tan mang po phun sum tshogs par ldan//dge sbyong cha lugs 'dzin cing ston byed pa//ston pa chen po la ni phyag 'tshal lhags//sems can kun la bde ba rab tu byin//
181a6(mdo sde): srid pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal kun las sgrol//tshad med rnam pa sna tshogs cha ro phab nas//ston pa chen po la ni mchod pa byed//brgya byin dri mi med par skyes pa des//
181a7(mdo sde): phyogs bzhi kun tu bltas shing brtags nas su//thal mo sbyar nas bsti stang rab bcas te//ston pa chen po la ni bsdogs shing bstod//bdag gro bcom ldan
181b1(mdo sde): 'das kyi 'khor mthong ba//nor bu rin po che yi 'od zer ltar//sangs rgyas mang po'i zhing kun snang byas te//thams cad gsal bar ma gyur gang yang med//mngon shes drug gis
181b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten snang bar byed//deng 'dir 'dus shing lhags par gyur pa ni//shin tu dpa' ba sa yi snying po ste//rab tu byung ba'i spyod lam rnam par ston//'phags pa'i nor bdun 'byung
181b3(mdo sde): ba'i gte yin te//'jigs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas nga ro dbyangs//byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i rgyal mtshan te//sems can mang po 'dren pa'i gtso bo'o//rnam par grol ba'i rin
181b4(mdo sde): chen 'byung khung ste//brtson 'grus brtan pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho yin//byams pa'i blo gros snying rje brtse la mos//sdug bsngal ba yi sems can mang po sgrol//'jigs pa srung ba'i
181b5(mdo sde): 'obs dang mkhar yin te//na mkha' dang ba'i zla bzhin lam yang ston//sa ltar dge ba'i rtse ba thams cad skyed//rdo rje ltar ni the tshom yongs su gcod//rnam par grol ba'i rin chen
181b6(mdo sde): kun la gtong //chu ltar sgrib pa thams cad 'dag par byed//nyon mongs tsha bas gdungs pa'i gdugs su 'gyur//sman pa ltar ni nad kun 'tsho bar byed//zhag gcig sa yi snying po'i ming
181b7(mdo sde): brjod pa'i//grags pa chen po'i bsod nams thob pa ni//bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bar du yang //blo can gzhan gyi ming nas brjod pas lhags//so so'i skye bo grol bar byed
182a1(mdo sde): pan//nyon mongs thams cad rnam par 'tshong byed pa'o//dngu' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin mthar na cing //ting 'dzin gzhan dag gi yang
182a2(mdo sde): rol phyin//smyen mang bcu gsum po yang rnam dag pas//mang po kun la ye shes na mkha' bzhin//dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams kyi//skye bo mang po'i mun pa'i tshul
182a3(mdo sde): snang ngom//zhing rnams rdo bzhin ti 'dzin der 'jug cing //bsam gtan pa ni bo lA yang rgyun du 'jug/ting nge dzin du rdzogs nas sems can gyi//nyon mongs pa 'i
182a4(mdo sde): gdung ba rab tu sel//sa sa skye ba sngon gyi sdig pa'i las//mtshon dang nadu dang mu gas 'jigs pa dang //rnam pa mang po po'i che zhing gsod gyur pa//de dag kun nas rnam par
182a5(mdo sde): grol bar byed//sems can nyo bar len pa'i phung po lnga//sdug bsngal mang pos 'tsho zhing gdungs gyur pa//sa'i snying po de la skyabs gso lar//sred pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad
182a6(mdo sde): spyi bar 'gyur//sems can sdug bsngal 'khor lo rab ba ru le/gcig gis gcig khri'i tshe zhing gnod gyur pa//suM yi snying po de la skyengs rga la nas//bzong
182a7(mdo sde): byam mo pa'i sems la gnas par 'gyur//bcug sum sbyin gyis rab 'jigs skrag byed cing //tshal po mid rkyen gyis sdug padzin/sa mi rnying ba del rgya
182b1(mdo sde): gsol na//'jigs pa mod la bde la gnas par 'gyur//bsod nams byed la mos shing dran pa dang /tshul khrims mang thos shes rab 'dod pa dag/sa yi snying po de la skyabs
182b2(mdo sde): gsol na//re ba bzhin du thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur//yon tan so sor smos pa'i bzod rnal dang //sman dang sa bon tshogs la mos pa dag/sa yi snying po de la skyabaso gsol
182b3(mdo sde): na//re ba kun dang ldan zhing rdzogs par 'gyur//lo thog rtsi shing legs par 'dod pa dang //khye'u dang bu mo gos dang bran khol phyir//sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na//
182b4(mdo sde): rang byung bzhin du thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur//yon tan mang po kun dang ldan pas na//sa tshon 'di yang mi gtong rab tu 'dzin//de yi rkyen gyis sman dang lo thog rnams//
182b5(mdo sde): snum zhing 'jam la ro dang ldan par 'gyur//nyon mongs mang pos sgrib par gyur nas su//mi dge bcu yi las la mos pa dag/sa yi snying po de la skyibs gsol na//mi
182b6(mdo sde): dge nyon mongs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur//rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi lus ston cing //skye bo mang po dag la chos kyang ston//sbyin pa'i yon tan thams cad rdzogs pas ni//
182b7(mdo sde): sems can kun la snying brtse bde bar gyur//gal te bskal pa mang po brgya yi bar//de yi yon tan bsngags shing rab bstod de//mthar phyin rdzogs par 'gyur ba
183a1(mdo sde): shin tu dka'//de bas kun gyis bsti stang bcas pas mchod//'dus pa chen po las byang chub sems dpar sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba
183a2(mdo sde): las gling bzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o///bam po gnyis pa/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po ston
183a3(mdo sde): las langs te bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te thal mo sbyar
183a4(mdo sde): ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//yon tan tshad med rgya mtsho can//bcom ldan 'das la zhu gsol ba//the tshom ne mai nur ci mchis pa//
183a5(mdo sde): bdag la rgyas par bshad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/spos bu yang dag pa khyod ni chos thams cad ye shes kyis mthong ba yi thogs pa med
183a6(mdo sde): do//'on kyang sems can l-I phan pa dang bde bar 'dod pa'i phyir khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dris pa de
183a7(mdo sde): dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/bdag sngon
183b1(mdo sde): bsgral bya bcu gsum du//spyod pa dka' ba shin tu spyad//so so'i skye bo kun don du//'jigs pa gsum dang rnyog lnga gsal//sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la//tshad ma mchis
183b2(mdo sde): pa'i mchod bgyis pas//bsom pa dag pa'i 'khor 'od dang /tshogs chen 'dus pa 'dra sngon mthong ngo //blo can brtson 'grus rtsol ba dag/thams cad 'dus shing tshogs 'dir
183b3(mdo sde): lhags//shin tu skyon med 'khor 'di dag/mthong bar gyur pa ngo mtshar rmad//ci slad sangs rgyas zhing 'di kun//sdig pas dge ba nyams bgyis shing //blo can dag gis
183b4(mdo sde): spangs pa yi//ngan par spyod kun lhan cig gnas//mchi mas med sdig pa bgyid pa dang //yang dag dam pa'i tshes la skur//'phags pa smod cing log lta bas//rtag dang chad
183b5(mdo sde): ma'i gtsug lag 'chang //sdig pa bcu'i las bgyid cing //'jig rten phyi mas mi 'jigs pa//theg pa rnam gsum ring spangs shing //sdig can dag la ngan 'gror gzhol/
183b6(mdo sde): ma rig pas ni bsgribs pa'i mig/'dod chags phrag dog rgyus 'tsho ba//sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab bskor te//sems can 'di dag sgrol bar mdzad//ji ltar nying mtshams
183b7(mdo sde): sbyor ba yi//nyon mongs rdo rje lta bus bcad//ji lta bur ni gzungs dag 'thob/de bzhin bzod pa'ang nges par 'gyur//bdag gis 'dren pa tshogs chen po dag/mthong
184a1(mdo sde): byur gyur pa ngo mtshar rgyu//'di 'dra'i yon tanakrAn+da tshogs pa//phyogs gzhan dag na ma mthong //yon tan mang po kun+da ldan zhung//byung
184a2(mdo sde): chub lam la rab brtson pas//ji ltar byis pa'i 'khor dag la//sangs rgyas 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/legs so legs so//
184a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu khyod kyi sngon 'das pa'i dus no 'ang chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas dag gi zhing nA rnyog pa lnga'i tshe//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed la
184a4(mdo sde): sngon 'di lta bu'i don dge zhu ba zhus so//khyod kyis dris po'i don 'di dag la sngon yang nan tan shin tu byas pas shin tu rtogs shing khong du chud de//spyod pa mang po phun
184a5(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa pha rol tu phyin pas shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i shes rab dang ldan te sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /phan pa dang bde ba'i don 'thob par
184a6(mdo sde): bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i spyod pa'i gter sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems
184a7(mdo sde): can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye skyes kyi yon tan rgya mo tshe yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /rgyal rigs
184b1(mdo sde): spyi bo na sna dbang bskur ba'i rgyal ba spyod pa mi dge ba la gnas pa thams cad ngan song gsum las bzlog cing mi ltung bar bya ba dang /zhing 'dir dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung shin tu
184b2(mdo sde): rgyas shing yuni ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i don dris pa legs so//shin tu legs par nyon la yid la gzung shig dang /ngas bsnyen par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das
184b3(mdo sde): de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das la skur nyan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka'
184b4(mdo sde): stsal to//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu dang ldan te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnyog pa lnga can gyi
184b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad rnam par dkar ba'i chos thams cad lus d+hir ldog pa dang /'phags pa'i nor rin po che bdun gyis brel ba dang /mkhros pa dag dang ring du gyur pa chad
184b6(mdo sde): bdung /rtag pa'i drabs kun nas klags pA dang /ngan song du 'gro ba'i shing rta la spro ning dga' ba dang /skye baphyi ma'i sprog/bsngal la 'jigs par mi lta ba dang /ma rig pa'i mun ma
184b7(mdo sde): thibs po la gnas pa la dad pa dang /mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rdzogs par byed pa dang /mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang /dam pa'i chos laM skur cing 'phags pa la dang
185a1(mdo sde): bab/dge ba'i chos thams cad ring du stong zhing mi dge ba'i chos rdzogs par byed pa'i gnas na bzhugs so//ngo lta bu'i sdug bsnga rna/
185a2(mdo sde): sna chags dang ldan pa'i zhing na bzhugs kyang rab tu bde bar bzhugs te bag tshab med pa dang /'jigs skrag po med pas drang srong chen po'i gnas su byin te sangs rgyas
185a3(mdo sde): kyi 'khor lo bskor nas lha dang bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad btul nas/so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi rigs la nyon mongs pa shin tu smra
185a4(mdo sde): rdo rje lta bu dag bsal nas ci la mos pa bzhin du so sor bkod do//mthu dang ldan pa'i sems can dag ni theg pa gsum las phyir mi ldog par yang mdzad do//rigs kyi bu
185a5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/yul kha cig tu srid med par 'gyur ba na de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad bdag gi dmag dang /gzhan gyi dmug gis yongs su gces shing nyon mongs
185a6(mdo sde): dang sdug bsngal bar gyur to//de na gnas pa'i mi mang po'ang ma bde bas 'thab pa dang /rtsod pa dang /gcig la gtsug smod pa tshad med pa snyed 'byung ste/brdzun du sgra
185a7(mdo sde): ba dang /g.yo sgyu dang /tshig drug par smra ba dang /skur klang 'debs shing 'khrugs pa dang /dmus long dang /ling tog can du 'gyur bu dang /nad rnam pa sna rtsi
185b1(mdo sde): kyis gzir ba dang /grang ba dang /che ba'i nad ma rungs pa dang /rims rnam pa mang po dang /spro ba dang /skem byed dang /kha zas mi 'ju ba dang /sems 'khrug cing myos pa dang /dbang po
185b2(mdo sde): ma tshang zhing yan lag dang nying lag nyams pa dang /bgo ba dang /bza' ba dang /'tshe ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phongs shing brel te/bdog pa thams cad
185b3(mdo sde): yid du mi 'ong ba dang /skye bo thams cad mu stegs can dang /'jig rten gyi lha la skyabs su song zhing lte ba ngan pa dang /bsam pa ngan pa dang /mos pa ngan pa yongs su
185b4(mdo sde): rgyas te/yang dag pa'i lam stor nas ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ba na/de'i tshe yul de na gnas pa'i rgan po blo dang ldan zhing yid gzhungs pa/mang du thos pa drung dag na
185b5(mdo sde): che ba dag 'dus nas gros su 'gros te/yul dang grong mi kun bsdus nas thams cad kyis mthun par rgyal bu gcig btus pa ni sngon sbyin pa rab tu byas pa/tshul khrims
185b6(mdo sde): shin tu bsrungs pa brtson 'grus la brtun pa/shin tu dka' bo'i spyod pa dang ldan pa mchog tu gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi mtshan dang ldan pa/dbang po yongs su rdza
185b7(mdo sde): shing yan lag ma nyams pa/lus byad che chung ran pa/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa/phul du gyur pa'i mdog dam pa dang ldan pa/thams cad kyis
186a1(mdo sde): bkur sti dang rim gro byed pa/yul de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing lta 'dod pa/rang bzhin gyis drang zhing brtan pa/byam
186a2(mdo sde): pa dang /snying rjer ldan pa/mang du thos pa/rtsal thams cad dang ldan pa/ngang nges pa'i brjod pas sems rab tu brgyan pa/btsun mo dam pa'i sras thu bor gyur pa/spos dam
186a3(mdo sde): pa rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pa'i chus lus bkrus nas/rin po ches brgyan pa'i gos dam pa spos kyis gdugs pa rnam pa sna tshogs gyoran zhing /nor bu rin po che spyi bo'i
186a4(mdo sde): gtsug phud la btags pa/rin po che'i me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i gser gyi cod pan mgo la thogs pa/rab tu yang la 'jam pa'i ngar gyis bcings pa/gzhan yang nor
186a5(mdo sde): bu rin po che dang /mu tig dang /gser dang /dngul la sogs pa rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas pa'i rna cha dang /se mo do dang /dpung rgyan dang /gdu bu la sogs pa thogs pa/
186a6(mdo sde): rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas pa'i lham gyis rkang pa bteg pa/rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas pa'i gdugs kyis steng gi bla bres bres pa/sngon lha dang drang srong
186a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyis bsrung zhing 'dzin pa'i khri bshams pa/brgya byin la sogs pa thams cad kyis srung zhing skyob pa/bzo shin tu mkhas pas las su byas pa'i gzhal
186b1(mdo sde): med khang chen por sngon rgyal po snga ma 'dug 'dug pa'i khri la bzhag nas rgyal por bcug go//rgyal sar zhugs nA sa lha'i dbang po dang /klu'i dbang po dang /
186b2(mdo sde): gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /grul bum gyi dbang pos srung zhing 'dzin pa'i dril bu dang /rnga chen po brdungs nas de'i sgras yul khams kun tu
186b3(mdo sde): grags par gyur te/rgyal rigs la sogs pa rigs chen po bzhi la gtogs pa'i mi tshad med pa snyed lus yang dag par bkrus nas gos gtsang ma gyon te/lag na rnam pa sna
186b4(mdo sde): tshogs kyi rin po che'i gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /nor bu rin po che dang /mu tig dang /gser dang /dngul dang /dung dang /man shel dang /byu ru dang /
186b5(mdo sde): bai DUr+ya la sogs pa tshad med pa snyed thogs te rgyal po de la phul lo//gzhan yang rigs mtho zhing btsun pa tshangs par spyod pa/thos pa dang ldan zhing shes pa che ba'i bram ze
186b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyis kyang tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa dang /glu dang dbyangs dam pa tshad med pa snyed kyis rgyal po de la bstod po byas so//legs par 'gyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs
186b7(mdo sde): thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo//bkra shis pa rnam po sna tshogs kyis rgyal po'i spyi bo ro gtor to//rgyal po snga ma'i blon po'i rigs la gtogs pa thos pa dang
187a1(mdo sde): ldan zhing shes pa che ba/drang ga/g.yo ba med pa/'dzangs pa dag kyang ni rigs su blon por rim par smras bcug nas/rtul ba'o las /
187a2(mdo sde): pas snron yum den bdag dang gzhan gyi dmag thams cad gtse bar 'gyur ba dang /phyir rgol ba dang grogs pa ngan pa thams cad me par byas nas pa zhol pa'i
187a3(mdo sde): dang /gnod pa byed pa thams cad zhi bar gyur nas/nug po'i phyogs thams cad byung zhing rnam par dkar ba'i phyogs thams cad skyes te 'phel por gyur to//rigs kyi bu rgya

187a5(mdo sde): thams cod shin tu thul ba las tshe yang ring por 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du rnyog pa lce'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas ma

187a7(mdo sde): rnam par gtses te/kun nas nyon mongs pas nyon mongs nas gti mug gis ldongs te/mi bde bar gyur pas rtag pa dang chad pa la rnam par zhen cing chags pa cha
187b1(mdo sde): m+med pa bskyed nas phan tshun rtsod cing 'gal bar byed de/gcig la gcig dbang za zhing smos 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug bskyed de g.yo dang sgyu'i tshul du smra

187b4(mdo sde): yid la mi byed de/yang dag pa'i chos kyi ro yongs su gtad nas dge ba byed pa la dbang za zhing smod de//de ltar bde zhing skyid pas ni bral cing phongs par 'gyur gyi rtag tu nyon

187b6(mdo sde): las gzhol bar gyur to//de'i tshe zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon sangs rgyas tshad med pa skyed la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas pa/sangs rgyas kyi
187b7(mdo sde): yon tan gyi rgya mtshor zhugs pa/snga ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la gnas pa thams cad 'dus shing tshogs nas nga'i spyan sngar lhags te tshig mthun par 'dra

190a1(mdo sde): dang 'bras bu smin pa'ang shes te/ci dang cir ldan pa bzhin de dang rdo lta bu'i thabs byin to las su bcug pas/yul de na gunas bu'i 'dzangs
190a2(mdo sde): ngan las las kyi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum byed du bcug go//lus kyi 'khor lo de'i dbang gis ni gnas pa'i sems can thams cad yun ring po'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad yid du
190a3(mdo sde): 'ong ba rnam pa sna tshogs la longs spyod pa dang /baide skying 'phel zhing skye ba dang /phas rgol ba'i dgra thams cad kyang thul bar gyur to//las kyi 'khor lo rnam po gsum
190a4(mdo sde): gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rgyal po srid kyi las kyi 'khor lo rnam par bzhag pas gang dgra thabs mkhas par smrabs shing rtsal sbyangs te phas rgol ba'i dag 'dul zhing
190a5(mdo sde): mi mang po srung bar byed pa dang /zhing dang gnas byed pa'i las kyi 'khor la rnam par bzhig pas gang khang khyim brtsog pa dang zhong gi las lag byed kyis phyin par byed
190a6(mdo sde): du 'jug cing bde bar byos pas bza' ba dang btung pos mi brel bar byed pa dang /nor rin po che tshol ba'i las kyi 'khor lo rnam par bzhag pas gling tshong sngags dong /
190a7(mdo sde): bzo rnam pa sna tshogaso slob tu bzhugs cing 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam po sna tshogs yid bzhin du spyad du yod la bde zhing skyid pa 'phel bar byed pa'o//rigs kyi bu rgyal
190b1(mdo sde): rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bI rgyal po chen po rgyal blo 'jo lo gnyis po 'di dang ldan na 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis bdag gi yul rab tu bde zhing sbrid pa dang /phas rgol ba'i dgra dang
190b2(mdo sde): grogs po ngan pa btul zhing lus srung ba'i nan tan lo mkhas pas tshe'ang ring bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas te
190b3(mdo sde): bla na med pa'i ye shes thob nas 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mig la shin tu rtog go/de ltar shin tu brtags pas las dang chos
190b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu rab tu mkhyen te/'dul bar 'gyur ba'i sems can thams cad la las kyi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum rnam par bzhag go/las kyi 'khor lo de'i dbang
190b5(mdo sde): gis dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung dang /chos kyi mig yun ring du gnas pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag pa'i chos rgya cher kun tu khyab pa dang /skye bo thams cad rtag tu mtho
190b6(mdo sde): ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du shin tu byede ba thob pa dang /mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs shing yang drag pa'i chos kyi mig gris
190b7(mdo sde): phas rgol ba thams cod chos bzhin dul bar 'gyur ro//de la rigs kyi bu las kyi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i las kyi
191a1(mdo sde): 'khor lo rnam par bzhag pa dang /kha don goms par bya ba'i las kyi 'khor lo rnam par bzhag pa dang /bsod nams bya ba'i las kyi
191a2(mdo sde): 'khor lo rnam par bzhag pa dang gsum mo//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i las kyi 'khor lo gang zhe na/ting nge 'dzin rnam pa
191a3(mdo sde): bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus 'di la brtags na yul drug dang /bdag dang /bdag gir zhen cing cha
191a4(mdo sde): pi'i rgyu dang /las kyi zhing dang /ma rig pas bsgribs pa dang /sred pa'i chus brlan pa'i dbang med par gzhan gyi dbang gis yod par gyur bas rkyen mang po la rag las
191a5(mdo sde): pa'o//las dang nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyan rnam pa gsum po dgag pa'i phyir de ltar brtag go/las kyi rgyun gang zhe na/gang sems can rnams ji snyed kyi 'du
191a6(mdo sde): byed mngon du spyod pa de ma rig pa dang /sred pa'i rgyu las srid pa skye bas nyon mongs pa'i rgyun ces bya'o//nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis rnam par shes pa'i rgyu dang rkyen mang po 'dus pa
191a7(mdo sde): los ming dang gzugs skye'o//ming dang gzugs kyi rgyu dang rkyen mang po 'dus pa las skye mched drug skye'o//skye mched drug gi rgyu dang rkyen mang po 'dus pa las reg pa dang /tshor ba
191b1(mdo sde): dang /spyod pa phyi ma'i skye ba dang /rga ba dang /'chi ba lnga sogs pa rim gyis 'byung ba ni sdug bsngal gyi rgyun ces bya'o//de ltar rgyun gsum po 'di ni las kyi nga la mya reg pa'i rgyu dang /
191b2(mdo sde): sred pa'i rlan gyis skye bar gyur to//'di ltar las kyi zhing la ma rig pa'i rgyu dang /sred pa'i rlan gyis rgyun rnam pa gsum po brkam pa'i phyir nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la mi rtog pa dang
191b3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa dang /bems po dang /g.yo ba med pa dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /smig rgyu ba lta bu dang /chu'i zla ba lta bu dang /rmi lam lta bu stong pa ci 'ang med pa/
191b4(mdo sde): mtshan me med pa/smon pa med pa/byas pa med pa/ma byung ba/ma skyes pa/gzugs med pa/zhi ba dang /dben pa dang /ma byung ba dang /skye ba'i gnas med par rtogs so//
191b5(mdo sde): de ltar nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la shin tu brtags pas stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa dang /mtshan ma med pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa dang /smon pa med pa'i
191b6(mdo sde): rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa la phyogs so//yang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la rjes su brtag par bya ba'i phyir gzhan yang thabs mkhas pas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba la rtog
191b7(mdo sde): ste nang du rgyu ba dang /phyir rgyu ba'i dran pa goms par byed do//de la ji ltar na dran dI dbang gis yang dag pa ji lto ba bzhin du dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba la rtog ce ni/yang dag pa ji lta
192a1(mdo sde): ba bzhin du bgrang ba dang /rjes su 'brang ba dang /zhi gnas dang /lhag mthong dang /'jug pa dang /yongs su dag pa la rtog go/de la bgrang bas ni
192a2(mdo sde): las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te/rten du gyur pas rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa rnams thul ba dang /dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid 'dzin
192a3(mdo sde): par nus pa'o//rjes su 'brang pos kyang las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te/yang dag par 'byung ba la rten cing rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par dpyod pa
192a4(mdo sde): dang bral ba dang /dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas par gyur pa'o//zhi gnas kyis kyang las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur to//
192a5(mdo sde): dbugs phyi nang du rgyu bla bri bar mngon du ston pa dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog la gnas par nus pa'o//lhag mthong gis kyang las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par
192a6(mdo sde): 'gyur te/dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba zad par mngon du ston pa dang /sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos so sor rtogs pa la gnas bya'o//'jug pas kyang los kyi dngos
192a7(mdo sde): po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te/nye bar len pa'i phung po spong ba'i sbyor ba la mkhas pa dang /'phags pa'i sar 'jug pa la sbyor ba'o//yongs su dag pas kyang
192b1(mdo sde): bya ba'i las kyi dngos po gnyis byed par 'gyur te/kun nas nyon mongs pa spong ba dang /lta ba yongs su dag pa'o//de ltar sbyor ba rnam pa drug gis dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba la rtog pa

192b3(mdo sde): phung po'o//dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba len cing myong bar byed pa ni tshor ba nye bar len pa'i phung po'o//dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid len pa ni 'du shes nye bar len pa'i phung
192b4(mdo sde): po'o//dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba mngon du byed pa ni 'du byed nye bar len pa'i phung po'o//dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba bye brag tu 'byed pa ni rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa'i phung
192b5(mdo sde): po ste/de ltar nye bar len pa'i phung po rnam lnga bshad pa ni so so ba tha dad pa mi 'dra ba/gsar ma yin pa/rnying ma yin pa/gnas med pa/spungs pa med pa ma yin pa//
192b6(mdo sde): brjod du med pa'o//de ltar nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga shin tu rtogs pas 'du byed rnam pa gsum yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro//gral te de ltar 'du byed rnam pa gsum
192b7(mdo sde): yongs su thar par rjes su brtags pa'i mthar phyin ni rnam par shes pa dang bcos pa'i lus dang /yul drug rjes su rtogs pa'i mthar phyin par 'gyur ro//bdag
193a1(mdo sde): dang bdag gir zhen pa dang /las dang /ma rig pa dang /srid pa'i rgyu dang /zhing dang /kun nas 'gebs pa'i rlan pa'ang thams cad zad par
193a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa'ang yongs su rdzogs pa nas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
193a3(mdo sde): de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du 'ang bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /

193a5(mdo sde): dran pas gzung bar bsam gtan dag la zhugs pa ni yang dag pa'i chos don dam pa la gnas pa'i sems can zhes bya'o//bsam gtan yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
193a6(mdo sde): sgom pa zhes bya'o//dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par gcod pa zhes bya'o//sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs las byung ba'i sras/thams
193a7(mdo sde): cad kyi gsung las skyes pa/chos kyi grub pas chos kyi btul ba zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' la las de ltar bsgoms pa las bags kyis phyir nur na'ang zag
193b1(mdo sde): bzad pa'i dgra bcom par gyur pa nas mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' la la de ltar bsgoms pas gong nas gong du 'phar ba ni yon tan thams

193b4(mdo sde): dang /chos dang /tshor ba dang /rgyu dang /'bras bu dang /rnam par smin pa la ye shes kyis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi chos la brtags na sems can dag ting nge 'dzin

193b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha ton goms pa'i las kyi 'khor lo zhe na gang dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dang //
193b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dge ba'i rtsa ba chung zhing sra ba ba dang /kun rdzob kyi bden pa la gnas pa dbang po yongs su ma smin pa dag la ngas kha ton goms par bya
194a1(mdo sde): balnga btsud de/srod dang thor sal le lo med par shin tu brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /sems can gang bla na med pa'i ye shes tshol ba dag na
194a2(mdo sde): ngas rnam par dkar ba'i theg pa chen po la bcud do/bdag nyid klog pa dang /pha rol po gzhan klog tu 'jug pa dang /bdag nyid 'don pa dang /pha rol po gzhan
194a3(mdo sde): 'don du 'jug pa dang /bdag nyid 'chad pa dang /pha rol po gzhan 'chad du 'jug pa dang /theg pa chen po la bdag goms par bya ba dang /pha rol po gzhan goms

194a6(mdo sde): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos la btsud nas kha ton goms par byed du bcug go/sems can gang nyan thos kyi thegs pa 'dod pa dag la ni ngas gzhung tshigs su

194b1(mdo sde): pa kha ton goms par byed du bcug pa de ni rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha ton goms par bya ba'i las kyi 'khor lo zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na de bzhin
