308b4(mdo sde): spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gnas su rgyal po bgyid cing nor rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang /gzhan yang bdag nyid che ba'i gnas su gnas pa la rgyu gzhan dang thabs gzhan gyis mtshams
308b5(mdo sde): mod pa'i sems can dmyal ba las gdon cing ngan song gzhan gyi sdug bsngal las kyang thar bgyi ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyu gzhan dang thabs gzhan gyis
308b6(mdo sde): gdon du rung ba yod do//sems can gang rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal por zhugs la longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs la spyod pa chos kyi bzod pa'ang ma thob/dge ba bcu'i las
308b7(mdo sde): kyi lam yang mi ldan yang dad pa'i mthu dang ldan te/dkon mchog gsum la rim gro dang /bsti stang byed cing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i theg pa gsum dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos la
309a1(mdo sde): chos la chung ngu na tshig su bcad pa gcig tsam la 'ang 'phya zhing sbyar ba 'am/bar du gcod pa 'am/bgegs mi byed la/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung
309a2(mdo sde): ba'i nye gnas tshul khrims can nam//tshul khrims nyams pa'am/tshul khrims med kyang rung /skra dang kha spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig gyon pa thams cad la 'tshe ba dang /gnod pa dang /
309a3(mdo sde): gzhu ba dang /'tshig pa dang /chad pas gcod pa dang /chos gos dang /lhung bzed dang /'tshe ba'i yo byad phrogs pa dang /chos gos phrogs te khyim par phab nas las byed du bcug pa
309a4(mdo sde): dang /btson rar bcug pa nas 'tsho ba'i dbang po dang phral ba'i bar du mi byed la/mchod rten dang /dge 'dun gyi nor mi 'phrog pa dang /ngan pa sdig po can dag rab tu byung ba las tsha ba dang /
309a5(mdo sde): gnod pa byed du me 'dzud pa dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi nor la 'phrog cing spyod du mi 'dzud pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa theg pa gsum dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos la
309a6(mdo sde): bsti stang dang bcas pas mnyan cing gzungs su 'dzin pa dang /mnyan te gzungasu bzung nas kyang ji ltar bshod pa bzhin du chos kyi rje su brtson 'grus dang /nan tan byed pa dang /
309a7(mdo sde): ngas bstan pa'i theg pa gsum gyis 'phags pa'i nye gnas dag la mchod pa dang /bsnyen bkur dang /bsti stang dang bcas pas g.yog byed pa dang /theg pa chen po l-i shin tu
309b1(mdo sde): brtan pa'i yi dam bcas te the tshom dang phyir ldog pa'i sems mi skyed pa dang /gzhan yang sems can dag theg pa chen po la dad cing yid ches pa dang /gzungs su 'dzin pa dang /slob
309b2(mdo sde): pa la nan tan byed du 'jug na/rgyal rigs gdol pa can 'di dang /gzhan yang bdag nyid che ba'i gdol pa can dag ni snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang rgyal thabs kyi dbang bskur
309b3(mdo sde): zhing longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs la spyod du gnang ngo //gzhan yang grong dang grong khyer dang /nor dbyig thams cad la spyod kyang mtshams med pa'i sems dmyal bar mi ltung ba nas
309b4(mdo sde): ngan song gzhan gyi bar du 'ang lhung por mi 'gyur ro//de ni ngas rgyal thebs kyi dbong skur zhing longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs la spyod du snang ngo //de ltar na de dag ni grong dang grong khyer
309b5(mdo sde): na spyod kyang mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ba nas ngan song gzhan du'ang mi ltung ngo //sems can gang sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad lhag ma mo lus
309b6(mdo sde): par byang bar 'dod na bsdu bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nan tan du bslab cing gzungs su gzung bar bya'o//gang gis de ltar dge 'dun gyi mngon sum du gyur pa la shin
309b7(mdo sde): tu 'dzem pa dang /ngo tsha ba'i sems kyis sdig pa'i las so sor bshag na sngon gyi dus na byas pa'i sdig po'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongasu byang bar 'gyur ro//
310a1(mdo sde): 'dus pa chen po las byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo////bam po brgyad pa/de'i tshe
310a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
310a3(mdo sde): chen pos ji ltar na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags/ji ltar na nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa me mchis pa legs ji ltar na rang sangs rgyas
310a4(mdo sde): kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags/ji ltar na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lpags//ji ltar na theg pa chen po la 'khrul po ma
310a5(mdo sde): mchis pa lags/ji ltar na theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags/ji ltar na dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rtag par yongasu 'phel bar bgyid pa
310a6(mdo sde): lags/ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba chos kyi snod dam/chos kyi snod ma lags pa 'di rung /rlung ngun chos gos kyi tshal bu 'tshal zhing sgyu dang
310a7(mdo sde): kha spu bregs pa thams cad la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags/ji ltar na theg pa chen po chos la ging nA gong du 'bar zhing phyir me ldog par 'gyur ba lags/ji ltar na rno ba'i
310b1(mdo sde): shes rab dang /bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba lags/ji ltar na ting 'dzin dang /gzungs dang /bzod pa dang /sa rnams la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi
310b2(mdo sde): ldog par 'gyur ba lags/ji ltar na rtag tu dge bo'i bla shes gnyen dang 'jal cing rje su mthun par 'gyur ba lags/ji ltar na rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing
310b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos kyi nye gnas dang mi 'bral ba dang /chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /dge 'dun la mchod pa dang /bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur
310b4(mdo sde): bau lags/ji ltar na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rab tu brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa lags/ji ltar na byang chub kyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs la sems mi ngoms pa lags/de nas bcom
310b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod
310b6(mdo sde): de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo bcu po 'di dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med
310b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur
311a1(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rtag par yong su 'phel bar 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la/
311a2(mdo sde): rab tu byung ba chos kyi snod dam/chos kyi snod ma yin pa 'di rung chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon zhing sgra dang kha spu bregs pa thams cad lnga 'khrul pa med par 'gyuraro//theg pa chen po'i
311a3(mdo sde): chos li gong nas gong du 'bar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /rno ba'i shes rab dang /bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu spyi zhing 'phel ba dang /ting 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs dang bzod pa
311a4(mdo sde): dang /sa rnams la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing de'i rjesu 'gro ba dang /rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing
311a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral
311a6(mdo sde): bo dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /byang chub kyi spyod pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems myi ngoms pa dang /sngon sdig pa mi dge
311a7(mdo sde): las ni byas pa thams cad 'phags pa'i chos kyi ye shes rdo rje ltar sa la rno bas ldeg ma mo lus par bcom ste rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi myong ba dang /gsar du sdig pa mi dag ci
311b1(mdo sde): lngas thams cad mi byed pa dang /skyob dang sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems kyis bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo sbyor ba dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che sna bdun nan tan byed pa la skyo zhing
311b2(mdo sde): sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems dang /sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rnams 'jil ba la sgo zhing sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems kyis sems can thams cad kyi rten dang /
311b3(mdo sde): gnas su 'gyur zhing nye bar 'tsho ba yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa ni gar 'gro 'ang rin po che'i 'khor lo thog mar 'gro
311b4(mdo sde): ste/rin po che gzhan de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ngo //gling bzhi kun tu rgyu zhing sems can thams cad kyi lus dang sems kyi rnyog pa thams cad kyang bsal te/sems can thams cad
311b5(mdo sde): kyi lus dang sems kyi bde ba'ang skye zhing 'brel par byed do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ang de bzhin du 'khor lo bcu po 'di dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'brus
311b6(mdo sde): pA med pa nus/sems can thams cad kyi rten dang gon su 'gyuraro zhing nye bar 'tsho ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyuraro//rigs kyi blo 'di lta ste/shing rtechen po ni 'khor lo bzhi dang ldan te/
311b7(mdo sde): mi mang po de'i nang du 'dug nas lam chen por 'gro'o//lam den bong ba 'am/gyo mo 'am/gseg ma'am/rtsa 'am/shing maM/lo ma 'am/yal ga 'am/me tog ga me/'bras
312a1(mdo sde): bu d+hi skyed yod pa thams cad shing rta'i 'khor lo de'i //song nas thams cad chag N+DI glugs te nor du mi rung bar byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems
312a2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di 'khor lo rnam pa bcu dang ldan na nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /chos kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongasu bac+doM ma ste/rnam
312a3(mdo sde): par smin pa mi len par byed do//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/'khor lo rnon po ni thang cig 'phangs pas phas rgol ba'i dgra'i mgo dang /yan lag bcad de/de spyod pa'i mthu med
312a4(mdo sde): par byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po 'di dang ldan na rgyad lngar 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po thams cad 'jom pa
312a5(mdo sde): dang /nyon mongs pa dang sdig po'i las thams cad yongasu gcad de/rnam par smin pa len par mi byed do//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/me'i bskal pa byung ba'i tshe nyi ma lnga gcig
312a6(mdo sde): car shar nas gling bzhi'i klung dang /mtsho dang /chu bo dang /chu'i khamasu gtogs pi gsher ba thams cad gang yang mi sems pa med do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
312a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po'ang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po 'di dang ldan na rgya bzhi dang /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /sems kyi sgrib pa dang /chos kyi sgrib pa dang /sdug bsngal gyi
312b1(mdo sde): rtsa bar smin pa thams cad yongs su snyoms par byedado//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/rlung gi bskal pa byung ba'i tshe phyogs bzhi nas rlung chen po dus gcig tu langs pas 'jig rten gyi khams
312b2(mdo sde): thams cid na ri bo che chung dang /sa chen po rnams thams cad 'jig cing 'thor bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan
312b3(mdo sde): na 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log bzhi dang /nga rgyal gyi ri bo thams cad mi shigs pa gang yang med pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /sems kyi sgri pa dang chos kyi sgrib
312b4(mdo sde): pa dang /sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'jig cing 'thor bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/seng ge'i rgyal po ral pa can gyi skad thung cig phyung bas gcan
312b5(mdo sde): gzan thams cad dang /'phur ba dang //'gro ba thams cad skrag cing 'gul mi nus par 'gyuraro//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' po 'ang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan
312b6(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi sgra thang cig bsgrags pas mu stegs can dang /log par ston pa'i sdig pI'i grog su gyur po thams cad 'jig skrag nas smra ba'i tshig 'khrul zhing 'dri ba dang rgol mi nus
312b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/brgya byin lha yi dbang po lha ma yin dang 'thab pa'i tshe lha'i dmag gis bskor cing lag ni rdo rje thogs te g.yul du zhugs na lha ma yin thams cad
313a1(mdo sde): skrag pas ldogs par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan na log par lta ba'i mu stegs can
313a2(mdo sde): thams cad dang /log par ston pa'i sdig pa'i grogs po thams cad skrag nas 'bros par 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags
313a3(mdo sde): na rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bab ste/dbul phongs pa'i sems can thams cad la sbyin pa byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang 'khor lo
313a4(mdo sde): rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan te/rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi rgyal mtshan la gnas na chos chen po'i tshor rab tu 'bebaso pas sems can tshad med pa snyed thams cad la sbyin pa byed
313a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/mtshan mo'i dus su 'jig rten kun mun par gyur pas 'thom zhing 'brog bslang pa na zla ba nya bra shar bas mun pa thams cad bsal te//
313a6(mdo sde): 'brog bslad pa rnams kyi lam me tshon par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan na sems can gang ma rig
313a7(mdo sde): pa'i mun pas ldongs te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad stong pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos bshad de/ma rigs pa'i mun pa thams cad gsal nas/
313b1(mdo sde): chos kyi snang ba skyes pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mngon du gyur te/zag pa thams cad bcad nas sdug bsngal gyi mtha' zad par byed do//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
313b2(mdo sde): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'jig rten du shar ba na lo tog thams cad skye zhing 'phel te/me tog dang /lo thog dang /lo ma thams cad rgyas pa dang /mAn ma shing btsog pa
313b3(mdo sde): thams cad sel ba dang /lo thog gi 'bru dang /sman gyi 'bras bu thams cad smin pa dang /gangs kyi ri bo kun zhubs 'babs chu kun brug ste/ri mA gyis rgya mtsho chen por
313b4(mdo sde): 'bab par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan te/lhag pa'i sbyin pa la gnas shing /dul ba'i tshul khrims
313b5(mdo sde): dang /bde ba'i bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab dang /thabs dang /byams pa dang /snying rje dang /spobs pa'i yon tan shin tu rgyas shing sema?
313b6(mdo sde): can thams cad la dam pa'i chos ston to//chos de'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyis sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba lhag pa'i lo tog rnam pa sna tshogs skye zhing 'phel ba dang /
313b7(mdo sde): lhag pa'i spyod pa dam pa'i me tog dang /lo ma rnam pa sna tshogs shin tu rgyas pa dang /nyon mongs pa'i las ngan pa thams cad yongasu sel ba dang /mtho ris dang /mya ngan
314a1(mdo sde): las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu yongasu smin par 'gyur ba dang /log par lta ba dang /nga rgyal gyi ri bo thams cad zhu zhing 'bab pas yang dag pa'i dad pa
314a2(mdo sde): dang /tshul khrims dang /thos pa dang /gtong ba dang /shes rab dang /ting 'dzin gyi chu rim gyis 'bab cing mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rgya mtsho 'gengs pa dang /sems can thams
314a3(mdo sde): cad yid bzhin du 'jigs pa med pa mya ngan las 'da' bu'i grong khyer du 'jug par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor
314a4(mdo sde): lo bcu po gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'khor lo bcu zhes bya ba ni chos gzhon la mi gdags kyi/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam nyid yin par shes par bya'o//'khor lo rnam pa
314a5(mdo sde): bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ste/sdig pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang /dge ba'i chos thams cad yid bzhin
314a6(mdo sde): du rdzogs pa dang /myur du mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i rgya mtsho yongasu 'gengs pa dang /thabs mkhas pa chen po'i ye shes kyi 'od kyis skye bo thams cad yongasu smin
314a7(mdo sde): par byed cing thams cad la phan pa dang /bde ba yongasu thob par byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis
314b1(mdo sde): kyang mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongasu sbyangs te/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di la yongasu bsngags pas 'bras bu thob par gyur to//de bas nu gang gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi
314b2(mdo sde): lam bshad pa 'di dag las/'ga' zhog nam 'tsho'i bar du mi nyams par sbyang na 'bras bu byed pare can mchog tu 'gyur ba thams cad thob pa na ji ltar bshad pa bzhin no//rigs
314b3(mdo sde): kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga nam 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa yongasu spangs na de nyid sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa yin te/sems
314b4(mdo sde): can de dag la 'jigs shing bag tsha bar mi byed pade'i 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal mi skyed pa'i dbang pos dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad myur du yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas
314b5(mdo sde): rgyud lngar 'khor bu'i rgya mtshor bying ba/srog gcod pa'i dbang gis lus dang /dgra dang /yid kyis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la gzhan yang byed du 'jug cing mthong ba dang /
314b6(mdo sde): rjes pa'i rjesu yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /sems kyi sgrib pa dang /chos kyi sgrib pa dang /chu'i sgrib pas bsgribasngo par gyur to//'di ltar srog bcod pa yongasu
314b7(mdo sde): spangs pa'i 'khor los de dag lhag ma ma lus par yongasu bcom zhing brnyil bas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi myong bar byed//lus 'di nyid la'ang lha dang /me la sogs pa kun do/
315a1(mdo sde): zhing yid du 'ong ba dang /dogs pa mi skye ba dang /lus dang sems rab tu bde zhing yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyuro//2N+DI 'gro ba'i dus byed pa na 'du lus dang sems/
315a2(mdo sde): la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang /chung ma dang /'khor thams cad kyis yongasu bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed kyi shin tu 'jig pag shin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gru
315a3(mdo sde): gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge pa'i bshes gnyin chos kyis dul po tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pA bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang brad d+he/lus dang sems rab tu dga'
315a4(mdo sde): dang /de la bkur sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro//yang tshe 'phos nas kying phyir mi'i nang du skyes te/dbang po yong su rdzogs shing yan lag drung ldan pa dang /gang
315a5(mdo sde): nas gang du skyes par nad med pa dang /tshe ring ba dang /byad gzugs bzang ba dang /yid gzhungs pa dang /rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes
315a6(mdo sde): gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/de'i rjes slob pa dang /srog gcod pa yongasu spong ba dang /sdig pa mi dge ba'i
315a7(mdo sde): chos thams cad yongasu gcod pa dang /dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yong su rdzogs pa dang /theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang /byang chub
315b1(mdo sde): sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzho zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing /
315b2(mdo sde): mtshon cha med pa dang /drug dang 'tshe ba'i ming mi grag pa dang /'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te rab tu bde skyid pa dang /nad med pa dang /tshe ring ba'i zhing du sems can dag skye bar 'gyur ro//
315b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to//yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas
315b4(mdo sde): shing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog gcod pa yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor
315b5(mdo sde): lo ste dang po'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo de dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa ma
315b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//
315b7(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyuraro//dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongasu 'phel ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/chos
316a1(mdo sde): kyi snod ma yin pa'ang rung chung dun chos glo kyi tshal bu gyon cing skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'thur zhing
316a2(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog pa dang /rno ba'i shes rab dang /bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang /ting 'dzin dang gzungs dang /bzod pa dang /sa rnams thams cad la dbang du
316a3(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing rjesu 'gro ba dang /rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sems
316a4(mdo sde): dpa' dang /nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen pa kun byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang //
316a5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tsho lnga ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /byang chub kyi spyod pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/
316a6(mdo sde): 'bras bu gzhan thob pa'ang ji ltar rgyas par bshad pa bzhin no//rigs kyi bu gzhan yod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nas 'tsho ba'i bar du ma
316a7(mdo sde): byin par len pa yongasu spangs na de nyid sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa yin to/yongasu gdung ba med pa dang /'tshe ba med pa dang /bdag nyid tshul bzhin
316b1(mdo sde): du rnyed pa'i nor gyis cho ga/shes par gnas kyis/chos ma yin pa'i nor dang khe la re ba med pa de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro//thog med bI/
316b2(mdo sde): mtha' nas rgyud ltar 'khro zhing 'khro rgya mtshor bying bar 'gyur ba 'ang ma byin par len pa'i dbang gis lus dang /ngag dang /yid mi dge ba'i lus rnams bdag kyang byed la/gzhan yang
316b3(mdo sde): byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rje suM yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /chos kyi sgrib pa dang /rin po che dang nor la sgrib pas
316b4(mdo sde): bsgrib par gyur to//'di ltar ma byin pA re len pa yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yongasu bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi myong ste/lus 'dri nyid la 'ang
316b5(mdo sde): lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong bas dogs pa mi skye ba dang /lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang /nor rin po che thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro//nam 'chi 'pho ba'i
316b6(mdo sde): dus byed pa na'ang lus dang sems sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang chung ma dang /'khor thams cad kyis yongasu bskor bas 'chi 'pho bya'i dus byed kyi shin tu 'jigs
316b7(mdo sde): pa gaushin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyuraro//gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag
317a1(mdo sde): pa dang phrad de/lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang /de la bkur sti dang bcas pas dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro//tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skye ste/dbang po yongasu
317a2(mdo sde): rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang /gang nas gang du skyes par longs spyod chen po dang ldan zhing byad gzugaso bzang ba dang /yid gzhungs pa dang /rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /'jig
317a3(mdo sde): pa lnga dang nor thun mong du mi 'gyur ro//phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'o bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag
317a4(mdo sde): pa dang phrad de/de'i rjesu slob cing mkhyen por len pa yongasu spong ba dang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu gcod pa dang /dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongasu
317a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa dang /theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhol ba dang /shin tu
317a6(mdo sde): yengs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro//yid sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang /rin
317a7(mdo sde): po che'i zhing dang /rin po che'i rdzing dang /rin po che'i gzhal med khang la sogs pas yongasu gang ba dang /bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bral ba rgyan thams cad kyis bkod
317b1(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa'i zhing der sems can dag skye bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to//yongasu
317b2(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyu ro//rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
317b3(mdo sde): pos ma byin par len pa yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor lo gnyis pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par
317b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//nyon thos kyi theg pa'i gang blag la 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'phrul pa
317b5(mdo sde): med par 'gyur ro//theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongasu 'phel ba dang /de
317b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/chos kyi snod ma yin pa'ang rung chung ngu na chos gos kyi chel bu gyon cing skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul
317b7(mdo sde): pa med par 'gyur/theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /rno ba'i shes rab dang /bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang /ting 'dzin
318a1(mdo sde): dang gzungs dang /bzod pa dang /sa rnams thams cad la dpung du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /rtag tu dge ba'i bla shes gnyen dang phrad cing de'i rjes
318a2(mdo sde): 'gro ba dang /rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /chos thos pa de
318a3(mdo sde): mi 'bral ba dang /dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la bston pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /byang chub kyi
318a4(mdo sde): spyod pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/'bras bu thob pa dag kyang ji ltar bshad pa bzhin no//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
318a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tsho ba'i bar du 'dod pas log par g.yem pa yongasu spangs na/de nyid sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i rlung gis g.yengs pa las
318a6(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med pa/phrag dog med pa/'tshe ba med pa/yongasu gdung ba med pa/'khrug pa mid pa sbyin pa yin te/bdag gi chung mas chog shes shing gzhan gyi chung ma la
318a7(mdo sde): re ba med pas de'i dbang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro//thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba'ang 'dod
318b1(mdo sde): byas log par g.yem pa'i dbang gis lus dang ngag dang /yid mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la/gzhan yang byed du 'jug cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rje su yi rung ba las byung ba nyon
318b2(mdo sde): mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /sems can gyi sgrub pa dang /chos kyi sgrib pa dang /chung ma'i sgrib pos bsgribs par gyur to//'di ltar 'dod pas log par g.yem pa yongasu spangs pa'i 'kho
318b3(mdo sde): los lhag ma ma lus par bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi len te/lus 'di nyid la'ang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong bas dogs pa mi skye ga dang //
318b4(mdo sde): lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang /chung ma lhod pa dang bcas pa ma yin par 'gyuraro//'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na'ang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung shing yid
318b5(mdo sde): du 'ong ba'i bu dang /chung ma dang /'khor thams cad kyis yongasu bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi/shin tu 'jig pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya ni mthong bar mi 'gyur/
318b6(mdo sde): gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/lus dang sems rab tu dga'
318b7(mdo sde): ba dang /de la bkur sti dang bcas pas de la shin tu dad pa skye par 'gyuraro//tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skyes te/dbang po yongasu rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang /
319a1(mdo sde): gang nas gang du skyes par 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /byad gzugs bzang ba dang /yid gzhungs pa dang /rab tu badre zhing skyed pa dang /phyir yang shin tu yid
319a2(mdo sde): du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/de'i rjesu slob cing 'dod pas log par g.yem
319a3(mdo sde): pa yongasu spong ba dang /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasasu spong ba dang /dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yong su rdzogs pa dang /theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam
319a4(mdo sde): grangs thams cad tshol ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i
319a5(mdo sde): byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing bud med med pa dang /'dod chags dang g.yem pa med pa dang /tshangs par spyod pa mchog dang ldan pa'i sems can dag zhing der
319a6(mdo sde): skye ste/de dag thams cad kyang rdzus te skye'i mi gtsang ba'i mngal nas skye ba ni ma yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/sems can dag la cis 'dul
319a7(mdo sde): po bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to//yong su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing /sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par
319b1(mdo sde): 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas log par g.yem pa yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor lo gsum pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
319b2(mdo sde): 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par
319b3(mdo sde): 'gyur/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//
319b4(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongasu 'phel ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung chung ngu na chos gos
319b5(mdo sde): kyi tshal bu gyon zhing skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khal pa med par 'gyur//theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /rno ba'i shes rab dang /bsod nams
319b6(mdo sde): kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang /tinge 'dzin dang /gzungs dang /bzod pa dang /sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen
319b7(mdo sde): dang phrad cing rjesu mthun par 'gyur ba dang /rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /chos thos pa
320a1(mdo sde): dang mi 'bral ba dang dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pasna sems mi ngoms pa dang
320a2(mdo sde): byang chub kyi spyod pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms pa dang /'bras bu gzhan dag thob pa'ang ji ltar bshad pa bzhin no//rigs bu gzhan yang byang chub
320a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mtsho'i bar du brdzun du smra ba yongasu spangs na sems can thams cad kyis rtag tu bkur ba dang /tshig btsugs pa tshad mdo 'gyur
320a4(mdo sde): bdang /tshig kun nyan cing gus pa dang dogs pa mi 'gyur te/de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro//thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor b+hu 'khor
320a5(mdo sde): pa'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba'ang brdzun du smra ba'i dbyang gis lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyis sdig pa ma dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la/gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba
320a6(mdo sde): dang thos pa'i rje suM yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /sems kyi sgrib pa dang /chos kyi sgrib pa dang /tshigro btsugs pa las sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur
320a7(mdo sde): ro//'di ltar brdzun du smra ba yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yong su bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi len par 'gyuraro//lus 'di nyid
320b1(mdo sde): la lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ongs pa dang /drogs pa mi skye ba dang /lus drang sems rab tu bde ba dang /tshig tu smra ba thams cad la gzhan yid ches shing nyan
320b2(mdo sde): par 'gyu ro//'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na 'dra lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing yid 'ong ba'i bu dang /chung ma dang /'khor thams cad kyis yongasu bskor bas
320b3(mdo sde): 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed kyi shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i so nya ni mthong bar mi 'gyu ro//gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang
320b4(mdo sde): yon tan du ldan po bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang /de la bkur sti dang bcas pas shin tu da pa skye bar 'gyur ro//tshe 'phos
320b5(mdo sde): nas kyang phyir mi'i lus su skye zhing dbang po yongasasu rdzogs pa yan lag dang ldan pa dang /gang nas gang du skyes par tshig btsugs pa dang /byad gzugs bzang ba dang yid
320b6(mdo sde): gzhungs po dang /rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshulo khrims dang yon tan du ldan po bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag
320b7(mdo sde): pa dang phrad de/de'i rje su slob pa dang /brdzun du smra ba yongasu spangs pa dang /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu gcod pa/dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad
321a1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa dang /thegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad 'chol ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad la rim
321a2(mdo sde): gyis gzhol ba dang /shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bden
321a3(mdo sde): bar smra ba/sgyu dang bral ba/lha'i gsung gis yongasu brgyan pa dang /slu ba med cing sems kyi spyod pa drang ba dang /yang dag pa'i spyad pa rnam par dkar ba'i chos 'ba' zhig
321a4(mdo sde): la spyod pa/lho'i gos bsrung can gyon pa/rin po che'i rgyan gyis bkod pa'i sems can drag zhing der skyo bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/sems
321a5(mdo sde): can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du chos ston to/yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par
321a6(mdo sde): 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brdzun du smra bu yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor lo bzhi pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
321a7(mdo sde): 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyuraro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa
321b1(mdo sde): pa med par 'gyur/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag lnga 'khrul pa med par 'gyuraro//theg pa chen po lnga 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/
321b2(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yong su 'phel ba dang /de bzhin ga shegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/chos kyi snod ma yin pa'ang rung chung ngu na chos gos kyi
321b3(mdo sde): tshul bu gyon cing skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhi phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang /rno ba'i shes rab dang /bsod nams
321b4(mdo sde): kyi khyad par rtag tu 'phel zhing skye ba dang /ting 'dzin dang /gzugs dang /bzod pa dang /sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /rtag tu dge ba'i bshes
321b5(mdo sde): gnyen dang phrad cing de'i rjesu 'gro ba dang /rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos kyi nyi gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /chos
321b6(mdo sde): thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad shin tu tshol ba lnga brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /byang
321b7(mdo sde): chub kyi spyod pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mi ngoms par 'gyur te/'bras bu gzhan 'thob pa'ang ji ltar bshad pa bzhin no//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
322a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tsho'i bar du phra ma yongasu spangs na sems can thams cad kyis rtag tu bkur zhing bla mar byed pa dang /tshig tu smra ba thams cad
322a2(mdo sde): gzhan gyis mnyan pa dang /'dun pa dang /dog pa mi skye bar 'gyur te/de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su rdzogs par 'gyur//thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'gro bar 'khyo rgya mtsho
322a3(mdo sde): 'bying ba 'am phra ma byas pa'i dbang gis lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la/gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rje su yi rang ba
322a4(mdo sde): los byung ba nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /sems kyi sgrib pa dang /chos kyi sgrib pa dang /'dum pa la sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur to//'di ltar phra ma'i tshig yongasu
322a5(mdo sde): spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag mi na lus par yongasu bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi len par byed do/lus 'di nyid la lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid
322a6(mdo sde): du 'ong ba dang /dogs pa mi skye ba dang /lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang /tshig tu spro ba thams cad la nyon cing 'dum par 'gyu ro//'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na'ang lus dang sems
322a7(mdo sde): la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang /chung ma dang /'khor thams cad kyis yongasu bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba dus byed par 'gyur gyi/shin tu 'jigs pa'i
322b1(mdo sde): gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyur ro//yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/
322b2(mdo sde): lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang bkur sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur/tshe 'phos nas kyang phyi mi'i nang du skye ste/dbang po yongasu rdzogs shing yan lag
322b3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dang /gang nas grang du skyes par smra ba'i tshig 'jam zhing 'dum pa dang /byad gzugs bzang ba dang /yid gzhungs pa dang /rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /phyir
322b4(mdo sde): yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshos gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa dang /bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad te/de'i rjesu slob pa dang /phra
322b5(mdo sde): ma'i tshig dang yongasu bral bas sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu gcod pa dang /dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongasasu rdzogs pa dang /theg pa chen
322b6(mdo sde): po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhol zhing ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa
322b7(mdo sde): nas bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu brtan po sra ba mi shigs pa dang /lha rdzas bzang pos yongasu brgyan par 'gyur pa dang //
323a1(mdo sde): mthun pa dang /rmi zlos pa shin tu dul zhing 'dum pa dge ba'i chos tshol ba'i sems can dgra zhing der skye bar 'gyur ro//rtag tu 'dum zhing gus
323a2(mdo sde): pas dam pa'i chos nyam pa dang /de bzhin gshegs po'i tshe'i ched kyang dpag tu med do//sems can dag ci dang cis 'dul po bzhin du drim pa'i chos ston to//yong su mya
323a3(mdo sde): las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub de mis dpa' sems
323a4(mdo sde): chen pos phra ma yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor lo lnga pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur//nyan
323a5(mdo sde): thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par
323a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'brel pa med par 'gyur//dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongasu 'phel ba dang /de
323a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/chos kyi snod ma yin pa'ang drang chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon zhing skra dang kha spu dregs pa
323b1(mdo sde): 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /rno ba'i shes rab dang /bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang /ting 'dzin/
323b2(mdo sde): dang /bzungs dang /bzod pa dang /sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing de'i rje su 'gro ba dang /rtag tu sangs
323b3(mdo sde): rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /chos thos pa dang mi 'brel ba dang /dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen
323b4(mdo sde): bskur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /byang chub kyi spyod pa dang /smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems
323b5(mdo sde): mi ngomos par 'gyur te/'bras bu gzhan thob pa'ang ji skad bshad pa bzhin no//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tsho'i bar
323b6(mdo sde): du zhe gcod pa'i tshig thams cad yongasu sbyangs na sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing bla mar byed pa dang /tshig tu smra ba kun la pha rol po kun dga' zhing nyan pasna dogs pa
323b7(mdo sde): med par 'gyur te/de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyur//thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'byir ba'ang
324a1(mdo sde): zhe gcod pa'i tshig gi dbang gis lus dang /dgra dang /yid mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la/gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i
324a2(mdo sde): rje su yi rang ba las byung ba nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /sems kyi sgrib pa dang /chos kyi sgrib pa dang /shin tu dul ba la sgrib pos bsgribs par gyur to//'di ltar
324a3(mdo sde): zhi gcod pa'i tshig yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yongasu bcom pa'i dbang gis rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yongasu mi len te/lus 'di nyid la
324a4(mdo sde): 'ang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' bas dogs pa mi skye ba dang /lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang /tshig tu smra ba thams cad pha rol gyi yid du 'ong ba dang snyan par
324a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//nam 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na'ang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing nyon mongs pa dang /yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang chung ma dang 'khor thams
324a6(mdo sde): cad kyis yongasu bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyur ro//yid 'ong ba'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen
324a7(mdo sde): chos kyis dul ba/tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang /de la bkur sti dang bcas
324b1(mdo sde): byas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro//tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skyes na'ang dbang po yongasu rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang /gang nas gang du skyes par tshig 'jam
324b2(mdo sde): por smra ba dang /byed gzugs bzang ba dang /yid gzhungs pa dang /rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/tshul khrims
324b3(mdo sde): dang yon tan du ljon pa/bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de de'i rjesu slob pa dang //zhe gcod pa'i tshig yongasu spong ba dang /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu gcod
324b4(mdo sde): pa dang /dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa dang /theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang /spyod pa
324b5(mdo sde): thams cad rim gyis gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'thob pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgo thams
324b6(mdo sde): cad dang bral te/yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang /chos kyi sgras zhing de yongasu gang po dang /dran pa dang /blo grosu ldan pa/tshangs pa'i dbyangs ce na/shin tu dul
324b7(mdo sde): ba'i sems can dag zhing der skye ba dang /rtag tu tshig 'jam pos gcig la gcig skul bar byed do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe tshad kyang dpag tu med de/sems can dag cis 'dul
325a1(mdo sde): ba bzhin du chos skyoston pa dang /yongasu mya ngan las 'das nus kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas zhing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang /bde ba'i
325a2(mdo sde): don byed par 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe gcod pa'i tshig yongasu spong ba'i 'khor lo drug pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
325a3(mdo sde): chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan pas nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyuraro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
325a4(mdo sde): la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gling zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/theg pa chen po'i gang
325a5(mdo sde): zug la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongasu 'phel ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/chos
325a6(mdo sde): kyi snod ma yin pa'ang rung chung ngun chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing sgra dang kha spyi bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong dri 'phar zhing
325a7(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog pa dang /rno ba'i shes rab dang /bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye ning 'phel ba dang /ting 'dzin dang /gzungs dang /bzod pa dang /sa rnams thams cad la
325b1(mdo sde): dbyung du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing rje su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub
325b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /chos thos bya dang mi 'bral ba dang /dge 'dun la mchod pa dang /bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral po dang /dge
325b3(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /byang chub kyi spyod pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/'bras bu gzhan dag thob
325b4(mdo sde): ba yang ji skad bshad pa bzhin no//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nim 'tsho'i bar du tshig sprul ba yongasu sbyangs pas sems can thams
325b5(mdo sde): cad kyis bkur zhing bla mar byed pa dang /tshig tu smra ba thams cad don du 'gyur zhing tshig thos pa rnams nyan cing gus pas dogs pa med par 'gyuraro//de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa
325b6(mdo sde): ba thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//thog mi med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'kho rgya mtshor bying ba'ang tshig kyal pa smra ba'i dbang gis lus dang /ngag dang /yid
325b7(mdo sde): mi dge ba'i lus bdag kyang byed la/gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes yi rang po las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /sems kyi sgrib pa dang /chos
326a1(mdo sde): kyi sgrib pa dang /don du smra ba la sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur to//'di ltar tshig kyal pa yongasu sbyangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yong
326a2(mdo sde): su bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi len par byed do//lus 'di nyid la lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong bas dogs pa med par 'gyur pa dang
326a3(mdo sde): lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang /tshig tu smra ba thams cad don du 'gyur ba dang /'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na'ang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung
326a4(mdo sde): zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang /chung ma dang /'khor gyis yongasu bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyuraro//yid du
326a5(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang /de la
326a6(mdo sde): bkur sti dang bcas shing shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyuraro//cha 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skye zhing dbang po yongs rdzogs pa yan lag dang ldan pa dang /gang nus gang du skyes par
326a7(mdo sde): phan pa dang /don du 'gyur ba'i tshig smra ba dang /byad gzugs bzang ba dang /yid gzhung pa dang /rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gonyen chos
326b1(mdo sde): kyis dul ba/tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/de'i rje su slob pa dang /tshig kyal par smra ba yong su spong ba dang /sdig pa mi dge
326b2(mdo sde): ba'i chos thams cad yongasu gcod pa dang /dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa dang /theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang /byang
326b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar
326b4(mdo sde): du 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing don med pa'i tshig thams cad dang bral te byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod du gtogs pa'i chos chen po'i sgra mchog dam pa rnam pa mang pos
326b5(mdo sde): zhing de yongasu khyab pa dang /de dag tu med pa'i smon lam dang /ye shes dam pa phun sum tshogs pas chos kyi don rnam pa sna tshogs 'chad pa la mkhas pa'i sems can
326b6(mdo sde): de lta bu dag zhing der skye bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gi shegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to//yongasu mya ngan
326b7(mdo sde): las 'das nas kyang dam bI chos yun ring du gnas shing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
327a1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po tshig kyal pa yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor lo bdun pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan pas nyan
327a2(mdo sde): thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul po med par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyuraro//rang
327a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//dkon
327a4(mdo sde): mchog gsum gyi gdung yongasu 'phel ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam chos kyi snod ma yin pa shwar rung chung ngu na chos
327a5(mdo sde): gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing sku dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /rno ba'i shes rab dang kha sod
327a6(mdo sde): nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang /ting 'dzin dang /gzungs dang /bzod pa dang /sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /rtag tu dge
327a7(mdo sde): ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing de'i rjesu 'gro ba dang /rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba
327b1(mdo sde): dang mi 'bral ba dang /chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems
327b2(mdo sde): mi ngoms pa dang /byang chub kyi spyod pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/'bras bu gzhan thob pa'ang ji skad bshad pa bzhin no//rigs kyi bu
327b3(mdo sde): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpo' sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tsho'i bar du chags sems yongasu spangs na sems can+da thams cad kyis bkur zhing btsun par byed pa dang /sems
327b4(mdo sde): rnam par dag cing rnyog pa dang bral te/de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyuraro//thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'byir
327b5(mdo sde): ba'ang chags sems kyi dbang gis lus dang /ngag dang /yid sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rje su yi rang ba las byung ba
327b6(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /sems kyi sgrib pa dang /chos kyi sgrib pa dang /'dod sems med pa la sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur ro//'dod sems yongasu spong ba'i 'khor los lhag
327b7(mdo sde): ma ma lus par yongasu bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yongasu mi len te/lus 'di nyid la 'ang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang /dogs pa med
328a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang /lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang /sems rnam par dag cing rnyog pa dang bral bar 'gyuraro//'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na 'ang lus dang sems
328a2(mdo sde): la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung ba dang /yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang /chung ma dang /'khor gyis yongasu skor ba 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi//shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i phonya
328a3(mdo sde): mthing bar mi 'gyur ro//yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/tshul khrims dang ston du ldan po/bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de lus dang sems
328a4(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ba dang /de la bkur sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyu ro//tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skye zhing dbang po yongasu rdzogs pa/yan lag dang ldan
328a5(mdo sde): bya/gang nas gang du skyes par sems rnam par dag cing rnyog pa med pa dang /byad gzugs bzang ba dang /yid gzhungs pa dang /rab tu byung zhing skyid pa dang /phyir yang yod
328a6(mdo sde): du'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshe ste gnyen chos kyis dul ba/tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de de'i rjesu slob pa dang /tshogs sems
328a7(mdo sde): yong su spong ba dang /mi dge ba'i chos yongasu gcad pa dang /dge ba'i chos khyed par can thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa dang /theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grang thams
328b1(mdo sde): cad tshol ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub
328b2(mdo sde): 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing lag mthol bzhin du mnyam la rin po che rnam pa mang pos yongasu gang ba dang /rin po che'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs dkrigs pa dang
328b3(mdo sde): rin po che'i gos dang /rin po che'i rgyan gyi yo byad dang /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /gdugs dang /gseru dang /dngul dang /mu tig gi dra ba dang /shing la sogs
328b4(mdo sde): pas yongasu gang ba dang /shin tu yid du 'ong zhing blta na sdug pa/nga rgyal yongasu spangs pa/byad gzugs shin tu mdzes pa dang /dbang po ma nyams pa/sems mnyam pa'i son dag zhing
328b5(mdo sde): der skye bar 'gyur te/chags sems med pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pas brgyan par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/sems can
328b6(mdo sde): dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to//yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang
328b7(mdo sde): bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chags sems yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor lo brgyad pa'o//byang chub sems
329a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par
329a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa
329a3(mdo sde): med par 'gyur/thog pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//dkon mchog gsum gyi gdang yongasu 'phel ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa
329a4(mdo sde): la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/chos kyi snod ma yin pa'ang rung chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//
329a5(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /rno ba'i shes rab dang /bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang /ting 'dzin dang /
329a6(mdo sde): gzungs dang /bzod pa dang /sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing de'i rjes mthun par 'gyur
329a7(mdo sde): ba dang /rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing /byang chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /chos thos pa dang /
329b1(mdo sde): mi 'bral ba dang /dge 'dun la mchod pa dang /bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /byang chub kyi spyod
329b2(mdo sde): pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/'bras bu gzhan dag thob pa 'ang ji skad bshad pa bzhin no//'dus chen po las byang chub sems dpa' sa
329b3(mdo sde): snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pi zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo///bam po dgu pa/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam
329b4(mdo sde): 'tsho'i bar du gnod sems yongasu spangs na/sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing bla mar byed pa dang /sems rnam par dag pa dang /dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur te/de'i dbang
329b5(mdo sde): gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro//thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba'ang gnod sems kyi dbang gis lus
329b6(mdo sde): dang /ngag dang /yid sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjesu yi rang ba las byung ba nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /sems
329b7(mdo sde): gyi sgrub pa dang /gnod sems med pa la sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur to//'di ltar gnod sems yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yongasu bcom pas
330a1(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yongasu mi ldan te/lus 'di nyid la 'ang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang /dogs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
330a2(mdo sde): sems rnam par dag pa dang /dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur ro//'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na'ang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang /chung ma dang //
330a3(mdo sde): 'khor thams cad kyis yongasu bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi/shin tu 'jigs pa'i gsha ni rje'i pho nya thong bar ma 'gyur ro//yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i gshes
330a4(mdo sde): gnyen chos kyis dul ba/tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang /de la bkur sti dang bcas pas
330a5(mdo sde): shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro//tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir me'i nang du skye zhing dbang po yongasu rdzogs pa dang /yan lag dang ldan pa dang /gang nas gang du skyes par sems rnam par
330a6(mdo sde): dag cing dri ma dang bral ba dang /byad gzugs bzang ba dang /yid gzhungs pa dang /rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'o bshes gnyen chos kyis
330a7(mdo sde): dul ba/tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de de'i rje su mthun par slob pa dang /gnod sems yongasu spong ba dang /sdig pa mi
330b1(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu gcod pa dang /dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongasasu rdzogs pa dang /theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang
330b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad rim gyis gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du
330b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnyog po dang /skyo ba dang /sprin dang /khug rlangs dang /rdul dang /dri ma dang /mi sdug pa dang /ma mdzes pa thams cad dang bral te/rin po che mang
330b4(mdo sde): pos shin tu brgyan pa yid du 'ong ba dang /nga rgyal dang bral ba/gzugs mdzes shing sdug pa/dbang po ma nyams pa/sems rtag tu zhi ba'i sems can dag zhing de'i skye ste/
330b5(mdo sde): byams pa dang /snying rje dang /yon tan phun sum tshogs pas brgyan par 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de//sems can dag cis 'dul
330b6(mdo sde): bo bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to//yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par
330b7(mdo sde): 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnod sems yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor lo dgu pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
331a1(mdo sde): po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul ba med par 'gyur/nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//rang sangs
331a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/theg
331a3(mdo sde): pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongasu 'phel ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gan+da///
331a4(mdo sde): chos kyi snod dam/chos kyi snod ma yin pa'ang rung chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing sgra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//theg pa chen po'i chos la
331a5(mdo sde): gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /rno ba'i shes rab dang /bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang /tingange 'dzin dang /gzungs dang /bzod pa dang /sa
331a6(mdo sde): rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing de'i rjesu slob pa dang /rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang
331a7(mdo sde): mi 'bral zhing /byang chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /dge 'dun la mchod pa dang /bsnyen/
331b1(mdo sde): bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /byang chub kyi spyod nu dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems myi nga/
331b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/'bras bu gzhan dag thos pa'ang ji skad bstan pa bzhin no//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tsho'i bar du log
331b3(mdo sde): par lta ba yongasu spangs na sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing bla mar byed pa dang /sems rnam par dag cing log par rtog pa dang bral bar 'gyur te/de'i dbang gros
331b4(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro//thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba'i log par lhung ba'i dbang gris
331b5(mdo sde): lus dang /ngag dang /yid sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la gzhan yang byed du 'jug cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rje su yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib
331b6(mdo sde): pa dang /sems kyi sgrib pa dang chos kyi sgrib pa dang yang dag par lta ba l-i sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur to//'di ltar log par lta ba yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus
331b7(mdo sde): par bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yongasu mi len te/lus 'di nyid la'ang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid 'ong ba dang /dogs pa med par 'gyur ba dang /
332a1(mdo sde): lus drang sems rab tu bde ba dang /sems rnam par dag cing log par lta ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro//'che 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na 'ang lus dang sems la
332a2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang /chung ma dang /'khor thams cad kyis yongasu bskor bas 'tsho 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi/shin tu 'jigs pa'i
332a3(mdo sde): gau shin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyur ro//yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan+da du ldan pa/bsod nams kyi nang yang dag padang
332a4(mdo sde): phrad de lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang /bkur sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro// 'as nas kyang phyir mi na du skye zhing dbang po yong su rdzogs pa yan
332a5(mdo sde): ldeg dang ldan pa/gung nas gung du skyesta prAr sems rnam par dag cid ldog por lta ba dang bral ba dang /byad gzugs bzang ba dang /yid gzhungs po dang /rab tu dang
332a6(mdo sde): zhing skyid pa dang /phyir yang yid du 'ang bo'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad
332a7(mdo sde): de'i rjesu mthun par slob pa dang /log par lta ba'i chos yong su spong ba dang /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu gcod pa dang /dge ba'i chos khyad par car
332b1(mdo sde): thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa dang /theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol bang byang chub sems dnga'i skyon lAm dang spyod pa thams cad rim gyis gnol zhing
332b2(mdo sde): shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang bral
332b3(mdo sde): ba dang lha'i bdud kyi 'khor thams cad dang bral ba dang /mu stegs rnon gyi 'khor thams cad dang bral ba dang /rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing shin tu mdzes
332b4(mdo sde): pa dang /yang dag par lta ba dang ldan zhing ngo mtshar dang /bikra shis dang /tshul dran pa'i lta ba sna tshogs dang /rtag par lta ba dang /chad par lta ba dang /bdag dang bdag
332b5(mdo sde): gir lta ba thams cad yongasu spangs pa'i sems can dag zhing der skye ste/shin tu tshe ring ba dang /theg pa chen po'i ro gcig la longs spyod par 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin
332b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i tshe tshad kyang dpag tu med de/sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du chos ston pa dang /yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gan
332b7(mdo sde): shing /sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang /bde ba'i don du ro gcig pa'i chos bstan pa la rtsod pa med pas yongasu rgyas par byed cing bgegs dang bar chad med
333a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag par lta ba yongasu spangs pa'i 'khor po bcu pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'
333a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po 'ad dang ldan pas nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul po med pa 'gyur ro//rang
333a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro//theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/theg pa chen
333a4(mdo sde): po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyuraro//dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongasu 'phel ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/
333a5(mdo sde): chos kyi snod ma yin pa la'ang rung chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing skra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ba dang /theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du
333a6(mdo sde): 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /rno ba'o shes rab dang /bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang /ting 'dzin dang /gzungs dang /bzod pa dang /sa rnams thams
333a7(mdo sde): cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad tsong rjesu slob pa dang /rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing /byang
333b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dang /nya thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /dge 'dun la mchod pa dang /bsnyen dkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba
333b2(mdo sde): thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /byang chub kyi spyod pa dang /smon lam dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/'bras bu gzhan 'thob pa 'ang //
333b3(mdo sde): ji skad bshad pa bzhi no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po de dag dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
333b4(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyu ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/snga ma 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mi dge ba bcu'i las yongasu spangs
333b5(mdo sde): nas thams cad kyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi 'bras bu bsngags shing bstod de/sems can thams cad la bde ba dang phan pa'i don dang /byang chub kyi lam skye zhing 'phel bar bya ba dang /
333b6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal lhag ma ma lus par bsal bar bya ba dang /ngan song gsum bskam par bya ba dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung bsab
333b7(mdo sde): par bya ba dang /khams gsum gyi srid pa yongs gcad pa bya ba dang phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched gcad par bya ba dang /thams cad myur du 'jigs pa med pa'i mya ngan las 'da'
334a1(mdo sde): ba'i grong khyer du gzung ba'i phyir ji skad bshad pa bzhin du mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi 'bras bu yongasu spong ngo //de bas na rigs kyi bu gal te yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba
334a2(mdo sde): bcu'i las kyi lam 'dri ma bsgrubs par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/chung ngu na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'ga' tsam yang mi srung bar nga ni theg pa chen po
334a3(mdo sde): yang dag par spyod pa'o zhe 'am/de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'o zhes zer na/gang zag de ni shin tu brdzun par sla ba ste/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
334a4(mdo sde): spyan sngar 'jig rten slu ba dang /'dzem pa dang /ngo che ba med pa'ang stong par smra zhing chad par lta ba/glen pa mi shes pa slu ba can yin te/de tshe 'phos nas ngan seng du lhung bar shes par bya'o//rigs
334a5(mdo sde): kyi bu gang tshig tu brjod pa tsam mam mnyan pa tsam gyis cho ga sten dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bsgoms pa 'am/nan tan bya mi dgos par byang chub dang /mya ngan las 'das par thob
334a6(mdo sde): du zin na ni bskal pa gcig la yud tsam thang cig gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sa'i khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sim+b+ha can tha~Md byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya
334a7(mdo sde): ste/mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba zhig na de ni de lta bu'i gnas med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni theg pa chen po'i rtsa ba yin te/byang chub kyi rgyu dang mya ngan las
334b1(mdo sde): 'da' ba'i them skas lta bu'o//rigs kyi bu gal te sems skyed pa tsam mam smon lam btab pa tsam gyis chog ste/dge ba bcu'i lus kyi lam goms par nan tan bya mi dgos par byang
334b2(mdo sde): chub dang /yongasu mya ngan las 'dra' bar thob tu zin na ni bskol pa gcig la yud tsam thang cig gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa'i khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sems
334b3(mdo sde): can dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba zhig nA de ni de lta bu'i gnas medo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni 'jig rten
334b4(mdo sde): dad 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu'i khyad par dang yon tan gyi rgyur 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu gal te dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan du ma byas na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
334b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi bskal par bdag ni theg pa chen po'o zhes zer te/'chad dam nyan+da te ma/sems bskyed dam/smon lam btab kyang byang chub dang /mya ngan lwa
334b6(mdo sde): 'da' ba 'thob par mi 'gyur la gzhan yang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las 'don mi nuso//rigs kyi bu dge ba bcu'i los gyi lam la nan tan byas pas 'jig rten na rgyal rigs
334b7(mdo sde): dang /bram ze la sogs pa rigs chen po dang /rgyal chen ris bzhis lha nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched stengs kyi bar du yod pa dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang
335a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du'ang yod par 'gyur te/de dag kun kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la
335a2(mdo sde): shin tu nan tan byed pa'i khyad par dang bye brag las gyur to//de bas na rigs kyi bu gang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
335a3(mdo sde): la nan tan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan te/mi dge ba bcu'i sdom pa la mi gnas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'chang rgya'o//gang myur du theg pa chen po
335a4(mdo sde): spyod yul du chud par 'dod dam/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod dam/myur du dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'dod na sngar
335a5(mdo sde): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam shin tu bsrung bar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge ba bcu'i wa kyi lan gyis ni dge ba'i chos thams cad dang /yon tan rnam par gzhag pa'i gzhi
335a6(mdo sde): dang /'jig rten dang /'jig rten las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu'i mchog thob par byed pa'i rgyu yin no//dre bas na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la shin tu nan tan bya'o//de nas/
335a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigasu cad de gsungs po//srid pa'i sdug bsngal kun gcod cing /byang chub chen po 'thobo 'dod pa/
335b1(mdo sde): dgu ba bcu'i 'khor lo nan tAn la//le lo ma byed partson par gyis//theg pa gsum gyis dam chos dang //theg pa rnam gsum gang zag dang //rab tu byung ba thams cad la//'khrum
335b2(mdo sde): pa med par 'thob par 'gyur//thig chen spyod la dado mos shing //thams cad 'khor gyi dbug 'byin pa'i//chos mchog rtogs nas zhing dag der//byang chub chen po myur du 'thog//gal
335b3(mdo sde): srog gcod yongs spangs nas//kun gyis bkur zhing bla mar byed//rtag tu nad med tshe yang rong /de zhing sgyid la gnod pa med//skye ba'i gnas ni thams cad du//sangs rgyas spyod
335b4(mdo sde): stsal lam la myos//sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dren mthong //myur du bla med byang chub 'thog/ma byin len po yongs spangs na//mkhas pas bkur zhing bla mar byed//'dod chags sgra
335b5(mdo sde): ba'i lam kun ni//'dod chags med pa skye b+hU 'gyu //skye ba kun tu longs spyod ldan//sbyin bdag chen por de 'gyur te//rin chen mang pos brgyan pa dang //yod 'dra sangs rgyas zhing
335b6(mdo sde): 'jog/'did pas log gsum yongs spongs ni//nyon mongs dri ma zhi bar 'onare//'dod chags srid pa'i maN+Da yang sgyums//rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing myur 'brog/sems can
335b7(mdo sde): rnam pa mang po yang //'dod pa'i 'dam las 'byin par 'gyur//zag chen la ni rab bkod nas//tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod du bskyed//brdzun du smra ba yongs spangs na//'phags par
336a1(mdo sde): dbang dang ye shes 'thob//rtag tu bden pa smra bar dga'//brdzun du 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal 'jil//tshig gcig tshad mur btsugs pas na//sangs rgyas chos dang //
336a2(mdo sde): dge 'dun mthong //brdzun mi smra ba bsgoms pas na//byang chub chen po myur du'i'athog//phra ma'i cho ga smra yongs spangs na//dge ba'i chos kyi snod du 'gyur//sangs rgyas chos dang dge
336a3(mdo sde): 'dun mthong //chad par lta bar yod mi 'gyur//'phags pa'i chags med dga' ba dang //rin chen gter gyi gzungs 'thob cing //zab mo chos kyi rgya mtshor rig/myur du bla med byang chub
336a4(mdo sde): 'thob//gal te zhe gcod tshig spangs te//'jam zhing gnyen pa'i tshig smras na//sems can kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur//snga ma'i mi dge las kyang zhi//'khor rnams rtag tu dge'
336a5(mdo sde): ba dang //byang chub sems dpa' ston par 'gyur//sangs rgyas mang po'i spyod yul shes//sa bcu las kyang 'da' bar 'gyur//kyal par smra ba yongs sbyangs na//mkhas pas
336a6(mdo sde): bkur zhing bla mer byed//gzhan la tshig tu smra ba kun//yon tan rnam lnga 'thob par 'gyur//rtag tu 'phags pa'i tshig nyan cing //'phags pa'i lam tshol spro bar 'gyur//sas
336a7(mdo sde): rgyas rgya mtsho yongs rdzogs shing //thams cad mkhyen pa myur du 'thob//gal te chags sems yongs spangs te//'phags pa rnams la mi smod cing //ngur smrig gyon la mchod
336b1(mdo sde): par byed//theg pa gsum gyi byang chub sgrub//rtag tu rnam dag zhing du skye//ston pa'i gnas su gnas par 'gyur//bla med theg pa la zhon te//rgyal ba'i ye shes myur du 'thob//gral te gnod
336b2(mdo sde): sems yongs spangs te/gcig tu byams pa'i sems sgoms ni//mnyam par bzhag pa'ang myur du 'thob//'phags pa'i spyod yul med par 'gyur//rnam dge sangs rgyas zhing du ste/nyes
336b3(mdo sde): pa'i skyon rnams kun dang bral//deng gnas na byang chub 'thob//gnod sems thams cad spangs par bya//dran par lta ba yongs spongs te//rnam dag dad pa'i sems sgoms na//theg gosum ston/
336b4(mdo sde): la mos byed cing //sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa byed//ngan song gsum las yongs thar te//'phagro pa'i dge 'dun rnams dang phrad//byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan//ye shes mchog
336b5(mdo sde): kyang 'thob par 'gyur//dge ba bcu yi las lam gyis//byang chub mchog thob 'gyur zhes gsungs//snyoms par 'jug reng gzungs rnams dang //sa dang bzod pa skye bar 'gyur//
336b6(mdo sde): bdag nyid che ba'i 'khor lo 'dis//ngan song thams cad rab bcom nas//sdig pa'i sgrib pa kun kyang choms//myur du byang chub chen po thob//'phags pa shin tu rgyas po chen po so'i snying/
336b7(mdo sde): po 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o///rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi skyo
337a1(mdo sde): pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod de//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod
337a2(mdo sde): pa lnga yongasu bsal te/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos
337a3(mdo sde): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /srung ba dang /bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rnam pa sna tshogs kyi zas dang /skom dang gos dang //
337a4(mdo sde): rin po che'i rgyan dang /bal glang dang /rta dang /shing rta dang /lus kyi yan lag dang /rkang pa dang /lag pa dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /mgo dang /mig dang /rkang dang /klad rgyas dang /
337a5(mdo sde): hUMgs pa dang /rus pa dang /shra dang /khrag dang /yul dang /srid dang /bu dang /chung ma dang /bran po dang bran mo dang /khang khyim dang /zhing 'brog la sogs pa de dag thams cad sbyin pa de
337a6(mdo sde): re re byed pa na lus dang srog lnga mi lta zhing bdag gcig pu 'jibyen dang 'dzin rje 'das pa'i bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir sems bskyed de sbyin pa byed pa ma yin gyi/sems can thams cad
337a7(mdo sde): la byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po'i myu gu bskyed pa'i phyir sbyin pa byin pa'i sems bskyed//tha bas mkhas pa dang shes rab mchog bskyed pa'i phyir sbyin pa byin pa'i sems
337b1(mdo sde): bskyed do//sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po phan pa dang /dade ba'i ngan gyi phyir sbyin pa byin pa'i sems bskyed//sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsngal pa'i phyir spyan
337b2(mdo sde): pa byin pa'i sems bskyed do//gzhan las skrag go snyam pa med pa'i sems dang /bo rlang po med po'i sems dang /phrag dog med pa'i sems dang /ser sna dang zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis
337b3(mdo sde): sbyin pa byin no//gang sbyin pa'i dngos po che'ang rung /chung yang rung /chung ngu na zan changs gcig tsam gyi sbyin pa byas na'ang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la mi re bar sbyin pa byin pa'i sems
337b4(mdo sde): bskyed do//nyan thos kyi theg pa'i 'bras bu la mi re bar sbyin pa byin pa'i sems bskyed do//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i 'bras bu la mI re bar sbyin pa byin pa'o sems bskyed do//gang
337b5(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i dngos po de tshe'ang rung /chung yang rung /chung ngu ni zan tshangs gcig tsami gyi sbyin pa byas na 'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shesu bsngo zhing sbyin pa byin po'i sems
337b6(mdo sde): bskyed do//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po de dang ldan ni/thog ma sems bskyed pa
337b7(mdo sde): na 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongasu bsal ba'i phyir nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nam
338a1(mdo sde): chen po'i zhing du 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /yongasu bsrung bar
338a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyis sbyin pa byin pa'i sems bskyed pa ni byams pa dang /snying rje chen po'i sems med kyi bdag gi dbul ba de
338a3(mdo sde): spong ba dang bdag sdug bsngal las thar pa dang /bdag bde ba thob por bya ba dang /bdag mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa byed de/sems can thams cad kyi phyir
338a4(mdo sde): sbyin pa byed pa ni ma yin no//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa byin na ni byams pa dang /snying rje chen po'i sems kyis sems can thams cad kyi dbul phongs
338a5(mdo sde): po spong po dang /sems can thams cad sdug bsngal lngas gdon pa dang /sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa dang /sems can thams cad mya ngan las
338a6(mdo sde): bzla ba'i phyir sbyin pa byed kyi/bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir sbyin pa spyod pa ma yin no//de lta bas na nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/nyan
