338a7(mdo sde): thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /
338b1(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byed cing yongasu srung bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zang zing gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu byin par spyod pa na 'dod pa rnam lnga'i mchog
338b2(mdo sde): la sems mi chags te/bdag nyid dbang ba bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sems can kun la sbyin pa byed de/sems can thams cad yongasu sdod pa'i sems dang /bdag gi
338b3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal thams cad la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa'i sems dang /sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i sems dang /sems can thams cad la bde ba sbyin pa'i
338b4(mdo sde): sems dang /sems can thams cad mya ngan las bzla ba'i sems la gnas te sbyin pa byed do//de bas na nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa nyan
338b5(mdo sde): thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg bapa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /bsnyen bkur dang /srung
338b6(mdo sde): ba byed par 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu gal te 'dod pa lnga la sems mi chags shing byams pa dang /snying rje chen pos sbyin pa byed na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o//nyan
338b7(mdo sde): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa zhes bya'o//gal te 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa rnam lnga 'ongam spangs la byams pa dang /snying rje chen po'ang med par sbyin pa
339a1(mdo sde): byed na sbyin pa'i dngos po tshad med dpag tu med pa btang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi
339a2(mdo sde): zhing yang dag pa'ang mi yin pos sbyin pa 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi phyag rgyas btab po ma yin//de bas na 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa lnga spangs te/byams pa dang /snying rje chen po dang ldan pas sbyin pa
339a3(mdo sde): bya'o//gal te 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa lnga 'ang ma spangs la byams pa dang /snying rje chen po 'ang med par sbyin pa byed na byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang mi bya la bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag po'ang ma
339a4(mdo sde): yin no//rigs kyi bu 'dod pa rnam pa lnga la chags pas sbyin pa byed na bdag nyid kyi lus kyi sdug bsngal gyi cha chung zad kyang zhi bar mi 'gyur na sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal tshad
339a5(mdo sde): med pa bsal ba lta ci smos/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/zang zing sbyin pa'i 'khor lo ldan pa//mkhas pa
339a6(mdo sde): bsam pa dag pa'i mos pas/'dod pa rnam pa lnga dag ni spangs te//sems can kun la phyin dang bde byed//sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir gyi//rnam smin 'bras bu de phyir ma yin//sbyin
339a7(mdo sde): pa'i dngos po byin pa chung yang //yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur//sbyin pa'i dngos po mang du byas kyang //'dod pa rnam lnga dag la gnas ni//'phags pa dag gi phyag rgyas
339b1(mdo sde): btag mangs pa yi tshogs la gnas 'gyur//sbyin pa'i dngos po byin pa chung yang //'dod pa'i lnga la mi gnas pa ni//nyan thos dag dang rang rgya la yi//yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur//
339b2(mdo sde): bas 'dod pa rnam lnga spangs la/rtag tu rnam dgu sbyin pa byed cing //sems can kun la bde ba byas na//yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byeng chub sems
339b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi sbyin pa'i go tshe chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo de dang ldan na thog mo sems bskye
339b4(mdo sde): nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongasu bsal ba'i phyir myur du nyi ma'i sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin thob cing nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/nyan thos dang /rang
339b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams chen po'i zhing du 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dang /bsrung ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur
339b6(mdo sde): ro//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstan pa dam pa'i chos nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi thog pa dang
339b7(mdo sde): ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang /theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang /'jig rten gyi chos dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang /zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos dang /
340a1(mdo sde): zag pa zad pa'i chos pa dang /'dus byas kyi chos dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos dang /gnyisu med pa'i chos rnams te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'o
340a2(mdo sde): chen po chos rnam pa bcu po 'di la dad cing gus par byed pa dang /ji skad thos pa rnams ci nus su gzungasu 'dzin cing yid la byed do//rab tu rtog go//mthar khong du chung bar
340a3(mdo sde): byed cing gzhan dag la 'ang ci rigs par rtog par byed do//nam chos ston pa'i tshen phrag dog med pa'i sems dang /ser sna med pa'i sems dang /nga rgyalnga med pa'i sems
340a4(mdo sde): dang /rnyed pa mi re ba'i sems dang /gzhan mi smod pa'i sems dang /bdag mi stong pa'i sems dang /bsti stang dang bcas pa'i sems dang /phan pa'i sems dang /byams/
340a5(mdo sde): pa chen po'i sems dang /snying rje chen po'i semasu bya'o//nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag la ni nyan thos kyi chos ston cing 'chad kyi/de la rang sangs rgyas kyis chos sam//
340a6(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i chos kyi ma yin pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos ston gyi/nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos sam/theg
340a7(mdo sde): pa chen po'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang /theg pa chen po'i gang zag la ni theg pa chen po'i chos ston gyi/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i chos kyis ma yin/
340b1(mdo sde): pa dang /sems can gyi dbang po dang /snod ji lta ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston gyi/dbang po dang snod du ma gyur pa la chos mi ston to//gang theg pa chen po'i sems can yangangasadra/
340b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi theg pa spyod cig par ram+ba/nyan thos kyi theg pa spyod cig par mi skul lo//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi sems can la skabs kha cig tu theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la//
340b3(mdo sde): nan tan byos shig ces skul ba'i skabs ni yod de/nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi sems can la skabs kha cig tu rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i spyod pa dang /theg pa chen po'i spyod
340b4(mdo sde): pa la nan tan gyis shig ces skul ba'i skabs kyang yod de/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i dam pa'i chos chung ngu na tshig su bcad pa gcig gom tshig su bcad pa phyed tsam la
340b5(mdo sde): 'dra shin tu dad cing bkur sti byed kyi/de la 'phya 'am skur ba 'am/bgegs sam/bar chad mi byed de/chos ston pa la sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar 'du shes pa dang /chos nyan
340b6(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor rnams la nad pa dang 'dri bar 'du shes pa dang /gang 'chad pa'i chos la sman bzang po drang 'dra bar 'du shes shing 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongasu bcad de re ba med pas dam pa'i
340b7(mdo sde): chos ston to//rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'
341a1(mdo sde): sems dang chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na 'dod pa lta yong su bas sa te/myur du nyi ma'i sgron ma'i da ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin rtsub cing nyan thos dang rang
341a2(mdo sde): snangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang /nyan thos dang /ring sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas
341a3(mdo sde): kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /bsrung ba dang /bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis den 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs
341a4(mdo sde): bcad de bka' stsal pa/mkhas pa chos kyi sbyin pa spyod pa dag/snod bzhin thog pa gsum gyi chos ston to//thig pa gzhan dag de la stod mi byed//thos nas de la 'phya zhing
341a5(mdo sde): sgyur mi 'gyur//dbang po snod bzhin dam pa'i chos ston gyi dbang po snod min dag la ma yin no//saM sa ji ltar ci la mos pa bzhin//de da do ye chos ston mgu bar byed/
341a6(mdo sde): theg pa chen po spyad pa'i gang zag la//theg pa rnam pa gnyis kyi chos mi bstan//ba bar thug pa gnyis kyi gang zag la/theg pa 'bring dang rab kyi chos ston to//shin
341a7(mdo sde): tu dad cing gus pos chos mnyan gyi//de la 'phya zhing skur bar mi bya'o//chos smra ba la mchod pa byed pa ni/sangs rgyas 'dra bar de la 'du shes bskyed//kun nas nyon mongs pa sa
341b1(mdo sde): nod bsal phyir//dam pa'i chos kyi spyan dag nyan par bskul//khe dang grags pa shin tu ring spangs to//dam pa'i chos dag bstan cing bshad par bya//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen//
341b2(mdo sde): po'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa gi cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan no//thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongasu bsal te/nyan thos
341b3(mdo sde): dang /ring sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad
341b4(mdo sde): kyis mchod pa dang //bsrung ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur//de la ji ltar na tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa
341b5(mdo sde): rnam pa gnyis te/thun meng pa dang /thun mong po mo yin pa'o//dri la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrim+bu rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo thun mong pa zhe na//gdo khyim ni gnas pa dge bsnyen pa dang /dge bsnyen ma'i tshul khrim
341b6(mdo sde): sdom pa blangs pa 'am/yang na rab tu byung ba so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa ste/sdom pa 'ad dang so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims 'di ni byang chub so de'i tshul khrims rnam par drag pa'i 'khor lo thun mong pa
341b7(mdo sde): ste nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong po yino//byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa 'di'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon
342a1(mdo sde): mongs pa chod par ram/log par lta bya sal bar rAm/las kyi sgrib pa dang /'khor ba las grol bar mi 'gyur te/gro chu chen po'i 'khor lo zhes
342a2(mdo sde): kyang mi bya/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no/
342a3(mdo sde): de lA dzi ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo thun mongs ma yin zhe na/gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyogs
342a4(mdo sde): bcu'i sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems dang /gnod pa med pa'i sems dang /'khon du 'dzin bya med pa'i sems kyis rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo //
342a5(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang /tshul khrims ngan pa can+da dang /sbyin pa dang /sder sna dang /byams pa dang /zhe sdang dang /brtson 'grus dang /le lo can rab 'bring tha me kun la bye brag mi
342a6(mdo sde): 'byed pa'i sems dang /khyad par med pa'i 'du shes kyis tshul khrims yongs su srung ngo //khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la zhe sdang med pa dang /khong khrod medapa
342a7(mdo sde): dang /ngan par spyod pa med pas tshul khrims yongs su srung ngo //srid pa gsum gyi phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched la rnam par rtog pa med pas tshul khrims yongs
342b1(mdo sde): su srung ngo //'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo //gzugs yod pa'i khams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo //gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas par
342b2(mdo sde): tshul khrims srung ngo //srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thams cad la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo //rnyed pa dang mi rnyed pa la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo //'du byed rnams la
342b3(mdo sde): me gnas par tshul khrims srung ste/'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
342b4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/byang chub sems
342b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod namos kyi zhing chen por
342b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /bsrung ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar
342b7(mdo sde): bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal la/khyim na gnas shing sdom pa len pa//rang byung so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims//theg pa gnyis dang thun mang yin te//byang chub chen po zhes ni
343a1(mdo sde): mi bya//mkhas pa stong pa nyid chos sgom pa//'jig rten kun la mi rten mi gnas//srid pa kun la gnas ma yin par//rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo //mtshan ma spong
343a2(mdo sde): ba'i tshul khrims dag ni//chags pa med de zag pa kun meng//tshul khrims 'di lnga srung ba dag ni//yang dag bsod nams zhing zhes de bya//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
343a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'dri dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa
343a4(mdo sde): lnga yongs su bsal te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nisaci zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /nyon thos dang /rang
343a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /bsrung ba dang /bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro//de la ji ltar na bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu
343a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa la mtshan nyid rnam pa gnyis te/gang zhe na 'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi bzod
343a7(mdo sde): po zhe na/de ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i bzod pa ste/sems can la dmigs pa/len pa dang bcas pa/mtshan ma dang bcas pa/rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la rten pa/bsod
343b1(mdo sde): nams kyi las la brten te bzod par byed pa'o//gzhan yang bdag gi gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya la brten nas bzod par byed pa'o//'jug pa dang bcas pa'i bzod pa ji
343b2(mdo sde): mi snyam pa med pa'i bzod pa dang /mthu zhan pa'i bzod pa'i sems can gtong ba'i bzod pa dang /g.yo dang sgyur bcas pa'i bzod pa dang /pha rol la 'drid pa'i bzod pa dang /sems can
343b3(mdo sde): la phan pa dang bde ba'i don mi byed pa'i bzod pa ste/'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi bzod pa zhes bya ste/bzod pa 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dang thun
343b4(mdo sde): mong ma yin gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang ma yin te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod
343b5(mdo sde): nams kyi zhing yang dag pa zhes kyang mi bya'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzod pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/zag pa med pa'i bzod pa ste/
343b6(mdo sde): 'phags pa thams cad chen po'i 'od kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir chags pa med pa'i bzod pa dang /bya ba'i dngos po thams cad dang /tshig tu smra ba dang /
343b7(mdo sde): rgyu dang /mtshan ma dang /yi ga dang /sgra skad thams cad yongs su bcad pa'i skye mched la brten pa'i bzod pa spyod do//bzod pa 'di bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum dang /bskal pa
344a1(mdo sde): rnam gsum dang /mtshan nyid gsum dang /dus gsum dang /srid pa gsum dang /'du byed rnam gsum dang /mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum dang /chu bo bzhi dang /mdud pa rnam
344a2(mdo sde): bzhi dang /nye bar len pa bzhi dang /lus kyi mdud pa rnam bzhi la sogs pa yongs su bcad pas bzod pa 'di bsgom pa'i tshe sems dang yid rab tu zhi bas 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
344a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'i bzod pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'i bzod pa de dang ldan pas/
344a4(mdo sde): thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga rnams yongs su bsal ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin
344a5(mdo sde): tu 'das pa'i nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /bsrung
344a6(mdo sde): ba dang /bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/bzod pa la ni rnam pa gnyis te/
344a7(mdo sde): mtshan mar bcas dngo mtshan ma med pa//mtshan mar rabaces pa'i bzod pa chags yod//mkhas pa dag ni de la mi bstod//'du byed rnam gsum phung po khams dang //skye mchod la
344b1(mdo sde): rten bzod pa sgom pa//de ni zag bcas bzod pa yin te//byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma yin//phyin ci log ni rnam bzhi byasal nas//chags pa med pa'i bzod pa sgom zhing //'du byed rnam pa
344b2(mdo sde): gsum dag zhe na//bzod pa 'di la thams cad bstod 'gyur//'du byed thams cad rab tu zhi zhing //rtog pa thams cad yongs su spangs te//sems ni nam mkha' 'dra bar mnyam pa//bzod pa
344b3(mdo sde): 'di la thams cad bstod 'gyur//thams cad chos la ro gcig mthun par//stong pa mtshan ma med pa zhi ba//sems ni ci la'ang mi gnas mi chags//bzod pa 'din phan don cher 'gyur//
344b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo dri dang
344b5(mdo sde): ldan na thog ma sems bskyod pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod
344b6(mdo sde): names kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /srung ba dang /bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro//de la ji ltar na brtson 'grus
344b7(mdo sde): kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus la rnam pa gnyis te/'jig rten dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub
345a1(mdo sde): snyams dpa'i 'jog rten pa'i dun 'grum zhun/byung klu snams da' shin tu 'a'ad+ma pa'i btsun 'grus kyi 'jig rten gyi bstod rnams kyil sa sa spyo bang/
345a2(mdo sde): gsum la nan tan byed do//gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa byed pa'i bsod nams kyi las dang /tshul khrims snang ba'i bsod nams byed pa'i las dang /bsgom pa'i bso ma
345a3(mdo sde): byed pa'i las so//las 'di dag byed pa ni brtson 'grus rnam po gsum zhes bya ste/brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum po 'di dag ni sems can la dmigs pa zag pa dang bcas pa/nye bar
345a4(mdo sde): len pa dang bcas pa/rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la rten pa bskyod rnams kyi lus la brten pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi brtson 'grus zhes bya'o//brtson 'grus 'dri
345a5(mdo sde): ninyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sogs pa dang thun mong yin te/go rgya chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi byaM/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/nyan thos
345a6(mdo sde): dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa'ang ma yin no//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpe'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'a
345a7(mdo sde): lo gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' dag shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis nyon mongs pa'i las dang sdug bsngal thams cad sel
345b1(mdo sde): bste/brtson 'grus 'di ni 'phags pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa/zag pa med pa/nye bar len pa med pa/rten dang gnas med de/brtson 'grus dang /le lo dang /sbyin pa dang /ser sna dang /tshub/
345b2(mdo sde): khrims dang /ngan pa'i tshul khrims can dang /byamus pa dang /zhe sdang dang /sems can rab dang /'bring dang /tha ma kun la mi 'byed pa'i sems dang /bye brag med pa'i 'du shes kyis shin tu 'bad
345b3(mdo sde): pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom mo//khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang /dmigs pa med pas bya ba'i las byed de smra ba dang /rtog pa dang /dpyod pa'i gnas thams cad/
345b4(mdo sde): la mi gnas pa'i sems kyis shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom mo//srid pa gsum gyi phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched la rnam par rtog pa med pas shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus
345b5(mdo sde): rtsom ste/'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang /gzugs yod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang /gzugs med pa'i khams la mi
345b6(mdo sde): gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang /sbrid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thams cad la mi rtog pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang /rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa kun la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson
345b7(mdo sde): 'grus dang /'du byed rnams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang /'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po gsum la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang /'jig rten
346a1(mdo sde): lus 'das pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po rnam pa gsum la shin tu brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das
346a2(mdo sde): pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo de dang ldan na thog
346a3(mdo sde): ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das te/
346a4(mdo sde): nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /srung ba dang /bsnyen bkur
346a5(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/dbang po drug la shin tu chags pa'i//bus ma chu bo lngas
346a6(mdo sde): ni khyer ba//shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom yang //mkhas pa rnams kyis de la smod 'gyur//sems can dmigs shing zug dang bcas la//len par bcas shing brdzun 'grus
346a7(mdo sde): rtsom na//yang dag bsod nams zhing ma yin te//byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma yin//mkhas pa brtson 'grus rtsom pa dag ni//chags pa thams cad ring du spangs te//sems ni
346b1(mdo sde): ci la'ang mi gnas mi chags//yang dag bsod nams zhing zhes de bya//ming dang gzugs la chags pa med cing //phung po khams dang skye mched spangs te//thams cad 'khor gyi rten du 'gyur ba//de ni
346b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chen po//'jig rten spyod kyang chu zla bzhin te//'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i mthar phyin//'khor lo 'di yis yongs su bcom pa//skye bo kun nas nyon mongs bcings pa'o/
346b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan
346b4(mdo sde): na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi
346b5(mdo sde): zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /srung ba dang /bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro//de la ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i
346b6(mdo sde): 'khor lo gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan la rnam pa gnyis te/'jig rten dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi
346b7(mdo sde): bsam gtan gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' rnams phung po la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan
347a1(mdo sde): snyam pa dang /'dod pa'i khams la gnas nas pasam gtan snyam pa dang /gzugs yod pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /gzugs med pa'i khams la
347a2(mdo sde): gnas nas bsam gtan skam pa dang /sdom pa gsum la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /rnam par grol ba gsum la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
347a3(mdo sde): bani la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /yang dag par spang ba bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /
347a4(mdo sde): po lnga la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /stobs lnga la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /'phags
347a5(mdo sde): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /sa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /chu'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /
347a6(mdo sde): me'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan rlom pa dang /rlung gi khams la gnas nas bsam gnyen sgom pa dang /nam mkha'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /rnam pa
347a7(mdo sde): shes pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /bde ba'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtad snyom pa dang /
347b1(mdo sde): bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye
347b2(mdo sde): mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom
347b3(mdo sde): pa dang /'jig rten 'di la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /'jig rten pha rol la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /'du shes chung ngu la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /'du shes
347b4(mdo sde): chen po la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /'du shes tshad med pa la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa ste/bsam gtan de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa/nye bar len pa dang bcas pa/chags
347b5(mdo sde): pa dang bcas pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya'o//bsam gtan 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong pa zhes bya ste/
347b6(mdo sde): go cha chen po'i 'khor lo ma yin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag par ma yin no//de la ji
347b7(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gang zhe na/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' rnams phung po dang bral bar bsam gtan skom pa dang /khams dang bral bar
348a1(mdo sde): bsam gtan sgom pa dang /skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /'dod pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /gzugs kyi khams dang bral bar
348a2(mdo sde): bsam gtan sgom pa dang /gzugs med pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /sdom pa gsum dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /rnam par thar pa gsum dang bral bar
348a3(mdo sde): bsam gtan sgom pa dang /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
348a4(mdo sde): bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /dbang po lnga dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /stobs lnga dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang bral
348a5(mdo sde): bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /sa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /chu'i khams dang bral
348a6(mdo sde): bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /me'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /rlung gi khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /nam mkha'i khams dang bral bar bsam
348a7(mdo sde): gtan sgom pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /bde bar tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /sdug bsngal du tshor ba dang bral bar bsam
348b1(mdo sde): gtan sgom pa dang /sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin bde ba'ang ma yin par tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /rnam
348b2(mdo sde): shes mtha' yas skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /chung zad med pa'i skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang bral bar
348b3(mdo sde): bsam gtan sgom pa dang /'jig rten 'di dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /'jig rten pha rol dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /'du shes chung ngu dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom
348b4(mdo sde): pa dang /'du shes chen po dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /'du shes tshad med pa dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa ste/bsam gtan 'di ni 'phags pa'i 'od zer chen po bskyed pa/
348b5(mdo sde): zag pa med pa/nye bar len pa med pa/chags pa med pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub
348b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
348b7(mdo sde): chen po zhes bya'o//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang
349a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /bsrung ba dang /bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas ba
349a2(mdo sde): phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/bdag gi khung lci spong ba'i phyir ni//dmigs dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin bsgoms te//bdag gi kun nas nyon mongs gcod 'dod //yang dag mkhas pa'i
349a3(mdo sde): mtshan nyid ma yin//snod la rten cing rtog dang bcas pa//rnam par grol 'dod ting 'dzin sgom yang //tshul rol pha rol mu la gnas na//sems can dag la phan don byed min//
349a4(mdo sde): sems can kun la phan dang bde phyir//ting 'dzin sgom zhing khur lci spongs te//kun nas nyon mongs thams cad sel ba//de ni yang dag mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid//sems can thams
349a5(mdo sde): cad sim par byed phyir//mi gnas pa yi ting 'dzin sgom ste//'dod pa'i srid pa thams cad chod pa//de ni blo gros chen po zhes bya//srid pas bcings pa thams cad bkrol te//'jigs
349a6(mdo sde): pa med pa'i grong du gzung phyir//rab tu zhi ba'i ting 'dzin sgom pa//de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o///'dus pa chen po las byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying
349a7(mdo sde): po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po bcu pa ste tha ma//rigs kyi bu rgyuzha na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i
349b1(mdo sde): 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dag ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/nyan thos dang /rang
349b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
349b3(mdo sde): pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /bsrung ba dang /bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro//de la ji ltar na shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i
349b4(mdo sde): shes rab la ni rnam pa gnyis te/'jig rten gyi dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i shes rab ce na/'di lta ste/byang chub sems
349b5(mdo sde): dpa' rnams theg pa gsum gyi dam pa'i chos klog pa dang /'don pa dang /glegs bam du 'dri ba dang /nyan pa dang /pha rol la ston cing 'chad pa 'ba' zhig la rten te/sems can thams
349b6(mdo sde): cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar 'dod pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi shes rab kyi sgron ma dbyung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos la
349b7(mdo sde): shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis klog pa dang /'don pa dang /nyan pa dang /glegs bam du 'dri ba dang /gzhan dag la rgyas par ston cing 'chang ba dang /yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan
350a1(mdo sde): tan byed pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos la klog pa dang /'don pa dang /nyan pa dang /glegs bam du 'dri ba dang /
350a2(mdo sde): gzhan dag la rgyas par ston cing 'chad pa dang /yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan du spyod do//de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i chos la brtson 'grus su
350a3(mdo sde): klog pa dang /'don pa dang /nyan pa dang /glegs bam du 'dri ba dang /gzhan la yang rgyas por ston cing 'chad pa dang /yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan byed pa ste/'phags pa'i zag
350a4(mdo sde): ba med pa'i lam gyi yan lag tshol ba ma yin/'phags pa'i lam tshol ba ma yin/'phags pa'i lam du gtogs pa'i rnam par grol ba tshol ba ma yin/rab tu zhi ba yang dag pa'i shes rabal
350a5(mdo sde): nan tan byed pa ma yin te/rtag tu lta ba dang bcas pa/shes rab dang bcas pa'i shes rab la nan tan byed do//de ltar len pa dang bcas pa/chags pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab ni byang chub
350a6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi shes rab rjes bya'o//shes rab de ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin te/go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya/de la byang chub sems
350a7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las
350b1(mdo sde): ngas pa'i shes rab ce na/'di lta ste//byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi lam la brtson 'grus su nan tan byed pa ni ci nus su theg pa gsum gyi yang dag pa'i chos lnga klog pa dang /'don pa dang /nyan
350b2(mdo sde): pa dang /glegs bam du 'bri ba dang /gzhon dag la rgyas par ston cing 'chang kyang de la dmigs su med pa'i stong ba la gnas te/mi g.yo ba dang /mi rtog pa dang /ngo bo nyid med pa dang /nam mkha' lta bu
350b3(mdo sde): sems dang /rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang /'phel ba dang /'grib pa med pa'i shes rab dang /chags pa med pa'i sems dang /skye ba dang 'gog pa med pa'i sems dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang /chos
350b4(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid kyi sems dang /de bzhin nyid kyi sems dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'i sems dang /chos kyi dbyings kyi sems dang /bdag med pa'i sems dang /rnam par mi rtog pa'i sems dang /rab tu zhi ba
350b5(mdo sde): dang /bzod pa dang /rtog pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis grub pa dang /'jigs pa med pa'i sa la shin tu thabs mkhas pas bde bar gnas pa dang /mi gnas pa mi chags pa'i mchog dam pa'i blo gros kyis
350b6(mdo sde): lnga thabs mkhas pas bde bar gnas pa ste/shes rab 'di ni len pa med pa la chags pa med pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes byas
350b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
351a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba
351a2(mdo sde): dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa dang /srung ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa'i
351a3(mdo sde): go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/nyan thos dang rang sangs
351a4(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis
351a5(mdo sde): mchod pa dang /srung ba dang /bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro//de la ji ltar na thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa
351a6(mdo sde): la rnam pa gnyis te/'jig rten dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'o//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'
351a7(mdo sde): rnams bdag gi don nam gzhan gyi don nam/gnyis ka'i don la bdag dang gzhan du rtog cing bzo dang sgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bdag dang gzhan gyi don yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir sangs
351b1(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /nyan thos la mchod pa dang /bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /pha dang /ma dang /nad pa dang /nyams thag pa dang /mgon dang rten
351b2(mdo sde): med pa dang /gnod pa mang pos sdug bsngal bar gyur pa mthong na shin tu thabs mkhas pas sgrol zhing bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams zhes sems can yongs su smin par byed do//byang chub sems dpa' de
351b3(mdo sde): bdag theg pa chen po la gnas pas nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang /theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin pa nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi dbang po yongs su ma smin pa la shin
351b4(mdo sde): tu phra ba zab pa dam pa'i chos ston te/slob tu gzhug pa dang /'phags pa'i bsam gtan la nan tan du byed du gzhug go//gzhan yang don dam pa'i bden pa bsten te nan tan byed du gzhug pa dang /
351b5(mdo sde): phyin ci log bzhi las bzla zhing mi ltung ba'i chos kyi mtshan nyid rig par bya ba dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gzhol bar bya ba nas/gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag
351b6(mdo sde): par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /lhag ma dang bcas pa dang /
351b7(mdo sde): lhag ma ma lus pa'i lam dang lam gyi 'bras bu'i bar du 'jug par bya ba la mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par byed do//sems can gang khe dang /grags pa dang /longs spyod la
352a1(mdo sde): chags te dbang po rgod pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa la ni mdo sde dang /'dul ba dang /ma mo klog pa dang /'don pa byed du gzhug pa dang /sangs rgyas gzhan gyis
352a2(mdo sde): bshad pa las gzhan pa rnam par grol ba dang mthun pa'i gtsug lag klog cing 'don du bcug ste yongs su smin par byed do//sems can gang sbyin pa byed pa la mi mos pa la ni nor rin po che/
352a3(mdo sde): dang /nor dbyig rnam pa sna tshogs gtong bar skul bas yongs su smin par byed do//sems can gang gtum pa mi nges pa'i rang bzhin can tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi slob tu skul ba dang /
352a4(mdo sde): sems can gang zhe sdang can la bzod pa slob par skul ba dang /sems can gang le lo can la ni brtson 'grus slob tu skul ba dang /sems can gang sems g.yeng ba la ni bsam gtan sgom
352a5(mdo sde): par skul ba dang /sems can gang 'chal pa'i shes rab can la ni yang dag pa'i chos ston pas bka' lung brda sprod cing lung 'bog pa la thabs mkhas pas yongs su smin par byed do//
352a6(mdo sde): sems can gang dkon mchog gsum la mngon par ma dad cing mi gnas pa dang /mi spyod pa can la ni dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang /dge
352a7(mdo sde): bsnyen pa'i sdom pa bslab pa dang /dge bsnyen ma'i sdom pa bslab pas yongs su smin par byed do//gzhan yang bzo dang sgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnas la slob cing spyod du btsud pas
352b1(mdo sde): de yongs su smin par byed do//de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pas ye shes kyi rnam pa ni chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed pas mang ngo //
352b2(mdo sde): de ltar yi ge dang /gtsug lag dang /bzo dang /sgyu rtsal gyi las kyi gnas thams cad la lhag pa'i spyod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis mu stegs can dang /ston pa
352b3(mdo sde): gzhan la zhugs pa thams cad btul ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//thabs mkhas pa 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin
352b4(mdo sde): te/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad gnas pa'i rgyur gyur pa/thabs mkhas pa spyod pa'i gnas su gyur pa/dge bsnyen pa'i sdom pa bslabs pa la shin tu thabs mkhas pa lhun gyis grub
352b5(mdo sde): phas rtog pa med pa'i phyir ldog pa med pa'i chos su gyur pa'o//gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang ston pa mkhas pa la'ang mi rten/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la'ang mi ltos
352b6(mdo sde): par 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa lA nan tan byed na/byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pas rmongs pa yin te/ngan sdong du lhung bar 'gyur ro//de ni 'jig rten las
352b7(mdo sde): 'das pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes la gzhol zhing gnas par yang mi nus la/thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no//shin tu thabs mi mkhas pas sems
353a1(mdo sde): can gyi dbang po dang /spyod pa'i khyad par yang mi shes la/shin tu thabs mkhas pa la'ang rmongs par gyur pas nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /theg/
353a2(mdo sde): pa chen po'i snod ma yin pa dang /theg pa chen po'i dbang por ma smin pa dag la theg pa chen po ston pa dang /slob cing nan tan byed du bcug go/gang theg pa chen po'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems
353a3(mdo sde): can la ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos ston cing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la slob cing non tan byed du bcug go/gang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos kyi snod
353a4(mdo sde): du gyur pa'i sems can la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos ston cing /nyan thos kyi theg pa la slob cing nan tan byed du bcug go/gang nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ni
353a5(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i chos la ni bde ba dang dga' bar ston te/'khor ba'i chos la skyo ba skyed par mi ston to//gzhan yang shin tu thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas sems can gang srog gcod pa la dga'
353a6(mdo sde): ba nas de bzhin du log par lta ba'i bar du mos pa dag la ni shin tu zab pa theg pa chen po'i chos ston te/de la 'khor ba 'di nas shi 'phos nas pha rol tu skye zhing sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu rnam par
353a7(mdo sde): smin pa myong ba la skyo zhing 'jigs pa dang /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos spang ba mi ston to//gzhan yang shin tu thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas sems can gang tshul khrims srung bar mos pa la
353b1(mdo sde): ni sbyin pa spyod du 'jug go/sems can gang bzod pa sgom par mos pa la ni bzod pa spong ba ston cing tshul khrims srung du 'jug go/sems can gang brtson 'grus rtsom par mos pa la ni brtson 'grus spong ba
353b2(mdo sde): ston cing bzod pa spyod du 'jug go//sems can gang bsam gtan sgom par mos pa la ni bsam gtan spong ba ston cing brtson 'grus la nan tan byed du bcug go//sems can gang shes rab sgom par mos pa
353b3(mdo sde): la ni shes rab spong ba ston cing bsam gtan sgom du 'jug go/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i
353b4(mdo sde): don byed mi nus te/sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa'i grogs por gyur to//thabs mkhas pa 'di ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa chags pa dang bcas pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten
353b5(mdo sde): gyi thabs mkhas pa zhes bya'o//de ltar 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong ba yin te/go cha chen po'i 'khor lo ma yin/byang chub sems
353b6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das
353b7(mdo sde): pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi don btang ste/gzhan gyi don lhur byed pas bzo dang skya rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par ston pas yongs
354a1(mdo sde): su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /pha dang ma la bsnyen bkur dang /mchod pa byed pa dang /
354a2(mdo sde): nad pa dang /phongs pa nyam thag pa dang /mgon dang skyabs med pa dang /shin tu sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos gzir ba la thabs kyis sgrol ba dang /bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis sems can yongs
354a3(mdo sde): su smin par byed do//ci la mos pa dang /dbang po dang /snod ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la dam pa'i chos ston to//gzhan yang rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la slob
354a4(mdo sde): cing nan tAn byed par skul ba dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni theg pa chen po slob cing nan tan byed par skul ba dang /gal te nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par dbang po ma smin pa ni
354a5(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi chos kyis skyo ba ston cing 'khor bas skyo ba dang /mya ngan las 'da' ba tshol bar skul lo//sems can gang srog gcod pa la mos pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du chags
354a6(mdo sde): pa la ni dbang po dang /rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor bar 'khor ba'i chos ston pa dang /'jig rten 'di shi 'phos nas pha rol tu skye ba 'di dang /pha rol gyi sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu myong bar
354a7(mdo sde): sngon te/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos kyis 'jigs pa dang skyo ba ston to//kha cig la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston to//kha cig la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'o chos
354b1(mdo sde): ston to//kha cig la ni bla na med pa'i theg pa'i chos yang dag par bstan te khad kyis slob tu 'jug go//sems can gang sbyin pa la mos par 'gyur ba rnams la mi tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mchog srung
354b2(mdo sde): bar bstan pa de bzhin du rgyas par sems can grang bsam gtan la mos par 'gyur ba la ni zag pa med pa 'phags po'i lam gyi mchog gis bsdus pa dang /shes rab bla na med pa ston cing nan tan byed
354b3(mdo sde): du bcug ste/shin tu thabs mkhas pas 'di ni dmigs pa med pa dang /chags pa med pa ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo
354b4(mdo sde): zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su
354b5(mdo sde): bsal bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams
354b6(mdo sde): kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /srung ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag gsal bar
354b7(mdo sde): bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/shes rab nan tan rnams nyis te//'jig rten bcas dang 'jig rten 'das//chags pa de ni 'jig rten bcas//chags med pa ni 'jig rten
355a1(mdo sde): 'das//shin tu thabs mkhas nan tan ni//khyad par rnam pa gnyis la gnas//dmigs pa yod pa 'jig rten bcas//dmigs med de ni 'jig rten 'das//gang zhig theg
355a2(mdo sde): pa gcig ston pa//de ni legs par chos ston min//bdag kyang yongs su mi smin na//gzhan gyi don du ga la 'gyur//gcig tu mi dge sems can la//theg pa gsum gyi chos ston na//de ni//
355a3(mdo sde): gti mug rmongs pa ste//byang chub chen po de ma yin//theg pa gsum la 'jug spro zhing //yang dag pa yi chos 'dod la//'khor bas spro ba'i chos ston na//mkhas pa'i rang bzhin de ma yin//
355a4(mdo sde): rtse gcig skyo yis rab brtags te//'dod dang mos pa bzhin du ston//'di ni shin tu thabs mkhas pas//mkhas pa rnams kyi de la bsngags//sems can sdig pa dag spyod cing //theg pa
355a5(mdo sde): gsum gyi snod 'gyur na//dbang po'i snod bzhin chos bstan to//sdig pa kun las grol bar byed//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa chen po'i
355a6(mdo sde): go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal te/nyan thos dang /
355a7(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pas nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
355b1(mdo sde): dpa mas kyad thos mchod pa dang /babyung ba dang /brdzun nga bar gyur ro//des de ltar na byams pa can pa'i gamatshan pa'i 'khor lozhe na/rigs kyi byang chub sems pa'i byams pal nubapa
355b2(mdo sde): gnyis te/chos la dmigs pa'i byas pa dang /sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa'o//chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o//sems
355b3(mdo sde): can la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni byams pa chen po'i go cha zhes mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong du gyur pa ste/
355b4(mdo sde): nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas ni bdag la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir sems can la dmigs pa'i brjod pa la nan tan byed pa'o//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas ni bdag zhi ba dang /bdag myi
355b5(mdo sde): ngan las 'da' ba dang /bdag gi sgrib pa bsal ba dang /bdag gi kun nas nyon mongs pa bcad pa'i phyir yin gyi/sems can thams cad kyi phyir sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pas brtson
355b6(mdo sde): 'grus la nan tan byed pa ni ma yin no//de bas na byams pa 'di ni byams pa chen po zhes mi bya ste/go cha chen po ma yin no//chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi
355b7(mdo sde): theg pa pa dang thun mongs pa ma yin gyi/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'ba' zhig gis nan tan byed nus par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems//
356a1(mdo sde): can thams cad lnga phan pa dang bde ba'i don du/brtson 'grus kyi sbyor bas chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa 'di la nan tan byed do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
356a2(mdo sde): chen po ni sems can thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su gcad pa'i phyir shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis chos la dmigs pa'i
356a3(mdo sde): byams pa la nan tan byed do//de bas na byams pa 'di ni byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po zhes bya'o//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa la nan tan byed pa ni phung po
356a4(mdo sde): la mi gnas/skye mched la mi gnas/khams la mi gnas/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas pa nas byang chub kyi lam gyi yan lag gi bar du mi gnas so//'dod pa'i khams
356a5(mdo sde): la mi gnas/gzugs kyi khams la mi gnas/gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas/'jig rten 'di la mi gnas/'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas/tshu rol gyi mu la mi gnas/pha rol
356a6(mdo sde): gyi mu la mi gnas/dmigs pa la mi gnas/mi dmigs pa la mi gnas te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa la nan tan byed pas nyan thos dang /
356a7(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa'i sa las shin tu 'das te/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o//rigs kyi
356b1(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan pa'i thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal te/nyan thos dang /rang
356b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos dang /reng sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad kyis mchod pa
356b3(mdo sde): dang /bsrung ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal ba//
356b4(mdo sde): sems can dmigs pa'i byams sgom pa//sems la bcu gsum skyon 'chang zhing //bdag la phan pa'i don phyir rtsol//byang chub sems dpa' grags chen ni//sems can thams cad kun gyi
356b5(mdo sde): byiphyi//thun mong ma yin byams chen bsgoms//bcu gsum sems kyi skyon rnams spangs//dri ma bcu gsum rab spangs nas//byang chub chen por gzhol bar byed//chos la dmigs par
356b6(mdo sde): byams bsgoms na//bsod nams zhing grub ring ba mi ni//ba cu gsum stobs la bder gnas na//sems can kun las shin tu 'phags//ji ltar seng ge'i rgyal po de//ri dwags kun las
356b7(mdo sde): 'phags pa bzhin//bcu gsum dgra rnams shin tu 'atul//rtag dang chad pa'i mthar 'dzin spangs//sems la cis kyang mi gos na//myur du byang chub chen po 'thob//rigs kyi bu gnan
357a1(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na rdzo/
357a2(mdo sde): ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pas nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing
357a3(mdo sde): chen por 'gyur zhing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thaM kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /srung ba dang /bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro//de ji ltar zhe na/nyan thos dang /rang
357a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad ni bdag la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje la spyod kyi/sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje chen po skyed pa ma yin no//
357a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag 'ba' zhig la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje chen po bskyed pa ma yin gyi/sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i
357a6(mdo sde): don gyi phyir snying rje chen po skyed do//de bas na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo dang ldan pas nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das
357a7(mdo sde): pas nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /srung ba dang /
357b1(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis sems can yongs su smin par
357b2(mdo sde): byed do//skyong rje chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir sbyin pas yongs su sdud pa ni 'di lta ste/rin po che dang /nor dang /dbyig dang /theg pa dang /bran dang /las
357b3(mdo sde): byed pa'i mi dang /yul dang /srid dang /bu dang /chung ma dang /lus dang /srog gi byor du yongs su gtong bA la s+yer sna mud de/mi dmigs pa'i spyod pa la sbyor bas 'dul ba'i sems can yod par
357b4(mdo sde): mi mthong /sbyin pa byed par mi mthong /len par mi mthong /nor gyi dngos por mi mthong /sbyin pa spyod par mi mthong /sbyin pa byas pa'i 'bras bur mi mthong ba nas mi dmigs pa'i bar du'ang mi mthong
357b5(mdo sde): ste/de lta bu'i snying rje chen po skyed do//sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir ngag snyan pa dang /don sgrub pa dang /don mthun pas ci dang cis 'dul ba bzhin du mi dmigs pa'ang
357b6(mdo sde): mi mthong ba'i du de dang des rgyas par ston cing 'chad do//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu mchog dam pa'i dul ba'i sems dang /rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang /tshad med
357b7(mdo sde): pa'i sems dang /phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched thams cad la mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i sems kyis gang nas gang du skyes kyang g.yo ba med pa dang /mi gnas pa'i snying rje chen po'i go
358a1(mdo sde): chen po'i 'khor lo 'dis snod du gyur pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa la skyo ba med do//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i/
358a2(mdo sde): 'khor lo zhes bya ste/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba ma yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo/
358a3(mdo sde): 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu
358a4(mdo sde): 'das shing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /srung ba dang /bsnyen
358a5(mdo sde): bkur byed par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/shin tu zab mo dam pa'i chos dag/snying rje chen po'i
358a6(mdo sde): gzhi ru de 'gyur//shin tu dpag dka' nam mkha' 'dra ste//gnas pa med de gzugs kyang med do//byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus chen po//yon tan chen po dang ni ljon te//rgyal
358a7(mdo sde): ba'i ye shes snying rje chen pos//dpa' bo 'jig rten 'da' bar des 'gyur//mgon dang skyabs med sems can dag ni//'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnyog pas bcings pa//snying rje chen po/
358b1(mdo sde): chu yis bkrus te//sems can rnam par grol bar byed do//byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje bskyed pas//'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skems par byed de//nyan thos theg pa'i 'khor rnams dang ni//rang
358b2(mdo sde): rgyal theg pa spyod pas ma yin//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sems can//ngan song dag tu lhung bar 'gyur ba//snying rje chen po'i chu yis bkrus te//sdug bsngal kun las grol bar byed do//
358b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig so so yang dag par rig pa/nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/tshad med pa/mtha' yas pa/shin tu rgya chen po dang
358b4(mdo sde): ldan pa ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs rnams dang /shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod do//byang chub sems
358b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pas
358b6(mdo sde): nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /srung ba dang /bsnyen bkur
358b7(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur ro//de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig so so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/tshad med pa mtha' yas pa/shin tu rgya che ba
359a1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs rnams dang /shin tu brtan pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo wAn/'di lta
359a2(mdo sde): ste/byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad la shin tu rtog pa ni ji ltar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis nam mkha' kun tu khyab pa bzhin du/sems mnyam pa bzhin du gyur pa/
359a3(mdo sde): mtshan ma med parten pa med pa mi gnas pa/gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sems kyi spyod pa med pa/mig dang /gzugs dang /mig gi
359a4(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyis rnam par zhen pa dang bral bya/sems kyi spyod pa med pa las mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba rnam gsum skyes
359a5(mdo sde): te/bde ba dang /sdug bsngal dang /bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin par tshor ba la sems rab tu zhi zhing chags pa med do//de bzhin du rna ba dang /sgra dang /rna ba'i rnam par
359a6(mdo sde): shes pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna dang /dri dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lce dang /ro dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i 'dus te
359a7(mdo sde): rig pa dang /lus dang /reg bya dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid dang /chos dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
359b1(mdo sde): bar du gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par sems pa dang /yid dang /rnam par shes pa thams cad rtag tu zhi zhing chags pa med do/sems dang /yid dang /rnam par shes pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba
359b2(mdo sde): rnam gsum ste/bde ba dang /sdug bsngal dang /bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin par tshor ba la sems rtag tu zhi zhing chags pa med do//dus gsum gyi phung po dang /khams dang /
359b3(mdo sde): skye mched rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad la len pa med pa/sems kyi spyod pa med pa'o//gang ji snyed khams gsum dang /'du byed gsum dang /reg bya gsum dang /tshor ba gsum dang /dbang
359b4(mdo sde): po gsum dang /theg pa gsum dang /sdom pa gsum dang /rnam paraM grol ba gsum dang /rnam pa de dag thams cad la sems rab tu zhi ba/gnas med pa/mtshan ma med pa/len pa med
359b5(mdo sde): pas mnyam pa nyid du gnas so//gang ji snyed sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab dang /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la
359b6(mdo sde): sems kyi spyod pa med par rab tu zhi bar gnas so//de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga
359b7(mdo sde): dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang sems kyi spyod pa med par rab tu zhi bar gnas so//gang ji snyed dgu mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
360a1(mdo sde): par 'jug pa la'ang sems kyis spyod pa med par rab tu zhi bar gnas so//gzhan yang mngon par 'du byed pa gsum dang /chos la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang //
360a2(mdo sde): lam gyi yan lag dang /lam gyi rang bzhin 'dren par byed pa dag la'ang len pa med pa/sems kyi spyod pa med pa/kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang /kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma yin
360a3(mdo sde): pa dang /nye bar len pa dang bcas pa dang /nye bar len pa med pa dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa dang /tshu rol gyi mu dang /pha rol gyi mu dang /chung ngu dang /chen po dang /
360a4(mdo sde): tshad med pa dang /byed pa dang /mi byed pa dang /dge ba dang /mi dge ba dang /lung du mi ston pa thams cad kyi rnam pa la len pa med pa dang /sems kyi spyod pa med par rab tu zhi bar gnas
360a5(mdo sde): so//gang ji snyed byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /thabs mkhas pas sems can smin par byed pa nas srung bar bya ba med pa gsum dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /sangs
360a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du chos thams cad kyi rnam pa la len pa med pa/sems kyi spyod pa med par rab tu zhi bar gnas so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
360a7(mdo sde): chen po dag 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis tshor ba rnam gsum gyi nyes pa yongs su bsal ba dang /rnam par rtog pa thams cad yongs su zhi ba dang /mtshan ma'i chos thams cad yongs su
360b1(mdo sde): spong bar 'gyur ro//gzhan yang ji snyed nam mkha'i mig dang /spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'ang 'dren par 'gyur te/byang chub
360b2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'khor lo de la gnas pas gang 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang /gzhan yang srid pa dang /'gro ba rnams su 'khor
360b3(mdo sde): bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bsal te/rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi myong bar byed do//gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/mun pa nag pos nam mkha'
360b4(mdo sde): thams cad yod pa na nyi ma shar ba'i tshe mun pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang tshig so so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/
360b5(mdo sde): tshad med pa/mtha' yas pa/yangs shing rgya chen po dang ldan pas ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs rnams dang /shin tu brten pa'i bzod pa go
360b6(mdo sde): cha chen po'i 'khor lo'ang grub cing 'dren par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang nam mkha'i mig dang /spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo
360b7(mdo sde): la gnas pa dpag tu med pas nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes kyi nyi mas phyin ci log bzhi'i mun pa yongs su bsal te/'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag ma gnyer te
361a1(mdo sde): ngan 'gro munar med pa dang /gzhan yang srid pa dang 'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su sel te/rnam par smin
361a2(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu myong bar mi byed do//gzhan yang de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la dbang thob pa dang /phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du mi 'gro zhing
361a3(mdo sde): rjes su mi spyod pa dang /rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'brel ba dang /chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba
361a4(mdo sde): dang /dge 'dun la mchod pa dang /bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /yon tan thams cad la sems mi ngoms pa nas byang chub kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad de/rtag tu sangs
361a5(mdo sde): rgyas rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba ni chung ngu na rmi lam du yang bar chad med par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig so so yang
361a6(mdo sde): dag par rig pas nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/tshad med pa/mtha' yas pa/yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pas ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ting nge 'dzin
361a7(mdo sde): rnams dang /gzungs rnams dang /shin tu bstan pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'dren par 'gyur zhe na/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan dang po
361b1(mdo sde): nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du snyoms par 'jug pa dang /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar du snyoms par 'jug pa dang /'du shes
361b2(mdo sde): dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la granas na tshor ba rnam gsum dang /'du byed gsum po yongs su bcad de/mngon par 'du byed pa dang /g.yo
361b3(mdo sde): ba'i sems kyi spyod pa med pa/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /sems pa dang /rig pa dang /yid la byed pa la sogs pa kun gcod par 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas na zhag gcig
361b4(mdo sde): gam/zhag bdun gyi bar du bsam gtan gyi zas za bar 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin de las langs na'ang sems rab tu zhi ba len pa med cing /lhan ner gnas par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang
361b5(mdo sde): don dam pa'i mthas gtugs pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog go/ting nge 'dzin de la gnas na sems rab tu mnyam pas nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa dang /lus
361b6(mdo sde): kyi ba spu'i bu ga kun nas zil dngar gyi thigs pas skar ma snar ma lta bu mngon par byung bas kun nas nyon mongs pas bcings pa'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin
361b7(mdo sde): de las langs nas yang dag pa'i dran pa thob ste/dga' ba khyad par can gyis lus la khyab par gyur pa ni ji ltar lha'i sras po dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la
362a1(mdo sde): 'jug pa nas lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu kun nas rab tu bde ba myong ba bzhin de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de lus la bde bas reg pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran par 'gyur
362a2(mdo sde): ro//sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas sangs rgyas mthong ba las mtshan ma gzhan mthong ba med do//byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe sangs rgyas gcig yid la byas na sangs rgyas gcig
362a3(mdo sde): mthong ngo //gral te sangs rgyas mang po yid la byas na sangs rgyas mang po mthong ngo //gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku chung bar yid la byas na sangs rgyas kyi sku chung ngur mthong ngo //gal
362a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sku chen por yid la byas na sangs rgyas kyi sku chen por mthong ngo //gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad med par yid la byas na sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad med par mthong ngo //gal te
362a5(mdo sde): bdag gi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mtshan dang ldan par yid la byas na bdag gi lus de sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par mthong ngo //gal te gzhan gyi lus
362a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi skur yid la byas na gzhan gyi lus sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par mthong ngo //gal te sems can dang sems can ma yin pa dang /ji snyed gzugs su/
362a7(mdo sde): gtogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan dang ldan par yid la byas na sems can dang /sems can ma yin pa dang /ji snyed gzugs su gtogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku
362b1(mdo sde): dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par mthong gi gzugs gzhan du mi mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe'ang 'di snyam du chos thams cad dang /gzugs thams cad ni sgyu ma dang 'dra ste/yang
362b2(mdo sde): dag pa ma yin pas/bdag gis tshor ba rnam gsum dang /'du byed gsum la sogs pa chos thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su gcad do snyam nas 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
362b3(mdo sde): zhugs so//ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas blo sngon du btang ba bzhin du thams cad yongs su bcad de ting nge 'dzin gyi ro'i zas kyis mtsho'o//gal te na zhag bdun nam/zhag bdun gnyis sam/
362b4(mdo sde): bdun gsum mam/bzhi 'am/lnga 'am/drug gam/bdun nam/brgyad dam/gal te bskal pa tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du ni nus su gnas te/ting nge 'dzin gyi zas za'o//
362b5(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas sems rab tu zhi bas ci la'ang mi chags te bde bar gnas so//gal te don dam pa'i mthas gtugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs na'ang sngar ji skad bshad pa
362b6(mdo sde): bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan dang ldan pa yid la bya ba nas chos thams cad dang /gzugs thams cad sgyu ma dang 'dra ste yang dag pa ma yin pa'i bar du chud par byed de//rigs kyi bu 'di ni
362b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/tshad med pa/mtha' yas pa/yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pa ji snyed sangs rgyas
363a1(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad de/ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs thams cad dang /shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ste/byang chub sems
363a2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgra 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na nam mkha'i mig dang /spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs rnams las shin tu thabs mkhas pa thams cad lhag ma ma
363a3(mdo sde): lus par spangs te rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu len par mi byed do//gzhan yong rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/'jig rten gyi khams su mes 'jig pa 'byung du nye ba ni nyi ma lnga cig car shar
363a4(mdo sde): te/'jig rten gyi khams na rdzing bu dang /rdzing bu chen po dang /'bab chu dang /'bab chu chen po dang /mtsho dang /mtsho chen po'i chu rnams lhag ma ma lus par thams cad skems par
363a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang tshig so so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ched med pa/mtha' yas pa/yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pas
363a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs rnams dang /shin tu brten pa'i bzod pa chen po go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yang mngon par 'dren to//gzhan yang nam
363a7(mdo sde): mkha'i mig dang /spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la'ang gnas shing 'dren par 'gyur ro//gang 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa
363b1(mdo sde): mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te/ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang /gzhan yang srid pa dang /'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bskams te/
363b2(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi len par byed do//gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/'jig rten du chu'i 'jig pa byung ba na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chu 'di'i khams chung ngu'i
363b3(mdo sde): gling chen po bzhi dang /gling phran brgyad dang /rI rabA ri'i rgyal po dang /ri phran thams cad chu yis bkrus te zhig nas lhag ma ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
363b4(mdo sde): yang tshig so so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/tshad med pa/mtha' yas pa/yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pas ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ting nge
363b5(mdo sde): 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs rnams dang /shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'ang 'grub cing 'dren par 'gyur ro//nam mkha'i mig dang /spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
363b6(mdo sde): gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la gnas shing 'dren par 'gyur bas 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te ngan 'gro ma nur med pa dang /
363b7(mdo sde): gzhan yang srid pa dang /'gro ba rnams su 'khor ba 'khor ba'i las la mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'ang gnas par 'gyur ro//'khor la 'di la gnas pas dpag tu med pa nam mkha'
364a1(mdo sde): lta bu'i ye shes kyi nyi ma byung bas rang gi lus la phyin ci log bzhi dang /ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad yongs su sel bar 'gyur ro//'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi
364a2(mdo sde): dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang /gzhan yang srid pa dang /'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad kyang lhag ma ma lus par yongs su sel te/
364a3(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'ang myong bar mi byed do//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su
364a4(mdo sde): bsal te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang
364a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /srung ba dang /bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro//'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ba dang /phyir/
364a6(mdo sde): mi ldog pa dang /sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du mi 'gro ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi
364a7(mdo sde): 'bral ba dang /chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /yon tan thams cad la sems mi ngoms pa ste/mngon par
364b1(mdo sde): byang chub kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba ni chung ngu na rmi lam na'ang 'bral bar mi byed do//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
364b2(mdo sde): tshogs kyang myur du rdzogs pa dang /ring po mi thogs por rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri na
364b3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyang rdzus te skye ba dang /mtshan dang gzugs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra ba/nyon mongs pa srab cing chung ba/theg pa chen po la bde bar gnas pa shi stag go/de nas
364b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/chos kyi snod du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag/nyon mongs thams cad yongs su gcad par bya//yang dag
364b5(mdo sde): stong pa nyid la snyoms zhugs na//dngos po gang yang bya bar dka' ba min//srid pa'i bcings pa thams cad gcad pa'i phyir//snyoms par 'jug la nan tan brtson par bya//ting 'dzin yon tan dag dang
364b6(mdo sde): ldan pas na//gdon mi za bar dpyag dka'i shes rab thob//gzugs med pa yi bsam gtan rab sgom zhing //'gog pa'i ting 'dzin stong pa nyid brtags na//sangs rgyas dran pa'i blo mchog rab
364b7(mdo sde): skyes te//sdig pa thams cad yongs su zad 'gyur ro//yod dang med pa'i chos rnams thams cad ni//yang dag stong pa nyid du brtags pas bcom//ngan par 'go ba'i rgyud rnams yongs bsal
365a1(mdo sde): nas/rtag tu sangs rgyas mang po mthong bar 'gyur//yang dag stong pa nyid ltar ba bsgoms pas//dge ba'i chos gzhan kun la brtson bya ste//sangs rgyas thams cad
365a2(mdo sde): kun la rab mchod na//myur du sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur//sems can kun gyi dge ba'i grogs byas te//kun nas nyon mongs pa yi nad bsal na//rnam dag sangs rgyas ning du
365a3(mdo sde): myur du ste//mngon par 'tshang rgya byang chub chen po 'thob//sangs rgyas mtshan dang ldan pa'i sems can dag/sangs rgyas zhing der yongs su gang bar 'gyur//thams cad sangs rgyas thigs
365a4(mdo sde): 'dun pa ste//nyan thos rang rgyal thog pa yongs su stong //'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bad+maHzhes bya ba las bsod nams kyi zhing gi mtshan nyid kyim du nas
365a5(mdo sde): bya ste bdun pa'o///bcom ldan 'das kyis theg pa chen po'i rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
365a6(mdo sde): god+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa sngon 'das pa'i dus nasangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la goms pa dag deng 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgya rjes su dran pa la nan tan bya bu'i spyod
365a7(mdo sde): bshad pa thos nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mo thams cad thob po//gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa rnams chos 'di thos nas ting nge 'dzin gyi 'tsho ba me
365b1(mdo sde): tog gis phreng ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo mo thams cad thob bo//gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas dpyang bar 'gro ba glog gi 'od la
365b2(mdo sde): rten pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo mo thams cad thob bo//gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas chos la skyer ba 'ong snang ba las rten par byed pa
365b3(mdo sde): rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thams cad thob bo//gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas rdul dang dri ma dang bral te chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa
365b4(mdo sde): skyes te rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob po//gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa zos nas lan cig phyir ldog pa'i 'bras bu thob po//gzhan yang
365b5(mdo sde): soms can tshad med grangs med pa dgra bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu thob po//gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad
365b6(mdo sde): pa thos nas mchog gi dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob po//gzhan yang sems can tshod med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas khams gsum gyi btson rwa nas 'byung bar rtsom
365b7(mdo sde): pas bcom ldan 'das la rten cing rab tu byung nas yang dag pa'i chos la zhugs par gyur to//gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag nam 'tsho'i bar du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bde
366a1(mdo sde): bar gnas shing nyan thos kyi theg par sems bskyed pas phyir mi ldog par gyur to//gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad/
366a2(mdo sde): pa thos nas nam 'tsho'i bar du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bde bar gnas nas rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par sems bskyed pa las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//gzhan yang sems can tshad med
366a3(mdo sde): grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas nam 'tsho'i bar du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bde bar gnas nas theg pa chen por sems bskyed cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
366a4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas 'jig rten gyi yang dag par lta ba thob par gyur te//
366a5(mdo sde): yang dag par lta ba de'i dbang gis ngan song du 'gro ba'i rgyu dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad byang nas mtho ris su 'gro ba'i rgyu dang /yang dag pa'i smon lam dang /
366a6(mdo sde): dge ba'i las thams cad skye zhing 'phel bar gyur to//gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ste/
366a7(mdo sde): dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa blangs nas sangs rgyas mchod pa la spro ba dang /chos thos pa la dga' ba dang /dge 'dun gyi g.yog byed pa la mos te/nyin mtshan du 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus la sems
366b1(mdo sde): bar chad med par gyur to//gzhan yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dgra bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas log pa la 'bab pa dang /log pa la phyogs pa dang /blo gros ngan
366b2(mdo sde): pa dang /las ngan pa thams cad yongs su spangs te/sangs rgyas kyi chos la mi 'gyur ba'i dad pa thob nas khyim na gnas pa'i chos yongs su spangs te rnam par dag pas rab tu byung bar gyur to///
366b3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu ngas sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa shes pa brda
366b4(mdo sde): sprospyod pa chen po chos kyi sgo mo 'di/khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyis khyod kyis gzungs su zung la shin tu rgyas par gyis shig/sems can gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la klog gam/'don tam/yid la
366b5(mdo sde): byed dam/gzhan la'ang rgya cher 'chang ngam/yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dag la khyod kyis chos rnam pa 'di bcus bsrungs te/yun ring por phan pa dang bde ba'i don thob par gyis
366b6(mdo sde): shig/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/de'i thabs dang bdog pa'i nor thams cad bsrungs te nyams par mi bya ba dang /gnod pa thams cad las bsrungs te/med par bya ba dang /log par lta
366b7(mdo sde): ba dang /logs par phyogs pa la bsrungs te mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam spang bar bya ba dang /de'i lus dang ngag la gnod pa thams cad las bsrungs te med par bya ba dang /'phya ba dang skur
367a1(mdo sde): pa thams cad la sa bsrungs te med par bya ba dang /tshul khrims dang /spyod pa thams cad nyams par mi 'gyur bar bsrung ba dang /de la mi ma yin pa thams cad dang /'byung
367a2(mdo sde): pa chen po 'khrugs pa dang /dus ma yin pa'i nad dang /rga bo thams cad yongs su sel bar srung ba dang /de la dus ma yin pa tshul ma yin pa/lhas ngan dang /rims thams cad mi 'byung bar srung
367a3(mdo sde): ba dang /de la 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na'ang sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar srung ba dang /de tshe 'phos nas kyang bde 'gror skye ba dang /phan pa dang bde ba'i don thob par yongs su srung bar byed do//rigs/
