455b2(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di la byin gyis rlob par shes par gyis shig/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byin gyis brlabs lags so//bcom
455b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/bcom ldan 'das nyag gcig
455b4(mdo sde): gis byin gyis brlabs sam/'on te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di dag gis byin gyis brlabs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
455b5(mdo sde): padz+rakun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das
455b6(mdo sde): la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
455b7(mdo sde): stsal pa/kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa med pa zhes bya bar gzung zhig/'di 'bras bu sna tshogs dang bral ba zhes bya
456a1(mdo sde): bAr lung gzung zhig/'di dang byas rjes su 'brang ba dang /chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /brgyad pa dang /rigs kyi sa dang /rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /ldan/
456a2(mdo sde): cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas bstan pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig/'di bdud sprir btang ba bstan pa 'o
456a3(mdo sde): bya bar yang gzung zhig/'di de bzhin gshegs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das dang /sangs rgyas bstun pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig/'di pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa zhes
456a4(mdo sde): byu bar yang gzung zhig//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos sam/'dzin tam/klog gam/ku ni chub par byed na pha rol tu phyin pa drug ba sgom pa
456a5(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos sam/'dzin tam/TI gi ma/kun chub par bgyid pa'i phyi rol tu phyin pa
456a6(mdo sde): drug bsgom pa ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bu gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dag chos kyi
456a7(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di la mos pa de ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la the tshim mi za ba de ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//gang
456b1(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bzod cing 'dod pa de ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pag/glang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la sems ma zhum pa de ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
456b2(mdo sde): gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la sems yang yeng por mi 'gyur ba de ni de'i bosam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rnam par mi rtog cing chos thams cad/
456b3(mdo sde): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//kun dga' bo de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa zhes bya bar gzung
456b4(mdo sde): zhig/'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mtshungs par bstan po zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig/'di phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo ye shes chen po bstan pa zhes bya bar yang
456b5(mdo sde): gzung zhig/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyis rnam grangs 'di'i ming yang mnyan par bgyin thog ma
456b6(mdo sde): dang/bar ma dang /tha mA lte smos kyang ci 'tshal/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de de lta'o//kun dga' bo de de lta'i//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/bcom
456b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos pa des 'khor ba las bskal pa du zhig bsnyil bar bgyis par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga'
457a1(mdo sde): bo g+hang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo ye shes chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba thos la/thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur ba dus
457a2(mdo sde): 'khor ba las bskal pa stong bsnyil bar byas par 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos nas byang chub tu sems
457a3(mdo sde): bskyed par 'gyur ba de ji ltar blta bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba
457a4(mdo sde): de snod de'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o//de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag gi mdun du pad+ma kha dog sna tshogs pa/kha dog du ma yod pa/kha dog dpag
457a5(mdo sde): tu med pa/'dab ma bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma yod pa so sor byung ngo //de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes
457a6(mdo sde): ra pad+ma de dag blangs nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to//mngon par gtor nus kyang tshig 'di skad du bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de ltar bstan par
457a7(mdo sde): bgyi'o//de ltar rab tu dbye bar bgyiro zhes smras so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu de nas sil
457b1(mdo sde): spyan thams cad kyang mo bkrol bar sgra byung ngo //spros thams cad kyi dad kyang langs so//lha brgya stong mang po dag gis kyang lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang /lha'i dzam+ba'i gling gi gser phye dang /
457b2(mdo sde): lha'i me tog man+ta ra ba dang /lha'i ni bzo' rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to//de nas bcom ldan 'das le tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//
457b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rgyu ma mchis/rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/rkyen gang lags/bcom ldan 'das
457b4(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo 'khor bzhi po 'di dag thams cad dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za gang dag chos kyis rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang /gang dag phyi
457b5(mdo sde): ma'i dus na thos par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang ji ltar da lta na nga ston pa de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lhag chad med par ston par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
457b6(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /'khor bzhi po de dag dang /lha dang /mi dad /d+ha muM yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs
457b7(mdo sde): pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do//'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhyen po dzi na mi trang
458a1(mdo sde): dA na shI la dang /mu ne bar ma dang /zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
458a2(mdo sde): rgyu gar skad du/Ar+ya sa mA d+hI tsakra nA ma ma hA yAn sU tra/bod skad du/'bags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub
458a3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/dge slong
458a4(mdo sde): gis dge 'dun stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//gzhan yang lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin
458a5(mdo sde): la sogs pa'i 'khor sna tshogs pas bskor nas chos ston par gyur te/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso pa
458a6(mdo sde): dang /ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rab tu g.yos par gyur to//snang ba chen pos kyang thams cad bsal bar gyur te/de nas 'khor der byeng chub
458a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug par gyur te/stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi
458b1(mdo sde): 'khor lo snyoms par zhugs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to//bde bar gshegs pa shin tu ngo mtshar lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod kyis yang
458b2(mdo sde): dag pa'i mtha' shes sam/byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'tshal lags so//bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal yang dag pa'i mtha'
458b3(mdo sde): gang na 'dug/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gang na ma mchis pa de ni mchis lags so//bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal gang na med pa de gang yin/gsol pa/
458b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das yul thams cad dang bral ba'o//bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal sgom pa gang yin/bcom ldan 'das sgom pa ni sgom pa ma mchis pa'i don to//'jam dpal gyis
458b5(mdo sde): gsol pa/de bzhin gshegs pas chos ji ltar ston par mdzad/bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal nga ni gzugs rnam par 'jig pa med pa dang /skye ba med par chos ston to//tshor ba dang /
458b6(mdo sde): 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa rnam par 'jig pa med pa dang /skye ba med par chos ston to//'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug rnam par 'jig pa
458b7(mdo sde): med pa dang /skye ba med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro//ngas ni 'di ltar chos gang yang ma bshig/ma bskyed pa de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gsungs so///
459a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jam dpal khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings
459a2(mdo sde): shes sam/gsol pa/gal te bdag gis dmigason 'tshal lags so//bka' stsal po/'jam dpal khyod kyis 'jig rten grang la spyod pa shes sam/gsol pa/
459a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na sgyu ma sprul pa'i mi gang kho na la spyod pa de la spyod pas so//bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten zhes bgyi ba ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags
459a4(mdo sde): so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de bzhin gshegs pa chos gsan par ni bzhed kyi/khyod spobs par gyis shig/gsol pa/ci las brtsams te
459a5(mdo sde): spobs par bgyid pa lags/bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod chos kyi dbyings las rtsoms shig/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis chos kyi dbyings ma
459a6(mdo sde): lags pa'i chos de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so//bka' stsal pa/mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams rab tu skrag par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/
459a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' skrag par gyur na/de'i slad du mngon pa'i nga rgyal kyang skrag par 'gyur ro//de ci'i slad du zhe na/yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /
459b1(mdo sde): mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gnyis gcig cing dbyer med pa'i phyir ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod ni rdo rje'i gzhi yin no//'jam dpal gyis gsol
459b2(mdo sde): pa/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mi phyed cing bsam gyis mi khyab pas na rdo rje'i gzhi lags so//dri ci'i slad du rdo rje'i gzhi zhes bgyi na sems can ma mchis pa dang /
459b3(mdo sde): dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du rdo rje'i gzhi lags so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags pa'i yang dag pa'i mtha' ni ma mchis pa lags te/de lta bu'i mtha' gang
459b4(mdo sde): lags pa de ni tshur mchi ba dang /phar mchi ba ma mchis te/bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i mtha' can gyi don la gnas nas rang bzhin med pa'i don sgom par byed do//dben pa sten
459b5(mdo sde): par yang byed do//'du 'dzin spong ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal khyod kyis chos bstan pa ni
459b6(mdo sde): rab tu ngo mtshar to//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pra shA ri'i bu ngo mtshar myi che ste/dgra bcom pa zag pa med pa ni chos ston pa'i snod ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar
459b7(mdo sde): chos bstan pa 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i chos la zhugs pa ma yin/dgra bcom pa'i chos la zhugs pa ma yin/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs pa ma yin/de bzhin gshegs
460a1(mdo sde): pa'i chos la zhugs pa ma yin pa'i phyir te/'di ni chos dmigs pa'i phyir yang zhugs pa ma yin no//'di ni gang du'ang zhugs pa dang ldog pa med pa'i phyir
460a2(mdo sde): ro/chos thams cad shin tu dben pa'i phyir//smras pa/'dzum dpral nI la bsams te smr-i/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ri'i bu dgra bcom pa nyid ni 'dod
460a3(mdo sde): chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug zad pa yin na de dag gang gi snod yin zhing de gang ji lta bu zhig gi snod du 'gyur snyam ste/de la swa bsams nas dgra bcom pa/zag pa zad pa/
460a4(mdo sde): chos bstan pa'i snod ma yin par kho bo de skad smra'o//smras pa/btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod 'chi 'pho ba dang /skye ba med pa'i chos yin par mos sam/smras pa/'jam dpal
460a5(mdo sde): bdag mos so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal legs so legs so//chos zab mo'i don la khyod rab
460a6(mdo sde): tu mkhas par bsngags 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA
460a7(mdo sde): ri'i bu dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
460b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa ti nge 'dzin gyi 'khrur la zhes bya ba zag pa chen po'i mdo rtags so//rgyu gar skad du/Ar+yA pA roN T+TakrA na ma mAhA yAnA b+hU tA/bod skad du/
460b2(mdo sde): 'a'agrus pa yongs su bsngo ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus
460b3(mdo sde): gcig na/bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i ri'i zom lnga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das
460b4(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rin po chel bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu gang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub chen po don du gnyer bar 'dod pa dang /sems can thams cad sgrol bar
460b5(mdo sde): 'dod cing byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa 'dzin par 'dod pa dang /byang chub chen por sems bskyed cing snying rje chen po dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rim gro
460b6(mdo sde): bkur sti byud 'dod pa dang /byang chub seM pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs yangs shing rgyu chu ba sogs par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa dang /phyogs
460b7(mdo sde): pa ming po'i gzungs dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgra dang /rdzu 'phrul dang /mngon par shes pas rnam par rol par 'dod pa dang /nam mkha' la bang ba dang mdzad
461a1(mdo sde): chen po bsgrub par 'dod pa dang /rang gi lag nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du gtong zhing 'bul bar 'dod pas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/phyogs
461a2(mdo sde): bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang /sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams bdag
461a3(mdo sde): la dgongs su gsol/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang dag pa'i lam la bde bar gnas pa ma thob pas deng byang chub tu sems bskyed de/bdag gi lus dang sems 'di dus
461a4(mdo sde): thams cad dang /rnam pa thams cad du dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag lus 'bul gyis/mthu chen po mnga' grol
461a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /sa chen po la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bdag bzhes su gsol/bdag gi bsod nams dang ye shes
461a6(mdo sde): kyi tshogs chen po dang /brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /sems kyi rgya bskyed pa dang /rab tu zhi zhing dul ba dang /dbang dang /mngon par shes pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa la
461a7(mdo sde): sogs pa myur du yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/yang bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'khor
461b1(mdo sde): blonA 'khor nod brjod ba chen pos banongs par gyur pa/btsun ra na gnas pa/yang dag bya'i lam dang bral ba/nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i dbang du gyur ba/mgon mang bya/skyabs mang/
461b2(mdo sde): mig med pa/rten med pa/gtso bo med pa/'dren pa med par gyur pa/lam gol bar song ba/'khor ba las gzhol ba/mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ngan
461b3(mdo sde): 'gro la phyogs pa/lam ngan pa la bsnyen pa/lam dran par lhung bar gyur pa/rtag tu ba shes gnyen ngan pas zin cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba/yang dag pa dang yang dag
461b4(mdo sde): pa ma yin pa dang /phan par 'gyur ba dang /phan pa med pa dang /don yod pa dang don med pa la rmongs par gyur pa/dge ba'i chos dang bral shing mi dge ba chen po bsgrubs pa/
461b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /'phags pa rnams la rtag tu rgyab kyis phyogs pa/skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir cing mi bde ba chen po bsgrubs pa/'jigs
461b6(mdo sde): pa med po/bag tshwa ba med pa/sems rtag tu g.yeng bar gyur pa/sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /zhi zhing dbeni pa dang /sgrub pa dang bag yod pa dang bral bar gyur pa/gzungs
461b7(mdo sde): dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang /sa bcu'i chos kyi bzod pa la bde bar gnas pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo dang mnyam pa nyid las ring du gyur pa/byams pa dang //
462a1(mdo sde): snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms tshad med pa bzhi mi sgrub pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang mi ldan par gyur pa dang /
462a2(mdo sde): chags pa med pa dang /thogs pa med pa'i ye shes chen po las ring du gyur pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu dge ba'i chos sgrub pa la bde bar gnas pa ma thob pa dang /rdzu 'phrul
462a3(mdo sde): dang /stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang bral bar gyur pa dang /yang dag pa'i dran pa la mi gnas pa dang /bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid la spyod cing gzhol bar 'jug pa
462a4(mdo sde): mi 'grub pa dang /bsod nams byed pa la g.yel zhing lta ba snyems pa dang /the tshom gyi sgrib pas byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mngon par mi rtogs pa dang /de bzhin du 'phags
462a5(mdo sde): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad mi sgrub pa dang /nyon mongs pa brgya stong tshad med pas zil gyis non cing sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos sdug bsngal zhing yongs su mnar te/rtag tu gdung ba
462a6(mdo sde): bsam bzhin pas khro zhing rtag tu g.yeng ba/nyon mongs pa brgya stong la rgyun du gzhol bar gyur pa de bzhin ge shegs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po la gnas pa
462a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis/bdag gi skyabs mdzad par gsol/bdag gi rten mdzad par gsol/bdag gi 'dren pa mdzad par gsol/bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs
462b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi lam dang /byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i lam dang /byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs sogs pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/bdag myur du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
462b2(mdo sde): bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs dang /
462b3(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba'i yon tan dang /rdzu 'phrul dang /mngon par shes pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/yang bdag bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa thams
462b4(mdo sde): cad dang ldan par gyur cig/mchod pa rgya chen po byed pa'i dus su'ang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthu chen po mnga' ba thams cad dang /byang chub
462b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' tshogs thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/deng bdag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa dang /rim gro chen po bgyis te lus 'bul lo//
462b6(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ji snyed rgyan dang /yo byad bzang po thams cad rin po che'i gzhal med khang rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /rin po che'i rgyan thams cad dang /rin po che'i
462b7(mdo sde): shing dang /rin po che'i ri dang /rin po che'i ba dan dang /rin po che'i dkyil 'khor dang /rin po che'i dbyig rnam par bkram pa dang /rin po che'i gdugs dang /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan
463a1(mdo sde): dang rin po che'i do shUl gyi rgyun dang /mu tig ge ba dang /rin po che'i snod dang /rin po che'i phung po dang /rin pa chu'i 'od 'phro ba dang /rin po
463a2(mdo sde): gling drug na nor bu rin po che chen po rnam par dag pa'i mar mo'i sdong bu dang /rin po che dril bu'i sgra 'khrol bi/nor bu rin po che 'od 'phro ba gser btso ma'i slar khab can gyi pho long sbyangs
463a3(mdo sde): pas yongs su khengs pa/gser bco ma'i me tog dzam+bu gser gyi bye ba can/gser gyi shing ljon pas dkris pa/gser gyi pho brang sna tshogs rin po che'i sprin chags pa/rin po che'i
463a4(mdo sde): thigs pa char du 'bab pa/rin po che rnam pa mang po'i mdzod kyi pho brang /lha rdzas kyi nor bus brtsib ngos spras pa/rin po che'i shing thams cad rig 'dzin chen po'i skyed mos tshal gyi ra
463a5(mdo sde): ba yid du 'ong ba/rin po che'i pho brang dang /gnas dang /shing dang /nags tshal la sogs pa thams cad kyang yid du 'ong ba de lta bu bdag po med pa 'dzin pa mod pa thams cad
463a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yongs su bsngo zhing dbul lo//dzam+bu'i gling na sman bzang po ring du 'tsho bar byed pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa ji snyed yod pa dang /
463a7(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su skong ba dang /ma g.yos par rang bzhin gyis bde' ba'i zhal zas bzang po dang /spos kyi shing ljon pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
463b1(mdo sde): na b+h+rUM shing dang /a ga ru dang /tsan+dan dmar po dang /lo mtsho zhing me tog rtag par gsung gis gzi bar byed pa'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs dang /yid du 'ong ba'i lU rdzus m+b+ha spros ma
463b2(mdo sde): brdung ba yongs su ma bzung ba dang /dpage bsam gyi shing rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas 'byung ba nor bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che la
463b3(mdo sde): sogs pa dang /ri rab lhun po dang /ri ti se dang /spos kyi rI dang /ri mu lA yu dang /ri btang bzung dang /ri ma ha la dang /rdo rje rI la sogs te ri chen po rnam pa de dag gi rin po che'i
463b4(mdo sde): zom sna tshogs dang /rin po che'i stegs dang /rdo ba rin po che dang /rin po che'i phug dang /rin po che'i pho brang dang /rin po che'i rgyan dang /rin po che'i zhogs ma dang /rin po
463b5(mdo sde): che'i lim srang mang po dang /nor bu rin po che'i ka ba mang po dang /rin po che'i sgron ma'i 'khor lo mang po dang /bai DUr+ya la sogs te/nor bu'i rigs rnam pa mang po dang /ji tsam du
463b6(mdo sde): gnam gyi snying na bdag po med pa'i lha'i pho brang dang /lha'i nor rnam pa mang po yid du 'ong zhing blta bar 'os pa dang /lha'i rol mo'i yo byad rnam pa mang po rlung gi dad kyis bskyod pa tsam
463b7(mdo sde): gyis sgra snyan pa 'byin pa dang /nam mkha' la gnas pa'i pho brang nas rol mo'i sgra snyan pa 'byin pa dang /lha'i rol mo rnam pa mang pos bskyod par sgra snyan par 'byin pa dang /lha'i bya
464a1(mdo sde): sna tshogs nam mkha'i pho brang nas snyan pa'i sgo sna tshogs 'byin pa dang /rin po che'i sprin sna tshogs las sgra snyan pa chen po 'byung ba dang /lha'i nor bu rin po dbyangs snyan
464a2(mdo sde): pa'i sgra sgrogs pa dang /gzhan yang lha'i dri'i shing dang /me tog gi shing mang po dang /phreng ba'i shing dang /byug pa mang po dang /bdug pa'i spos kyi shing dang /sgron ma'i shing dang /
464a3(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan gyi shing dang /ba dan gyi shing dang /rin po che'i shing la sogs pa de dag thams cad ma bzung ba yongs su ma bzung ba de dag thams cad kun kyang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub
464a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad la dbu'o//ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na mchod pa'i sprin chen po me tog gi sprin dang /spos
464a5(mdo sde): kyi sprin dang /phreng ba'i sprin dang /bdug spos kyi spyan dang /byug spos kyi sprin dang /rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin dang /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang /rin po che'i ba dan gyi sprin dang /
464a6(mdo sde): rin po che'i gos kyi sprin dang /rin po che'i rnam pa'i sprin dang /rin po che'i phung po'i sprin la sogs te/rin po che chen po'i sprin rnam po de dag dang /gzhan yang spos kyi 'bru mar gyis mar me'i
464a7(mdo sde): snod chen po bkang ba stong gi 'jig rten gyi tshad dang mnyam pa/mar me'i snying por rab kyi tshad tsam pa sgron mar byas te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad dang /byang chub
464b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams la mchod cing dbu'o//de bzhin du mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa'i bsod nams dam pa ji tsam pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo'o//gang
464b2(mdo sde): 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dge ba mang po brtsams te/dmig su med pa'i tshul gyis byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bsod nams de dag thams cad bla na
464b3(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo'o//yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying por mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo chen po ni bskor/bdud kyi snga
464b4(mdo sde): rnams ni pham par byas nas/mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs par dgongs pa la/sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir bskal pa chen po gcig tshang bar bzhugs par gsol zhes gsol ba
464b5(mdo sde): gdab bo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /sems can thams cad kyis bsod nams ci bsgrubs pa de dag thams cad la rje su yi rang ngo //dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
464b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sdig pa dang mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad pashags pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang yongasu bshags shing yongs skye //de bzhin du mchod pa dang bsha
464b7(mdo sde): po la sogs pa byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon du dmigs pa'i spyan sngar gsang sdigs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlaso//oM sa ma b+ho ra sam b+ha ra/b+hi ma nas ra mA tA dzA d+ha hU~M/
465a1(mdo sde): gang gsang sngags de bzlas pas ci dang ci 'dod pa de thams cad 'grub cing lha'i mchod pa'i sprin chen po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyuraro//rigs kyi
465a2(mdo sde): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yid la cing nyin mo'ang rung mtshan mo'ang rung yongasu bsngo ba'i 'khor lo chen po 'di klog cing 'don na/de'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las
465a3(mdo sde): 'byang zhing nyon mongs pa thams cad khad kyis sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang /bsod nams kyi tshogs snga ma de dag thams cad thob par 'gyuraro//lan cig bklags pa tsam gyis kyang tshangs pa brgya'i dpal
465a4(mdo sde): dang ldan zhing rmi lam na'ang rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro//tshe 'das kyang yongasu dag pa'i zhing du skye'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa'i
465a5(mdo sde): tshogs mang po de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//yongasu bsngo ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so///
465a6(mdo sde): li'i dge slong sde snod gsum dang ldan pa shI la d+harmas/rgya gar gyi d+harma rgya'i yi ge las ban+de rnam par mi rtog gis bsgyur ba//dge'o//
